original: Kātyāyanasmṛtisāroddhāraḥ
[rājaguṇāḥ]
analyzed: rāja guṇāḥ

original: vinītaḥ śāstrasaṃpannaḥ kośaśauryasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: vinītaḥ śāstra saṃpannaḥ kośa śaurya samanvitaḥ

original: brahmaṇyo dānaśīlaḥ syāt satyadharmaparo nṛpaḥ // K_001 //
analyzed: brahmaṇyaḥ dāna śīlaḥ syāt satya dharma paraḥ nṛpaḥ

original: stambhopatāpapaiśunya- cāpalakrodhavarjitaḥ /
analyzed: stambha upatāpa paiśunya cāpala krodha varjitaḥ

original: pragalbhaḥ sannatodagraḥ saṃbhāṣī priyadarśanaḥ // K_002 //
analyzed: pragalbhaḥ san nata udagraḥ saṃbhāṣī priya darśanaḥ

original: vaśyendriyaṃ jitātmānaṃ dhṛtadaṇḍaṃ vikāriṣu /
analyzed: vaśya indriyam jita ātmānam dhṛta daṇḍam vikāriṣu

original: parīkṣyakāriṇaṃ dhīram atyantaṃ śrīr niṣevate // K_003 //
analyzed: parīkṣyakāriṇam dhīram atyantam śrīḥ niṣevate

original: [rājadharmāḥ]
analyzed: rāja dharmāḥ

original: śauryavidyārthabāhulyāt prabhutvāc ca viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: śaurya vidyā artha bāhulyāt prabhu tvāt ca viśeṣataḥ

original: sadā cittaṃ narendrāṇāṃ moham āyāti kāraṇāt // K_004 //
analyzed: sadā cittam narendrāṇām moham āyāti kāraṇāt

original: tasmāc cittaṃ praboddhavyaṃ rājadharme sadā dvijaiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt cittam praboddhavyam rāja dharme sadā dvijaiḥ

original: pavitraṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ smṛtivākyaṃ na laṅghayet // K_005 //
analyzed: pavitram paramam puṇyam smṛti vākyam na laṅghayet

original: vedadhvaniprabhāveṇa devāḥ svarganivāsinaḥ /
analyzed: veda dhvani prabhāveṇa devāḥ svarga nivāsinaḥ

original: te 'pi tatra pramodante tṛptās tu dvijapūjanāt // K_006 //
analyzed: te pi tatra pramodante tṛptāḥ tu dvija pūjanāt

original: tasmād yatnena kartavyā dvijapūjā sadā nṛpaiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yatnena kartavyā dvija pūjā sadā nṛpaiḥ

original: tena bhūyo 'pi śakratvaṃ narendratvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // K_007 //
analyzed: tena bhūyaḥ śakra tvam narendra tvam punar punar

original: surādhyakṣaś cyutaḥ svargān nṛparūpeṇa tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: surādhyakṣaḥ cyutaḥ svargāt nṛpa rūpeṇa tiṣṭhati

original: kartavyaṃ tena tan nityaṃ yena tattvaṃ samāpnuyāt // K_008 //
analyzed: kartavyam tena tat nityam yena tattvam samāpnuyāt

original: ātmīye saṃsthitā dharme nṛpāḥ śakratvam āpnuyuḥ /
analyzed: ātmīye saṃsthitāḥ dharme nṛpāḥ śakra tvam āpnuyuḥ

original: avīcivāsino ye tu vyapetācāriṇaḥ sadā // K_009 //
analyzed: avīci vāsinaḥ ye tu vyapeta ācāriṇaḥ sadā

original: gacchet samyagavijñāya vaśaṃ krodhasya yo nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: gacchet samyak a vijñāya vaśam krodhasya yaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: vaset sa narake ghore kalpārdhaṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ // K_010 //
analyzed: vaset sa narake ghore kalpa ardham tu na saṃśayaḥ

original: etair eva guṇair yuktam amātyaṃ kāryacintakam /
analyzed: etaiḥ eva guṇaiḥ yuktam amātyam kārya cintakam

original: brāhmaṇaṃ tu prakurvīta nṛpabhaktaṃ kulodvaham // K_011 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇam tu prakurvīta nṛpa bhaktam kula udvaham

original: mantriṇo yatra sabhyāś ca vaidyāś ca priyavādinaḥ /
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ yatra sabhyāḥ ca vaidyāḥ ca priya vādinaḥ

original: rājyād dharmāt sukhāt tatra kṣipraṃ hīyeta pārthivaḥ // K_012 //
analyzed: rājyāt dharmāt sukhāt tatra kṣipram hīyeta pārthivaḥ

original: na tasya vacane kopam eteṣāṃ tu pravartayet /
analyzed: na tasya vacane kopam eteṣām tu pravartayet

original: yasmād etaiḥ sadā vācyaṃ nyāyyaṃ supariniṣṭhitam // K_013 //
analyzed: yasmāt etaiḥ sadā vācyam nyāyyam su pariniṣṭhitam

original: yatra karmāṇi nṛpatiḥ svayaṃ paśyati dharmataḥ /
analyzed: yatra karmāṇi nṛpatiḥ svayam paśyati dharmataḥ

original: tatra sādhusamācārā nivaseyuḥ sukhaṃ prajāḥ // K_014 //
analyzed: tatra sādhu samācārāḥ nivaseyuḥ sukham prajāḥ

original: prajānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ kaṇṭakānāṃ ca śodhanam /
analyzed: prajānām rakṣaṇam nityam kaṇṭakānām ca śodhanam

original: dvijānāṃ pūjanaṃ caiva etad arthaṃ kṛto nṛpaḥ // K_015 //
analyzed: dvijānām pūjanam ca eva etat artham kṛtaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: bhūsvāmī tu smṛto rājā nānyadravyasya sarvadā /
analyzed: bhū svāmī tu smṛtaḥ rājā na anya dravyasya sarvadā

original: tatphalasya hi ṣaḍbhāgaṃ prāpnuyān nānyathaiva tu // K_016 //
analyzed: tad phalasya hi ṣaṣ bhāgam prāpnuyāt na anyathā eva tu

original: bhūtānāṃ tannivāsitvāt svāmitvaṃ tena kīrtitam /
analyzed: bhūtānām tad nivāsi tvāt svāmi tvam tena kīrtitam

original: tatkriyā baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ śubhāśubhanimittajam // K_017 //
analyzed: tad kriyā bali ṣaṣ bhāgam śubha aśubha nimitta jam

original: evaṃ pravartate yas tu lobhaṃ tyaktvā narādhipaḥ /
analyzed: evam pravartate yaḥ tu lobham tyaktvā narādhipaḥ

original: tasya putrāḥ prajāyante rāṣṭraṃ kośaś ca vardhate // K_018 //
analyzed: tasya putrāḥ prajāyante rāṣṭram kośaḥ ca vardhate

original: anyāyena hi yo rāṣṭrāt karaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: anyāyena hi yaḥ rāṣṭrāt karam daṇḍam ca pārthivaḥ

original: sasyabhāgaṃ ca śulkaṃ cāpy ādadīta sa pāpabhāk // K_019 //
analyzed: sasya bhāgam ca śulkam ca api ādadīta sa pāpa bhāj

original: arthaśāstroktam utsṛjya dharmaśāstroktam āvrajet // K_020 //
analyzed: arthaśāstra uktam utsṛjya dharma śāstra uktam āvrajet

original: duṣṭasyāpi narendrasya tadrāṣṭraṃ na vināśayet /
analyzed: duṣṭasya api narendrasya tat rāṣṭram na vināśayet

original: na prajānumato yasmād anyāyeṣu pravartate // K_021 //
analyzed: na prajā anumataḥ yasmāt anyāyeṣu pravartate

original: akleśenārthine yas tu rājā samyaṅ nivedayet /
analyzed: akleśena arthine yaḥ tu rājā samyak nivedayet

original: tat tārayaty anantaṃ syād dharmārthaṃ dānam īdṛśam // K_022 //
analyzed: tat tārayati anantam syāt dharma artham dānam īdṛśam

original: nyāyenākramya yallabdhaṃ ripuṃ nirjitya pārthivaiḥ /
analyzed: nyāyena ākramya yat labdham ripum nirjitya pārthivaiḥ

original: tac chuddhaṃ tatpradeyaṃ tan nānyathopahṛtaṃ kvacit // K_023 //
analyzed: tat śuddham tat pradeyam tat na anyathā upahṛtam kvacid

original: rājā purohitaṃ kuryād uditaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hitam /
analyzed: rājā purohitam kuryāt uditam brāhmaṇam hitam

original: kṛtādhyayanasaṃpannam alubdhaṃ satyavādinam // K_024 //
analyzed: kṛta adhyayana saṃpannam alubdham satya vādinam

original: [vyavahāralakṣaṇādi]
analyzed: vyavahāra lakṣaṇa ādi

original: prayatnasādhye vicchinne dharmākhye nyāyavistare /
analyzed: prayatna sādhye vicchinne dharma ākhye nyāya vistare

original: sādhyamūlas tu yo vādo vyavahāraḥ sa ucyate // K_025 //
analyzed: sādhya mūlaḥ tu yaḥ vādaḥ vyavahāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: vi nānārthe 'va saṃdehe haraṇaṃ hāra ucyate /
analyzed: nānā arthe saṃdehe haraṇam hāraḥ ucyate

original: nānāsaṃdehaharaṇād vyavahāra iti smṛtaḥ // K_026 //
analyzed: nānā saṃdeha haraṇāt vyavahāraḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: na rājā tu viśitvena dhanalobhena vā punaḥ /
analyzed: na rājā tu viśi tvena dhana lobhena vā punar

original: svayaṃ kāryāṇi kurvīta narāṇām avivādinām // K_027 //
analyzed: svayam kāryāṇi kurvīta narāṇām a vivādinām

original: utpādayati yo hiṃsāṃ deyaṃ vā na prayacchati /
analyzed: utpādayati yaḥ hiṃsām deyam vā na prayacchati

original: yācam ānaya dauḥśīlyād ākṛṣyo 'sau nṛpājñayā // K_028 //
analyzed: ānaya dauḥśīlyāt ākṛṣya u sau nṛpa ājñayā

original: dvipade sādhyabhedāt tu padāṣṭādaśatāṃ gate /
analyzed: dvipade sādhya bhedāt tu pada aṣṭādaśa tām gate

original: aṣṭādaśa kriyābhedād bhinnāny aṣṭasahasraśaḥ // K_029 //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa kriyā bhedāt bhinnāni aṣṭa sahasraśas

original: sādhyavādasya mūlaṃ syād vādinā yan niveditam /
analyzed: sādhya vādasya mūlam syāt vādinā yat niveditam

original: deyāpradānaṃ hiṃsā cety utthānadvayam ucyate // K_030 //
analyzed: deya apradānam hiṃsā ca iti utthāna dvayam ucyate

original: pūrvapakṣaś cottaraṃ ca pratyākalitam eva ca /
analyzed: pūrvapakṣaḥ ca uttaram ca pratyākalitam eva ca

original: kriyāpādaś ca tenāyaṃ catuṣpāt samudāhṛtaḥ // K_031 //
analyzed: kriyāpādaḥ ca tena ayam catuṣpād samudāhṛtaḥ

original: dharmaśāstrārthaśāstre tu skandhadvayam udāhṛtam /
analyzed: dharma śāstra artha śāstre tu skandha dvayam udāhṛtam

original: jayaś caivāvasāyaś ca dve phale samudāhṛte // K_032 //
analyzed: jayaḥ ca eva avasāyaḥ ca dve phale samudāhṛte

original: śāstreṇa ninditaṃ tv artha- mukhyo rājñā pracoditaḥ /
analyzed: śāstreṇa ninditam tu artha mukhyaḥ rājñā pracoditaḥ

original: āvedayati yaḥ pūrvaṃ stobhakaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ // K_033 //
analyzed: āvedayati yaḥ pūrvam stobhakaḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: nṛpeṇaiva niyukto yaḥ padadoṣam avekṣitum /
analyzed: nṛpeṇa eva niyuktaḥ yaḥ pada doṣam avekṣitum

original: nṛpasya sūcayej jñātvā sūcakaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ // K_034 //
analyzed: nṛpasya sūcayet jñātvā sūcakaḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: [dharmavyavahāracaritrarājaśāsanādīṇāṃ balābalavicāraḥ]
doṣakārī tu kartṛtvaṃ dhanasvāmī svakaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: doṣa kārī tu kartṛ tvam dhana svāmī svakam dhanam

original: vivāde prāpnuyād yatra dharmeṇaiva sa nirṇayaḥ // K_035 //
analyzed: vivāde prāpnuyāt yatra dharmeṇa eva sa nirṇayaḥ

original: smṛtiśāstraṃ tu yat kiṃcit prathitaṃ dharmasādhakaiḥ /
analyzed: smṛti śāstram tu yat kiṃcid prathitam dharma sādhakaiḥ

original: kāryāṇāṃ nirṇayārthe tu vyavahāraḥ smṛto hi saḥ // K_036 //
analyzed: kāryāṇām nirṇaya arthe tu vyavahāraḥ smṛtaḥ hi saḥ

original: yad yad ācaryate yena dharmyaṃ vādharmyam eva vā /
analyzed: yat yat ācaryate yena dharmyam vā adharmyam eva vā

original: deśasyācaraṇān nityaṃ caritraṃ tatprakīrtitam // K_037 //
analyzed: deśasya ācaraṇāt nityam caritram tat prakīrtitam

original: nyāyaśāstrāvirodhena deśadṛṣṭes tathaiva ca /
analyzed: nyāya śāstra avirodhena deśa dṛṣṭeḥ tathā eva ca

original: yaṃ dharmaṃ sthāpayed rājā nyāyyaṃ tadrājaśāsanam // K_038 //
analyzed: yam dharmam sthāpayet rājā nyāyyam tat rāja śāsanam

original: yuktiyuktaṃ tu kāryaṃ syād divyaṃ yatra vivarjitam /
analyzed: yukti yuktam tu kāryam syāt divyam yatra vivarjitam

original: dharmas tu vyavahāreṇa bādhyate tatra nānyathā // K_039 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ tu vyavahāreṇa bādhyate tatra na anyathā

original: pratilomaprasūteṣu tathā durganivāsiṣu /
analyzed: pratiloma prasūteṣu tathā durga nivāsiṣu

original: viruddhaṃ niyataṃ prāhus taṃ dharmaṃ na vicālayet // K_040 //
analyzed: viruddham niyatam prāhuḥ tam dharmam na vicālayet

original: nirṇayaṃ tu yadā kuryāt tena dharmeṇa pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: nirṇayam tu yadā kuryāt tena dharmeṇa pārthivaḥ

original: vyavahāraś caritreṇa tadā tenaiva bādhyate // K_041 //
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ caritreṇa tadā tena eva bādhyate

original: viruddhaṃ nyāyato yat tu caritraṃ kalpyate nṛpaiḥ /
analyzed: viruddham nyāyataḥ yat tu caritram kalpyate nṛpaiḥ

original: evaṃ tatra nirasyeta caritraṃ tu nṛpājñayā // K_042 //
analyzed: evam tatra nirasyeta caritram tu nṛpa ājñayā

original: anena vidhinā yuktaṃ bādhakaṃ yad yad uttaram /
analyzed: anena vidhinā yuktam bādhakam yat yat uttaram

original: anyathābādhanaṃ yatra tatra dharmo vihanyate // K_043 //
analyzed: anyathā bādhanam yatra tatra dharmaḥ vihanyate

original: asvargyā lokanāśāya parānīkabhayāvahā /
analyzed: asvargyā loka nāśāya para anīka bhaya āvahā

original: āyurbījaharī rājñāṃ sati vākye svayaṃ kṛtiḥ // K_044 //
analyzed: āyuḥ bīja hariḥ rājñām sati vākye svayam kṛtiḥ

original: tasmāc chāstrānusāreṇa rājā kāryāṇi sādhayet /
analyzed: tasmāt śāstra anusāreṇa rājā kāryāṇi sādhayet

original: vākyābhāve tu sarveṣāṃ deśadṛṣṭena sannayet // K_045 //
analyzed: vākya abhāve tu sarveṣām deśa dṛṣṭena san nayet

original: yasya deśasya yo dharmaḥ pravṛttaḥ sārvakālikaḥ /
analyzed: yasya deśasya yaḥ dharmaḥ pravṛttaḥ sārvakālikaḥ

original: śrutismṛtyavirodhena deśadṛṣṭaḥ sa ucyate // K_046 //
analyzed: śruti smṛti avirodhena deśa dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: deśapattanagoṣṭheṣu puragrāmeṣu vāsinām /
analyzed: deśa pattana goṣṭheṣu pura grāmeṣu vāsinām

original: teṣāṃ svasamayair dharma- śāstrato 'nyeṣu taiḥ saha // K_047 //
analyzed: teṣām sva samayaiḥ dharma śāstrataḥ nyeṣu taiḥ saha

original: deśasyānumatenaiva vyavasthā yā nirūpitā /
analyzed: deśasya anumatena eva vyavasthā yā nirūpitā

original: likhitā tu sadā dhāryā mudritā rājam udrayā // K_048 //
analyzed: likhitā tu sadā dhāryā mudritā rājam udrayā

original: śāstravad yatnato rakṣyā tāṃ nirīkṣya vinirṇayet /
analyzed: śāstra vat yatnataḥ rakṣyā tām nirīkṣya vinirṇayet

original: naigamasthais tu yat kāryaṃ likhitaṃ yad vyavasthitam // K_049 //
analyzed: naigama sthaiḥ tu yat kāryam likhitam yat vyavasthitam

original: tasmāt tat saṃpravarteta nānyathaiva pravartayet /
analyzed: tasmāt tat saṃpravarteta na anyathā eva pravartayet

original: pramāṇadeśadṛṣṭaṃ tu yad evam iti niścitam // K_050 //
analyzed: pramāṇa deśa dṛṣṭam tu yat evam iti niścitam

original: aprvṛttaṃ kṛtaṃ yatra śrutismṛtyanumoditam /
analyzed: aprvṛttam kṛtam yatra śruti smṛti anumoditam

original: nānyathā tat punaḥ kāryaṃ nyāyāpetaṃ vivarjayet // K_051 //
analyzed: na anyathā tat punar kāryam nyāya apetam vivarjayet

original: [dharmādhikaraṇam]
analyzed: dharma adhikaraṇam

original: dharmaśāstravicāreṇa mūlasāravivecanam /
analyzed: dharma śāstra vicāreṇa mūla sāra vivecanam

original: yatrādhikriyate sthāne dharmādhikaraṇaṃ hi tat // K_052 //
analyzed: yatra adhikriyate sthāne dharma adhikaraṇam hi tat

original: prātar utthāya nṛpatiḥ śaucaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: prātar utthāya nṛpatiḥ śaucam kṛtvā samāhitaḥ

original: guruṃ jyotirvidaṃ vaidyān devān viprān purohitān // K_053 //
analyzed: gurum jyotiḥ vidam vaidyān devān viprān purohitān

original: yathārham etān saṃpūjya supuṣpābharaṇāmbaraiḥ /
analyzed: yathārham etān saṃpūjya su puṣpa ābharaṇa ambaraiḥ

original: abhivandya ca gurvādīn sumukhāṃ praviśet sabhām // K_054 //
analyzed: abhivandya ca guru ādīn sumukhām praviśet sabhām

original: vinītaveṣo nṛpatiḥ sabhāṃ gatvā samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: vinīta veṣaḥ nṛpatiḥ sabhām gatvā samāhitaḥ

original: āsīnaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitvā paśyet kāryāṇi kāryiṇām /
analyzed: āsīnaḥ prāc mukhaḥ sthitvā paśyet kāryāṇi kāryiṇām

original: saha traividyavṛddhaiś ca mantrajñaiś caiva mantribhiḥ // K_055 //
analyzed: saha traividya vṛddhaiḥ ca mantra jñaiḥ ca eva mantribhiḥ

original: saprāḍvivākaḥ sāmātyaḥ sabrāhmaṇapurohitaḥ /
analyzed: sa prāḍvivākaḥ sa amātyaḥ sa brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ

original: sasabhyaḥ prekṣako rājā svarge tiṣṭhati dharmataḥ // K_056 //
analyzed: sa sabhyaḥ prekṣakaḥ rājā svarge tiṣṭhati dharmataḥ

original: saha sabhyaiḥ sthirair yuktaiḥ prājñair maulair dvijottamaiḥ /
analyzed: saha sabhyaiḥ sthiraiḥ yuktaiḥ prājñaiḥ maulaiḥ dvijottamaiḥ

original: dharmaśāstrārthakuśalair arthaśāstraviśāradaiḥ // K_057 //
analyzed: dharma śāstra artha kuśalaiḥ artha śāstra viśāradaiḥ

original: kulaśīlavayovṛtta- vittavadbhir amatsaraiḥ /
analyzed: kula śīla vayaḥ vṛtta vittavadbhiḥ amatsaraiḥ

original: vaṇigbhiḥ syāt katipayaiḥ kulabhūtair adhiṣṭhitam // K_058 //
analyzed: vaṇigbhiḥ syāt katipayaiḥ kula bhūtaiḥ adhiṣṭhitam

original: śrotāro vaṇijas tatra kartavyā nyāyadarśinaḥ // K_059 //
analyzed: śrotāraḥ vaṇijaḥ tatra kartavyāḥ nyāya darśinaḥ

original: [kāryadarśanakālaḥ]
analyzed: kārya darśana kālaḥ

original: sabhāsthāneṣu pūrvāhṇe kāryāṇāṃ nirṇayaṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: sabhā sthāneṣu pūrvāhṇe kāryāṇām nirṇayam nṛpaḥ

original: kuryāc chāstrapraṇītena mārgeṇāmitrakarṣaṇaḥ // K_060 //
analyzed: kuryāt śāstra praṇītena mārgeṇa amitra karṣaṇaḥ

original: divasasyāṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ muktvā kālatrayaṃ tu yat /
analyzed: divasasya aṣṭamam bhāgam muktvā kāla trayam tu yat

original: sa kālo vyavahārāṇāṃ śāstradṛṣṭaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ // K_061 //
analyzed: sa kālaḥ vyavahārāṇām śāstra dṛṣṭaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ādyād ahno 'ṣṭabhāgād yad ūrdhvaṃ bhāgatrayaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ādyāt ahnaḥ ṣṭa bhāgāt yat ūrdhvam bhāga trayam bhavet

original: sa kālo vyavahārasya śāstre dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ // K_062 //
analyzed: sa kālaḥ vyavahārasya śāstre dṛṣṭaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: [prāḍvivākaḥ]
analyzed: prāḍvivākaḥ

original: yadā kuryān na nṛpatiḥ svayaṃ kāryavinirṇayam /

original: tadā tatra niyuñjīta brāhmaṇaṃ śāstrapāragam // K_063 //
analyzed: tadā tatra niyuñjīta brāhmaṇam śāstra pāragam

analyzed: dakṣam kulīna madhyastham an udvega karam sthiram

original: paratra bhīruṃ dharmiṣṭham udyuktaṃ krodhavarjitam // K_064 //

original: akrūro madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ kṣamāyāto vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: akrūraḥ madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ kṣamā yātaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: utsāhavān alubdhaś ca vāde yojyo nṛpeṇa tu // K_065 //
analyzed: utsāhavān alubdhaḥ ca vāde yojyaḥ nṛpeṇa tu

analyzed: eka śāstram adhīyānaḥ na vidyāt kārya niścayam

original: tasmād bahvāgamaḥ kāryo vivādeṣūttamo nṛpaiḥ // K_066 //
analyzed: tasmāt bahu āgamaḥ kāryaḥ vivādeṣu uttamaḥ nṛpaiḥ

analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ yatra na syāt tu kṣatriyam tatra yojayet

analyzed: vaiśyam vā dharma śāstra jñam śūdram yatnena varjayet

original: niyuktair api vijñeyaṃ daivād yady api śāstrataḥ // K_068 //
analyzed: niyuktaiḥ api vijñeyam daivāt yadi api śāstrataḥ

original: vyavahārāśritaṃ praśnaṃ pṛcchati prāṅ iti sthitiḥ /
analyzed: vyavahāra āśritam praśnam pṛcchati prāṅ iti sthitiḥ

original: vivecayati yas tasmin prāḍvivākas tataḥ smṛtaḥ // K_069 //
analyzed: vivecayati yaḥ tasmin prāḍvivākaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ

original: anirṇīte tu yady arthe saṃbhāṣeta raho 'rthinā /
analyzed: a nirṇīte tu yadi arthe saṃbhāṣeta rahaḥ rthinā

original: prāḍvivāko 'tha daṇḍyaḥ syāt sabhyāś caiva viśeṣataḥ // K_070 //
analyzed: daṇḍyaḥ syāt sabhyāḥ ca eva viśeṣataḥ

original: [sabhyāḥ]
analyzed: sabhyāḥ

analyzed: alubdhāḥ dhanavantaḥ ca dharma jñāḥ satya vādinaḥ

original: sarvaśāstrapravīṇāś ca sabhyāḥ kāryā dvijottamāḥ // K_071 //
analyzed: sarva śāstra pravīṇāḥ ca sabhyāḥ kāryāḥ dvijottamāḥ

analyzed: hanyate prekṣamāṇānām hatāḥ tatra sabhāsadaḥ

original: nyāyamārgād apetaṃ tu jñātvā cittaṃ mahīpateḥ /
analyzed: nyāya mārgāt apetam tu jñātvā cittam mahīpateḥ

original: vaktavyaṃ tatpriyaṃ tatra na sabhyaḥ kilviṣī bhavet // K_076 //

original: sabhyenāvaśyavaktavyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ /

analyzed: śṛṇoti yadi no rājā syāt tu sabhyaḥ tatas naghaḥ

original: adharmāya yadā rājā niyuñjīta vivādinām /
analyzed: adharmāya yadā rājā niyuñjīta vivādinām

original: vijñāpya nṛpatiṃ sabhyas tadā kāryaṃ nivartayet // K_078 //
analyzed: vijñāpya nṛpatim sabhyaḥ tadā kāryam nivartayet

original: snehād ajñānato vāpi lobhād vā mohato 'pi vā /
analyzed: snehāt ajñānataḥ vā api lobhāt vā mohataḥ vā

analyzed: tatra sabhyaḥ nyathāvādī daṇḍyaḥ sabhyaḥ smṛtaḥ hi saḥ

original: kāryasya nirṇayaṃ samyag jñātvā sabhyas tato vadet /
analyzed: kāryasya nirṇayam samyak jñātvā sabhyaḥ tatas vadet

original: anyathā naiva vaktavyaṃ vaktā dviguṇadaṇḍabhāk // K_080 //
analyzed: anyathā nā eva vaktavyam vaktā dviguṇa daṇḍa bhāj

original: kulāni śreṇayaś caiva gaṇas tv adhikṛto nṛpaḥ /

original: gotrasthitis tu yā teṣāṃ kramād āyāti dharmataḥ /
analyzed: gotra sthitiḥ tu yā teṣām kramāt āyāti dharmataḥ

original: kuladharmaṃ tu taṃ prāhuḥ pālayet taṃ tathaiva tu // K_085 //
analyzed: kula dharmam tu tam prāhuḥ pālayet tam tathā eva tu

kāle kāryārthinaṃ pṛcchet praṇataṃ purataḥ sthitam /
analyzed: kāle kārya arthinam pṛcchet praṇatam puratas sthitam

analyzed: kena kasmin kadā kasmāt pṛcchet evam sabhā gataḥ

analyzed: vimṛśya kāryam nyāyyam ced āhvāna artham atas param

original: [pratinidhiḥ]
analyzed: pratinidhiḥ

analyzed: ānāya dauḥśīlyāt ākṛṣya u sau nṛpa ājñayā

analyzed: āsedhayan tu anāsedhyam śāsyaḥ iti sthitiḥ

original: abhiyuktaś ca ruddhaś ca tiṣṭheyuś ca nṛpājñayā /

original: [pratibhūtvenāgrāhyāḥ]

analyzed: niruddhaḥ daṇḍitaḥ ca eva saṃśaya sthāḥ ca na kvacid

original: rājakāryaniyuktaś ca ye ca pravrajitā narāḥ // K_115 //

original: nāvijñāto grahītavyaḥ pratibhūtvakriyāṃ prati // K_116 //
analyzed: na a vijñātaḥ grahītavyaḥ pratibhū tva kriyām prati

analyzed: śūdra ādīn pratibhū hīnān bandhayet nigaḍena tu

original: atikrame 'payāte ca daṇḍayet taṃ paṇāṣṭakam /
analyzed: atikrame payāte ca daṇḍayet tam paṇa aṣṭakam

original: nityakarmāparodhas tu kāryaḥ sarvavarṇinām // K_119 //
analyzed: nityakarma aparodhaḥ tu kāryaḥ sarva varṇinām

original: grahītagrahaṇo nyāye na pravartyo mahībhṛtā /
analyzed: nyāye na pravartyaḥ mahībhṛtā

original: tasya vā tatsamarpyaṃ syāt sthāpayed vā parasya tat // K_120 //
analyzed: tasya vā tat samarpyam syāt sthāpayet vā parasya tat

original: [abhiyoktrādīnām uktikramaḥ]
analyzed: abhiyoktṛ ādīnām ukti kramaḥ

original: tatrābhiyoktā prāg brūyād abhiyuktas tv anantaram /
analyzed: tatra abhiyoktā prāk brūyāt abhiyuktaḥ tu anantaram

original: tayor ante sadasyāstu prāḍvivākas tataḥ param // K_121 //
analyzed: tayoḥ ante sadasyāḥ tu prāḍvivākaḥ tatas param

original: yasya syād adhikā pīḍā kāryaṃ vāpy adhikaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yasya syāt adhikā pīḍā kāryam vā api adhikam bhavet

original: pūrvapakṣo bhavet tasya na yaḥ pūrvaṃ nivedayet // K_122 //
analyzed: pūrvapakṣaḥ bhavet tasya na yaḥ pūrvam nivedayet

original: yasya vārthagatā pīḍā śārīrī vādhikā bhavet /
analyzed: yasya vā artha gatā pīḍā śārīrī vā adhikā bhavet

original: tasyārthivādo dātavyo na yaḥ pūrvaṃ nivedayet // K_123 //
analyzed: tasya arthi vādaḥ dātavyaḥ na yaḥ pūrvam nivedayet

original: [pratijñāsvarūpam]
niveśya kālaṃ varṣaṃ ca māsaṃ pakṣaṃ tirthi tathā /
analyzed: niveśya kālam varṣam ca māsam pakṣam tirthi tathā

original: velāṃ pradeśaṃ viṣayaṃ sthānaṃ jātyākṛtī vayaḥ // K_124 //
analyzed: velām pradeśam viṣayam sthānam jāti ākṛtī vayaḥ

original: sādhyapramāṇaṃ dravyaṃ ca saṃkhyāṃ nāma tathātmanaḥ /
analyzed: sādhya pramāṇam dravyam ca saṃkhyām nāma tathā ātmanaḥ

original: rājñāṃ ca kramaśo nāma nivāsaṃ sādhyanāma ca // K_125 //
analyzed: rājñām ca kramaśas nāma nivāsam sādhya nāma ca

original: kramāt pitṝṇāṃ nāmāni pīḍāṃ cāhartṛdāyakau /
analyzed: kramāt pitṝṇām nāmāni pīḍām ca āhartṛ dāyakau

original: kṣamāliṅgāni cānyāni pakṣaṃ saṃkīrtya kalpayet // K_126 //
analyzed: kṣamā liṅgāni ca anyāni pakṣam saṃkīrtya kalpayet

original: deśaś caiva tathā sthānaṃ saṃniveśas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: deśaḥ ca eva tathā sthānam saṃniveśaḥ tathā eva ca

original: jātiḥ saṃjñā nivāsaś ca pramāṇaṃ kṣetranāma ca // K_127 //
analyzed: jātiḥ saṃjñā nivāsaḥ ca pramāṇam kṣetra nāma ca

original: pitṛpaitāmahaṃ caiva pūrvarājānukīrtanam /
analyzed: pitṛpaitāmaham ca eva pūrva rāja anukīrtanam

original: sthāvareṣu vivādeṣu daśaitāni niveśayet // K_128 //
analyzed: sthāvareṣu vivādeṣu daśa etāni niveśayet

original: rāgādīnāṃ yad ekena kopitaḥ karaṇe vadet /
analyzed: rāga ādīnām yat ekena kopitaḥ karaṇe vadet

original: tad om iti likhet sarvaṃ vādinaḥ phalakādiṣu // K_129 //
analyzed: tat om iti likhet sarvam vādinaḥ phalaka ādiṣu

original: adhikān śodhayed arthān nyūnāṃś ca pratipūrayet /
analyzed: adhikān śodhayet arthān nyūnān ca pratipūrayet

original: bhūmau niveśayet tāvad yāvat pakṣaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // K_130 //
analyzed: bhūmau niveśayet tāvat yāvat pakṣaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: pūrvapakṣaṃ svabhāvoktaṃ prāḍvivāko 'bhilekhayet /
analyzed: pūrvapakṣam svabhāva uktam prāḍvivākaḥ abhilekhayet

original: pāṇḍulekhena phalake tataḥ patre viśodhitam // K_131 //
analyzed: pāṇḍu lekhena phalake tatas patre viśodhitam

original: anyad uktaṃ likhed anyad yo 'rthipratyarthināṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: anyat uktam likhet anyat yaḥ rthi pratyarthinām vacaḥ

original: cauravac chāsayet taṃ tu dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // K_132 //
analyzed: caura vat śāsayet tam tu dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: sollekhanaṃ vā labhate try ahaṃ saptāham eva vā /
analyzed: sa ullekhanam vā labhate tri aham sapta aham eva vā

original: matir utpadyate yāvad vivāde vaktum icchataḥ // K_133 //
analyzed: matiḥ utpadyate yāvat vivāde vaktum icchataḥ

original: yasmāt kāryasamārambhāc cirāt tena viniścayaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt kārya samārambhāt cirāt tena viniścayaḥ

original: tasmāt na labhate kālam abhiyuktas tu kālabhāk // K_134 //
analyzed: tasmāt na labhate kālam abhiyuktaḥ tu kāla bhāj

original: matir notsahate yatra vivāde kāryam icchatoḥ /
analyzed: matiḥ nā utsahate yatra vivāde kāryam icchatoḥ

original: dātavyas tatra kālaḥ syād arthipratyarthinor api // K_135 //
analyzed: dātavyaḥ tatra kālaḥ syāt arthi pratyarthinoḥ api

original: [pratijñādoṣāḥ :
analyzed: pratijñā doṣāḥ

original: pūrvapakṣadoṣāḥ]
analyzed: pūrvapakṣa doṣāḥ

original: yaś ca rāṣṭraviruddhaś ca yaś ca rājñā vivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca rāṣṭra viruddhaḥ ca yaḥ ca rājñā vivarjitaḥ

original: anekapadasaṃkīrṇaḥ pūrvapakṣo na siddhyati // K_136 //
analyzed: aneka pada saṃkīrṇaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ na siddhi ati

original: bahupratijñaṃ yat kāryaṃ vyavahāreṣu niścitam /
analyzed: bahu pratijñam yat kāryam vyavahāreṣu niścitam

original: kāmaṃ tad api gṛhṇīyād rājā tattvabubhutsayā // K_137 //
analyzed: kāmam tat api gṛhṇīyāt rājā tattva bubhutsayā

original: deśakālavihīnaś ca dravyasaṃkhyāvivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: deśa kāla vihīnaḥ ca dravya saṃkhyā vivarjitaḥ

original: sādhyapramāṇahīnaś ca pakṣo 'nādeya iṣyate // K_138 //
analyzed: sādhya pramāṇa hīnaḥ ca pakṣaḥ na ādeyaḥ iṣyate

original: nyāyasthaṃ necchate kartum anyāyaṃ vā karoty ayam /
analyzed: nyāya stham na icchate kartum anyāyam vā karoti ayam

original: na lekhayati yat tv evaṃ tasya pakṣo na sidhyati // K_139 //
analyzed: na lekhayati yat tu evam tasya pakṣaḥ na sidhyati

original: aprasiddhaṃ nirābādhaṃ nirarthaṃ niṣprayojanam /
analyzed: aprasiddham nirābādham nirartham niṣprayojanam

original: asādhyaṃ vā viruddhaṃ vā pakṣābhāsaṃ vivarjayet // K_140 //
analyzed: asādhyam vā viruddham vā pakṣa ābhāsam vivarjayet

original: pratijñādoṣanirmuktaṃ sādhyaṃ satkāraṇānvitam /
analyzed: pratijñā doṣa nirmuktam sādhyam sat kāraṇa anvitam

original: niścitaṃ lokasiddhaṃ ca pakṣaṃ pakṣavido viduḥ // K_141 //
analyzed: niścitam loka siddham ca pakṣam pakṣa vidaḥ viduḥ

original: svalpākṣaraḥ prabhūtārtho niḥsaṃdigdho nirākulaḥ /
analyzed: su alpa akṣaraḥ prabhūta arthaḥ niḥsaṃdigdhaḥ nirākulaḥ

original: virodhikāraṇair mukto virodhipratiṣedhakaḥ // K_142 //
yadā tv evaṃ vidhaḥ pakṣaḥ kalpitaḥ pūrvavādinā /
analyzed: yadā tu evaṃvidhaḥ pakṣaḥ kalpitaḥ pūrvavādinā

original: dadyāt tatpakṣasaṃbaddhaṃ prativādī tadottaram // K_143 //
analyzed: dadyāt tad pakṣa saṃbaddham prativādī tadā uttaram

original: śrāvyamāṇo 'rthinā yatra yo hy artho na vighātitaḥ /
analyzed: śrāvyamāṇaḥ rthinā yatra yaḥ hi arthaḥ na vighātitaḥ

original: dānakāle 'thavā tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ so 'rtho 'numoditaḥ // K_144 //
analyzed: dāna kāle tūṣṇīm sthitaḥ saḥ ṛthaḥ

original: [uttaraṃ sadyo dātavyaṃ kālāntareṇa vā dātavyam]
analyzed: uttaram sadyas dātavyam kāla antareṇa vā dātavyam

original: śrutvā lekhyagataṃ tv arthaṃ pratyarthī kāraṇād yadi /
analyzed: śrutvā lekhya gatam tu artham pratyarthī kāraṇāt yadi

original: kālaṃ vivāde yāceta tasya deyo na saṃśayaḥ // K_145 //
analyzed: kālam vivāde yāceta tasya deyaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: sadyo vaikāhapañcāha- tryahaṃ vā gurulāghavāt /
analyzed: sadyas vā eka aha pañca aha tri aham vā gurulāghavāt

original: labhetāsau tripakṣaṃ vā saptāhaṃ vā ṛṇādiṣu // K_146 //
analyzed: labheta asau tri pakṣam vā sapta aham vā ṛṇa ādiṣu

original: kālaṃ śaktiṃ viditvā tu kāryāṇāṃ ca balābalam /
analyzed: kālam śaktim viditvā tu kāryāṇām ca balābalam

original: alpaṃ vā bahu vā kālaṃ dadyāt pratyarthine prabhuḥ // K_147 //
analyzed: alpam vā bahu vā kālam dadyāt pratyarthine prabhuḥ

original: dinaṃ māsārdhamāsau vā ṛtuḥ saṃvatsaro 'pi vā /
analyzed: dinam māsa ardha māsau vai ṛtuḥ saṃvatsaraḥ upi vā

original: kriyāsthityanurūpas tu deyaṃ kālaḥ pareṇa tu // K_148 //
analyzed: kriyā sthiti anurūpaḥ tu deyam kālaḥ pareṇa tu

original: vyapaiti gauravaṃ yatra vināśas tyāga eva vā /
analyzed: vyapaiti gauravam yatra vināśaḥ tyāgaḥ eva vā

original: kālaṃ tatra na kurvīta kāryam ātyayikaṃ hi tat // K_149 //
analyzed: kālam tatra na kurvīta kāryam ātyayikam hi tat

original: dhenāv anaḍuhi kṣetre strīṣu prajanane tathā /
analyzed: dhenau anaḍuhi kṣetre strīṣu prajanane tathā

original: nyāse yācitake datte tathaiva krayavikraye // K_150 //
analyzed: nyāse yācitake datte tathā eva kraya vikraye

original: kanyāyā dūṣaṇe steye kalahe sāhase nidhau /
analyzed: kanyāyāḥ dūṣaṇe steye kalahe sāhase nidhau

original: upadhau kauṭasākṣye ca sadya eva vivādayet // K_151 //
analyzed: upadhau kauṭa sākṣye ca sadyas eva vivādayet

original: sāhasasteyapāruṣya- go'bhiśāpe tathātyaye /
analyzed: sāhasa steya pāruṣya gobhiśāpe tathā atyaye

original: bhūmau vivādayet kṣipram akāle 'pi bṛhaspatiḥ // K_152 //
analyzed: bhūmau vivādayet kṣipram akāle pi bṛhaspatiḥ

original: sadyaḥ kṛteṣu kāryeṣu sadya eva vivādayet /
analyzed: sadyas kṛteṣu kāryeṣu sadyas eva vivādayet

original: kālātīteṣu vā kālaṃ dadyāt pratyarthine prabhuḥ // K_153 //
analyzed: kāla atīteṣu vā kālam dadyāt pratyarthine prabhuḥ

original: sadyaḥ kṛte sadya eva māsātīte dinaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: sadyas kṛte sadyas eva māsa atīte dinam bhavet

original: ṣaḍābdike trirātraṃ syāt saptāhaṃ dvādaśābdike // K_154 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ ābdike tri rātram syāt sapta aham dvādaśa ābdike

original: viṃśatyabde daśāhaṃ tu māsārdhaṃ vā labheta saḥ /
analyzed: viṃśati abde daśa aham tu māsa ardham vā labheta saḥ

original: māsaṃ triṃśatsamātīte tripakṣaṃ parato bhavet // K_155 //
analyzed: māsam triṃśat samā atīte tri pakṣam paratas bhavet

original: kālaṃ saṃvatsarād arvāk svayam eva yathepsitam /
analyzed: kālam saṃvatsarāt arvāk svayam eva yathā īpsitam

original: saṃvatsaraṃ jaḍonmatta- manaske vyādhipīḍite // K_156 //
analyzed: saṃvatsaram jaḍa unmatta manaske vyādhi pīḍite

original: digantaraprapanne vā ajñātārthe ca vastuni /
analyzed: diś antara prapanne vā ajñāta arthe ca vastuni

original: mūlaṃ vā sākṣiṇo vātha paradeśe sthitā yadā // K_157 //
analyzed: mūlam vā sākṣiṇaḥ vā atha para deśe sthitāḥ yadā

original: tatra kālo bhavet puṃsām ā svadeśasamāgamāt /
analyzed: tatra kālaḥ bhavet puṃsām sva deśa samāgamāt

original: datte 'pi kāle deyaṃ syāt punaḥ kāryasya gauravāt // K_158 //
analyzed: datte pi kāle deyam syāt punar kāryasya gauravāt

original: pūrvapakṣaśrutārthas tu pratyarthī tadanantaram /
analyzed: pūrvapakṣa śruta arthaḥ tu pratyarthī tad anantaram

original: pūrvapakṣārthasaṃbandhaṃ pratipakṣaṃ nivedayet // K_159 //
analyzed: pūrvapakṣa artha saṃbandham pratipakṣam nivedayet

original: ācāradravyadāneṣṭa- kṛtyopasthānanirṇaye /
analyzed: ācāra dravya dāna iṣṭa kṛtyā upasthāna nirṇaye

original: nopasthito yadā kaścic chalaṃ tatra na kārayet // K_160 //
analyzed: na upasthitaḥ yadā kaścid chalam tatra na kārayet

original: daivarājakṛto doṣas tasmin kāle yadā bhavet /
analyzed: daiva rāja kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ tasmin kāle yadā bhavet

original: abādhatyāgamātreṇa na bhavet sa parājitaḥ // K_161 //
analyzed: abādha tyāga mātreṇa na bhavet sa parājitaḥ

original: daivarājakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ sākṣibhiḥ pratipādayet /
analyzed: daiva rāja kṛtam doṣam sākṣibhiḥ pratipādayet

original: jaihmyena vartamānasya daṇḍo dāpyas tu taddhanam // K_162 //
analyzed: jaihmyena vartamānasya daṇḍaḥ dāpyaḥ tu tat dhanam

original: abhiyukto 'bhiyoktāram abhiyuñjīta karhicit /
analyzed: abhiyuktaḥ bhiyoktāram abhiyuñjīta karhicit

original: anyatra daṇḍapāruṣya- steyasaṃgrahaṇātyayāt // K_163 //
analyzed: anyatra daṇḍa pāruṣya steya saṃgrahaṇa atyayāt

original: yāvan yasmin samācāraḥ pāraṃparyakramāgataḥ /
analyzed: yāvan yasmin samācāraḥ pāraṃparya krama āgataḥ

original: taṃ pratīkṣya yathānyāyam uttaraṃ dāpayen nṛpaḥ // K_164 //
analyzed: tam pratīkṣya yathānyāyam uttaram dāpayet nṛpaḥ

original: [caturvidham uttaram]
analyzed: caturvidham uttaram

original: satyaṃ mithyottaraṃ caiva pratyavaskandanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: satyam mithyā uttaram ca eva pratyavaskandanam tathā

original: pūrvanyāyavidhiś caivam uttaraṃ syāc caturvidham // K_165 //
analyzed: pūrva nyāya vidhiḥ ca evam uttaram syāt caturvidham

original: śrutvā bhāṣārtham anyas tu yadā taṃ pratiṣedhati /
analyzed: śrutvā bhāṣā artham anyaḥ tu yadā tam pratiṣedhati

original: arthataḥ śabdato vāpi mithyā tajjñeyam uttaraṃ // K_166 //
analyzed: arthataḥ śabdataḥ vā api mithyā tat jñeyam uttaram

original: abhiyukto 'bhiyogasya yadi kuryāt tu nihnavam /
analyzed: abhiyuktaḥ bhiyogasya yadi kuryāt tu nihnavam

original: mithyā tat tu vijānīyād uttaraṃ vyavahārataḥ // K_167 //
analyzed: mithyā tat tu vijānīyāt uttaram vyavahārataḥ

original: sādhyasya satyavacanaṃ pratipattir udāhṛtā // K_168 //
analyzed: sādhyasya satya vacanam pratipattiḥ udāhṛtā

original: mithyaitan nābhijānāmi tadā tatra na saṃnidhiḥ /
analyzed: mithyā etat nā abhijānāmi tadā tatra na saṃnidhiḥ

original: ajātaś cāsmi tatkāla iti mithyā caturvidham // K_169 //
analyzed: a jātaḥ ca asmi tad kāle iti mithyā caturvidham

original: yo 'rthinārthaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ pratyarthī yadi taṃ tathā /
analyzed: yaḥ ṛthinā arthaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ pratyarthī yadi tam tathā

original: prapadya kāraṇaṃ brūyād ādharyaṃ gurur abravīt // K_170 //
analyzed: prapadya kāraṇam brūyāt ādharyam guruḥ abravīt

original: ācāreṇāvasanno 'pi punar lekhayate yadi /
analyzed: ācāreṇa avasannaḥ punar lekhayate yadi

original: so 'bhidheyo jitaḥ pūrvaṃ prāṅnyāyas tu sa ucyate // K_171 //
analyzed: saḥ abhidheyaḥ jitaḥ pūrvam prāṅnyāyaḥ tu saḥ ucyate

original: vibhāvayāmi kulikaiḥ sākṣibhir likhitena vā /
analyzed: vibhāvayāmi kulikaiḥ sākṣibhiḥ likhitena vā

original: jitaś caiva mayāyaṃ prāk prāṅnyāyastriprakārakaḥ // K_172 //
analyzed: jitaḥ ca eva mayā ayam prāk prāṅnyāyaḥ tri prakārakaḥ

original: [uttarābhāsā uttaradoṣā vā]
analyzed: uttara ābhāsāḥ uttara doṣāḥ vā

original: aprasiddhaṃ viruddhaṃ yad atyalpam atibhūri ca /
analyzed: a prasiddham viruddham yat ati alpam ati bhūri ca

original: saṃdigdhāsaṃbhavāvyaktam anyārthaṃ cātidoṣavat // K_173 //
analyzed: saṃdigdha asaṃbhava avyaktam anya artham ca ati doṣavat

original: avyāpakaṃ vyastapadaṃ nigūḍhārthaṃ tathākulam /
analyzed: avyāpakam vyasta padam nigūḍha artham tathā ākulam

original: vyākhyāgamyam asāraṃ ca nottaraṃ śasyate budhaiḥ // K_174 //
analyzed: vyākhyā agamyam asāram ca nā uttaram śasyate budhaiḥ

original: yadvyastapadam avyāpi nigūḍhārthaṃ tathākulam /
analyzed: yat vyasta padam avyāpi nigūḍha artham tathā ākulam

original: vyākhyāgamyam asāraṃ ca nottaraṃ svārthasiddhaye // K_175 //
analyzed: vyākhyā agamyam asāram ca na uttaram sva artha siddhaye

original: cihnākārasahasraṃ tu samayaṃ cāvijānatā /
analyzed: cihna ākāra sahasram tu samayam ca a vijānatā

original: bhāṣāntareṇa vā proktam aprasiddhaṃ tad uttaram // K_176 //
analyzed: bhāṣā antareṇa vā proktam aprasiddham tat uttaram

original: pratidattaṃ mayā bālye pratidattaṃ mayā na hi /
analyzed: pratidattam mayā bālye pratidattam mayā na hi

original: yad evam āha vijñeyaṃ viruddhaṃ tad ihottaraṃ // K_177 //
analyzed: yat evam āha vijñeyam viruddham tat iha uttaram

original: jitaḥ purā mayāyaṃ ca tv arthe 'sminn iti bhāṣitum /
analyzed: jitaḥ purā mayā ayam ca tu arthe smin iti bhāṣitum

original: purā mayāyam iti yat tad ūnaṃ cottaraṃ smṛtam // K_178 //
analyzed: purā mayā ayam iti yat tat ūnam ca uttaram smṛtam

original: gṛhītam iti vācye tu kāryaṃ tena kṛtaṃ mayā /
analyzed: gṛhītam iti vācye tu kāryam tena kṛtam mayā

original: purā gṛhītaṃ yad dravyam iti yac cātibhūri tat // K_179 //
analyzed: purā gṛhītam yat dravyam iti yat ca ati bhūri tat

original: deyaṃ mayeti vaktavye mayādeyam itīdṛśam /
analyzed: deyam mayā iti vaktavye mayā ādeyam iti īdṛśam

original: saṃdigdham uttaraṃ jñeyaṃ vyavahāre budhais tadā // K_180 //
analyzed: saṃdigdham uttaram jñeyam vyavahāre budhaiḥ tadā

original: balābalena caitena sāhasaṃ sthāpitaṃ purā /
analyzed: balābalena ca etena sāhasam sthāpitam purā

original: anuktam etan manyante tad anyārtham itīritam // K_181 //
analyzed: anuktam etat manyante tat anya artham iti īritam

original: asmai dattaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ sahasram iti bhāṣite /
analyzed: asmai dattam mayā sārdham sahasram iti bhāṣite

original: pratidattaṃ tadardhaṃ yat tad ihāvyāpakaṃ smṛtam // K_182 //
analyzed: pratidattam tad ardham yat tat iha avyāpakam smṛtam

original: pūrvavādī kriyāṃ yāvat samyaṅ naiva niveśayet /
analyzed: pūrvavādī kriyām yāvat samyak nā eva niveśayet

original: mayā gṛhītaṃ pūrvaṃ no tad vyastapadam ucyate // K_183 //
analyzed: mayā gṛhītam pūrvam no tat vyasta padam ucyate

original: tatkiṃ tāmarasaṃ kaścid agṛhītaṃ pradāsyati /
analyzed: tat kim tāmarasam kaścid agṛhītam pradāsyati

original: nigūḍhārthaṃ tu tat proktam uttaraṃ vyavahārataḥ // K_184 //
analyzed: nigūḍha artham tu tat proktam uttaram vyavahārataḥ

original: kiṃ tenaiva sadā deyaṃ mayā deyaṃ bhaved iti /
analyzed: kim tena eva sadā deyam mayā deyam bhavet iti

original: etad akulam ity uktam uttaraṃ tadvido viduḥ // K_185 //
analyzed: etat akulam iti uktam uttaram tad vidaḥ viduḥ

original: kākasya dantā no santi santītyādi yad uttaram /
analyzed: kākasya dantāḥ no santi santi ityādi yat uttaram

original: asāram iti tattvena samyaṅ nottaram iṣyate // K_186 //
analyzed: asāram iti tattvena samyak nā uttaram iṣyate

original: prastutād alpam avyaktaṃ nyūnādhikam asaṅgatam /
analyzed: prastutāt alpam avyaktam nyūna adhikam asaṅga tam

original: avyāpyasāraṃ saṃdigdhaṃ pratipakṣaṃ na laṅghayet // K_187 //
analyzed: avyāpi asāram saṃdigdham pratipakṣam na laṅghayet

original: saṃdigdham anyatprakṛtād atyalpam atibhūri ca /
analyzed: saṃdigdham anyat prakṛtāt ati alpam ati bhūri ca

original: pakṣaikadeśavyāpyeva tat tu naivottaraṃ bhavet // K_188 //
analyzed: pakṣa eka deśa vyāpya iva tat tu nā evā uttaram bhavet

original: pakṣaikadeśe yat satyam ekadeśe ca kāraṇam /
analyzed: pakṣa eka deśe yat satyam eka deśe ca kāraṇam

original: mithyā caivaikadeśe ca saṅkarāt tad anuttaram // K_189 //
analyzed: mithyā ca eva eka deśe ca saṅkarāt tat anuttaram

original: na caikasmin vivāde tu kriyā syād vādinor dvayoḥ /
analyzed: na ca ekasmin vivāde tu kriyā syāt vādinoḥ dvayoḥ

original: na cārthasiddhir ubhayor na caikatra kriyādvayam // K_190 //
analyzed: na ca artha siddhiḥ ubhayoḥ na ca ekatra kriyā dvayam

original: [vādahānikarāṇi]
analyzed: vāda hāni karāṇi

original: prapadya kāraṇaṃ pūrvam anyadgurutaraṃ yadi /
analyzed: prapadya kāraṇam pūrvam anyat gurutaram yadi

original: prativākyagataṃ brūyāt sādhyate tad dhi netarat // K_191 //
analyzed: prativākya gatam brūyāt sādhyate tat hi na itarat

original: yathārtham uttaraṃ dadyād ayacchantaṃ ca dāpayet /
analyzed: yathārtham uttaram dadyāt a yacchantam ca dāpayet

original: sāmabhedādibhir mārgair yāvat so 'rthaḥ samutthitaḥ // K_192 //
analyzed: sāma bheda ādibhiḥ mārgaiḥ yāvat saḥ ṛthaḥ samutthitaḥ

original: mohād vā yadi vā śāṭhyād yan noktaṃ pūrvavādinā /
analyzed: mohāt vā yadi vā śāṭhyāt yat nā uktam pūrvavādinā

original: uttarāntargataṃ cāpi tadgrāhyam ubhayor api // K_193 //
analyzed: uttara antargatam ca api tat grāhyam ubhayoḥ api

original: upāyaiś codyamānas tu na dadyād uttaraṃ tu yaḥ /
analyzed: upāyaiḥ codyamānaḥ tu na dadyāt uttaram tu yaḥ

original: atikrānte saptarātre jito 'sau dātum arhati // K_194 //
analyzed: atikrānte saptarātre jitaḥ sau dātum arhati

original: śrāvayitvā yathākāryaṃ tyajed anyad vaded asau /
analyzed: śrāvayitvā yathākāryam tyajet anyat vadet asau

original: anyapakṣāśrayas tena kṛto vādī sa hīyate // K_195 //
analyzed: anya pakṣa āśrayaḥ tena kṛtaḥ vādī sa hīyate

original: na mayābhihitaṃ kāryam abhiyujya paraṃ vadet /
analyzed: na mayā abhihitam kāryam abhiyujya param vadet

original: vibruvaṃś ca bhaved evaṃ hīnaṃ tam api nirdiśet // K_196 //
analyzed: vibruvan ca bhavet evam hīnam tam api nirdiśet

original: lekhayitvā tu yo vākyaṃṃ hīnaṃ vāpy adhikaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: lekhayitvā tu yaḥ vākyam hīnam vā api adhikam punar

original: vaded vādī sa hīyeta nābhiyogaṃ tu so 'rhati // K_197 //
analyzed: vadet vādī sa hīyeta na abhiyogam tu saḥ rhati

original: sabhyāś ca sākṣiṇaś caiva kriyā jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: sabhyāḥ ca sākṣiṇaḥ ca eva kriyā jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ

original: tāṃ kriyāṃ dveṣṭi yo mohāt kriyādveṣī sa ucyate // K_198 //
analyzed: tām kriyām dveṣṭi yaḥ mohāt kriyā dveṣī saḥ ucyate

original: āhvānād anupasthānāt sadya eva prahīyate // K_199 //
analyzed: āhvānāt an upasthānāt sadyas eva prahīyate

original: brūhīt yukto 'pi na brūyāt sadyo bandhanam arhati /
analyzed: brūhīt yuktaḥ pi na brūyāt sadyas bandhanam arhati

original: dvitīye 'hani durbuddher vidyāt tasya parājayam // K_200 //
analyzed: dvitīye hani durbuddheḥ vidyāt tasya parājayam

original: vyājenaiva tu yatrāsau dīrghakālam abhīpsati /
analyzed: vyājena eva tu yatra asau dīrgha kālam abhīpsati

original: sāpadeśaṃ tu tad vidyād vādahānikaraṃ smṛtam // K_201 //
analyzed: sa apadeśam tu tat vidyāt vāda hāni karam smṛtam

original: anyavādī paṇān pañca kriyādveṣī paṇān daśa /
analyzed: anya vādī paṇān pañca kriyā dveṣī paṇān daśa

original: nopasthātā daśa dvau ca ṣoḍaśaiva niruttaraḥ /
analyzed: na upasthātā daśa dvau ca ṣoḍaśa eva niruttaraḥ

original: āhūtaprapalāyī ca paṇān grāhyas tu viṃśatim // K_202 //
analyzed: āhūta prapalāyī ca paṇān grāhyaḥ tu viṃśatim

original: trir āhūtam anāyāntam āhūtaprapalāyinam /
analyzed: tris āhūtam an āyāntam āhūta prapalāyinam

original: pañcarātram atikrāntaṃ vinayet taṃ mahīpatiḥ // K_203 //
analyzed: pañca rātram atikrāntam vinayet tam mahīpatiḥ

original: śrāvitavyavahārāṇām ekaṃ yatra prabhedayet /
analyzed: śrāvita vyavahārāṇām ekam yatra prabhedayet

original: vādinaṃ lobhayec caiva hīnaṃ tam iti nirdiśet // K_204 //
analyzed: vādinam lobhayet ca eva hīnam tam iti nirdiśet

original: bhayaṃ karoti bhedaṃ vā bhīṣaṇaṃ vā nirodhanam /
analyzed: bhayam karoti bhedam vā bhīṣaṇam vā nirodhanam

original: etāni vādinor arthasya vyavahāre sa hīyate // K_205 //
analyzed: etāni vādinoḥ arthasya vyavahāre sa hīyate

original: doṣānurūpaṃ saṃgrāhyaḥ punarvādo na vidyate /
analyzed: doṣa anurūpam saṃgrāhyaḥ punar vādaḥ na vidyate

original: ubhayor likhite vācye prārabdhe kāryaniścaye /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ likhite vācye prārabdhe kārya niścaye

original: ayuktaṃ tatra yo brūyāt tasmād arthāt sa hīyate // K_206 //
analyzed: ayuktam tatra yaḥ brūyāt tasmāt arthāt sa hīyate

original: sākṣiṇo yas tu nirdiśya kāmato na vivādayet /
analyzed: sākṣiṇaḥ yaḥ tu nirdiśya kāmataḥ na vivādayet

original: sa vādī hīyate tasmāt triṃśadrātrāt pareṇa tu // K_207 //
analyzed: sa vādī hīyate tasmāt triṃśat rātrāt pareṇa tu

original: palāyanānuttaratvād anyapakṣāśrayeṇa ca /
analyzed: palāyana anuttara tvāt anya pakṣa āśrayeṇa ca

original: hīnasya gṛhyate vādo na svavākyajitasya tu // K_208 //
analyzed: hīnasya gṛhyate vādaḥ na sva vākya jitasya tu

original: yo hīnavākyena jitas tasyoddhāraṃ vidur budhāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ hīna vākyena jitaḥ tasya uddhāram viduḥ budhāḥ

original: svavākyahīno yas tu syāt tasyoddhāro na vidyate // K_209 //
analyzed: sva vākya hīnaḥ yaḥ tu syāt tasya uddhāraḥ na vidyate

original: āvedya pragṛhītārthāḥ praśamaṃ yānti ye mithaḥ /
analyzed: āvedya pragṛhīta arthāḥ praśamam yānti ye mithas

original: sarve dviguṇadaṇḍyāḥ syuḥ vipralambhān nṛpasya te // K_210 //
analyzed: sarve dviguṇa daṇḍyāḥ syuḥ vipralambhāt nṛpasya te

original: [kriyāpādaḥ]
analyzed: kriyā pādaḥ

original: kāraṇāt pūrvapakṣo 'pi hy uttaratvaṃ prapadyate /
analyzed: kāraṇāt pūrvapakṣaḥ u pi hi uttara tvam prapadyate

original: ataḥ kriyā tadā proktā pūrvapakṣaprasādhinī // K_211 //
analyzed: atas kriyā tadā proktā pūrvapakṣa prasādhinī

original: śodhite likhite samyag iti nirdoṣa uttare /
analyzed: śodhite likhite samyak iti nirdoṣe uttare

original: pratyarthino 'rthino vāpi kriyākaraṇam iṣyate // K_212 //
analyzed: pratyarthinaḥ rthinaḥ vā api kriyā karaṇam iṣyate

original: vādinā yad abhipretaṃ svayaṃ sādhayitum sphuṭam /
analyzed: vādinā yat abhipretam svayam sādhayitum sphuṭam

original: tat sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ yena tat sādhyaṃ sādhyate 'khilam // K_213 //
analyzed: tat sādhyam sādhanam yena tat sādhyam sādhyate khilam

original: [pramāṇāni, teṣāṃ ca balābalādivicāraḥ]
analyzed: pramāṇāni teṣām ca bala abala ādi vicāraḥ

original: likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: likhitam sākṣiṇaḥ bhuktiḥ pramāṇam trividham viduḥ

original: leśoddeśas tu yuktiḥ syād divyānīha viṣādayaḥ // K_214 //
analyzed: leśa uddeśaḥ tu yuktiḥ syāt divyāni iha viṣa ādayaḥ

original: pūrvavāde 'pi likhite yathākṣaram aśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: pūrva vāde pi likhite yathākṣaram aśeṣatas

original: arthī tṛtīyapāde tu kriyayā pratipādayet // K_215 //
analyzed: arthī tṛtīya pāde tu kriyayā pratipādayet

original: kāryaṃ hi sādhyam ity uktaṃ sādhanaṃ tu kriyocyate /
analyzed: kāryam hi sādhyam iti uktam sādhanam tu kriyā ucyate

original: dvibhedā sā punarjñeyā daivikī mānuṣī tathā /
analyzed: dvi bhedā sā punar jñeyā daivikī mānuṣī tathā

original: mānuṣī likhyasākṣyādir vadhādir daivikī matā // K_216 //
analyzed: mānuṣī vadha ādiḥ daivikī matā

original: saṃbhave sākṣiṇāṃ prājño daivikīṃ varjayet kriyāṃ /
analyzed: saṃbhave sākṣiṇām prājñaḥ daivikīm varjayet kriyām

original: saṃbhave tu prayuñjāno daivikīṃ hīyate tataḥ // K_217 //
analyzed: saṃbhave tu prayuñjānaḥ daivikīm hīyate tatas

original: yady eko mānuṣīṃ brūyād anyo brūyāt tu daivikīm /
analyzed: yadi ekaḥ mānuṣīm brūyāt anyaḥ brūyāt tu daivikīm

original: mānuṣīṃ tatra gṛhṇīyān na tu daivīṃ kriyāṃ nṛpaḥ // K_218 //
analyzed: mānuṣīm tatra gṛhṇīyāt na tu daivīm kriyām nṛpaḥ

original: yady ekadeśavyāptāpi kriyā vidyeta mānuṣī /
analyzed: yadi eka deśa vyāptā api kriyā vidyeta mānuṣī

original: sā grāhyā na tu pūrṇāpi daivikī vadatāṃ nṛṇām // K_219 //
analyzed: sā grāhyā na tu pūrṇā api daivikī vadatām nṛṇām

original: pañcaprakāraṃ daivaṃ syān mānuṣaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam // K_220 //
analyzed: pañca prakāram daivam syāt mānuṣam trividham smṛtam

original: kriyāṃ balavatīṃ muktvā durbalāṃ yo 'valambate /
analyzed: kriyām balavatīm muktvā durbalām yaḥ valambate

original: sa jaye 'vadhṛte sabhyaiḥ punas tāṃ nāpnuyāt kriyām // K_221 //
analyzed: sa jaye vadhṛte sabhyaiḥ punar tām na āpnuyāt kriyām

original: sārabhūtaṃ padaṃ muktvā asārāṇi bahūny api /
analyzed: sāra bhūtam padam muktvā asārāṇi bahūni api

original: saṃsādhayet kriyā yā tu tāṃ jahyāt sāravarjitām /
analyzed: saṃsādhayet kriyā yā tu tām jahyāt sāra varjitām

original: pakṣadvayaṃ sādhayed yā tāṃ jahyād dūrataḥ kriyām // K_222 //
analyzed: pakṣa dvayam sādhayet yā tām jahyāt dūratas kriyām

original: kriyā na daivikī proktā vidyāmāneṣu sākṣiṣu /
analyzed: kriyā na daivikī proktā vidyā māneṣu sākṣiṣu

original: lekhye ca sati vādeṣu na divyaṃ na ca sākṣiṇaḥ // K_223 //
analyzed: lekhye ca sati vādeṣu na divyam na ca sākṣiṇaḥ

original: kālena hīyate lekhyaṃ dūṣitaṃ nyāyatas tathā /
analyzed: kālena hīyate lekhyam dūṣitam nyāyataḥ tathā

original: alekhyasākṣike daivīṃ vyavahāre vinirdiśet /
analyzed: a lekhya sākṣike daivīm vyavahāre vinirdiśet

original: daivasādhye pauruṣeyīṃ na lekhyaṃ vā prayojayet // K_224 //
analyzed: daiva sādhye pauruṣeyīm na lekhyam vā prayojayet

original: pūgaśreṇigaṇādīnāṃ yā sthitiḥ parikīrtitā /
analyzed: pūga śreṇi gaṇa ādīnām yā sthitiḥ parikīrtitā

original: tasyās tu sādhanaṃ lekhyaṃ na divyaṃ na ca sākṣiṇaḥ // K_225 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu sādhanam lekhyam na divyam na ca sākṣiṇaḥ

original: dvāramārgakriyābhoga- jalavāhādike tathā /
analyzed: tathā

original: bhuktir eva hi gurvī syān na lekhyaṃ na ca sākṣiṇaḥ // K_226 //
analyzed: bhuktiḥ eva hi gurvī syāt na lekhyam na ca sākṣiṇaḥ

original: dattādatte 'tha bhṛtyānāṃ svāminā nirṇaye sati /
analyzed: datta ādatte bhṛtyānām svāminā nirṇaye sati

original: vikrayādānasaṃbandhe krītvā dhanam ayacchati // K_227 //
analyzed: vikraya ādāna saṃbandhe krītvā dhanam a yacchati

original: dyūte samāhvaye caiva vivāde samupasthite /
analyzed: dyūte samāhvaye ca eva vivāde samupasthite

original: sākṣiṇaḥ sādhanaṃ proktaṃ na divyaṃ na ca lekhyakam // K_228 //
analyzed: sākṣiṇaḥ sādhanam proktam na divyam na ca lekhyakam

original: prakrānte sāhase vāde pāruṣye daṇḍavācike /
analyzed: prakrānte sāhase vāde pāruṣye daṇḍa vācike

original: balodbhūteṣu kāryeṣu sākṣiṇo divyam eva vā // K_229 //
analyzed: bala udbhūteṣu kāryeṣu sākṣiṇaḥ divyam eva vā

original: gūḍhasāhasikānāṃ tu prāptaṃ divyaiḥ parīkṣaṇam /
analyzed: gūḍha sāhasikānām tu prāptam divyaiḥ parīkṣaṇam

original: yukticihneṅgitākāra- vākcakṣuśceṣṭitair nṛṇām // K_230 //
uttameṣu ca sarveṣu sāhaseṣu vicārayet /
analyzed: uttameṣu ca sarveṣu sāhaseṣu vicārayet

original: sadbhāvaṃ divyadṛṣṭena satsu sākṣiṣu vai bhṛguḥ // K_231 //
analyzed: sadbhāvam divya dṛṣṭena satsu sākṣiṣu vai bhṛguḥ

original: samatvaṃ sākṣiṇāṃ yatra divyais tatrāpi śodhayet /
analyzed: sama tvam sākṣiṇām yatra divyaiḥ tatra api śodhayet

original: prāṇāntikavivādeṣu vidyāmāneṣu sākṣiṣu /
analyzed: prāṇāntika vivādeṣu vidyā māneṣu sākṣiṣu

original: divyam ālambate vādī na pṛcchet tatra sākṣiṇaḥ // K_232 //
analyzed: divyam ālambate vādī na pṛcchet tatra sākṣiṇaḥ

original: ṛṇe lekhyaṃ sākṣiṇo vā yuktileśādayo 'pi vā /
analyzed: ṛṇe lekhyam sākṣiṇaḥ vā yukti leśa ādayaḥ vā

original: daivikī vā kriyā proktā prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā // K_233 //
analyzed: daivikī vā kriyā proktā prajānām hita kāmyayā

original: codanā pratikālaṃ ca yuktileśas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: codanā prati kālam ca yukti leśaḥ tathā eva ca

original: tṛtīyaḥ śapathaḥ proktaḥ tair ṛṇaṃ sādhayet kramāt // K_234 //
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ śapathaḥ proktaḥ taiḥ ṛṇam sādhayet kramāt

original: abhīkṣṇaṃ codyamāno 'pi pratihanyān na tadvacaḥ /
analyzed: abhīkṣṇam codyamānaḥ u pi pratihanyāt na tad vacaḥ

original: triḥ catuḥ pañcakṛtvo vā parato 'rthaṃ samācaret // K_235 //
analyzed: tris catuḥ pañca kṛtvas vā paratas ṛtham samācaret

original: codanāpratighāte tu yuktileśaiḥ samanviyāt /
analyzed: codanā pratighāte tu yukti leśaiḥ

original: deśakālārthasaṃbandha- parimāṇakriyādibhiḥ // K_236 //
analyzed: deśa kāla artha saṃbandha parimāṇa kriyā ādibhiḥ

original: yuktiṣv apy asamarthāsu śapathair eva niṇayet /
analyzed: yuktiṣu api asamarthāsu śapathaiḥ eva niṇayet

original: arthakālabalāpekṣair agnyambusukṛtādibhiḥ // K_237 //
analyzed: artha kāla bala apekṣaiḥ agni ambu sukṛta ādibhiḥ

original: yatra syāt sopadhaṃ lekhyaṃ tadrājñaḥ śrāvitaṃ yadi /
analyzed: yatra syāt sa upadham lekhyam tat rājñaḥ śrāvitam yadi

original: divyena śodhayet tatra rājā dharmāsanasthitaḥ // K_238 //
analyzed: divyena śodhayet tatra rājā dharma āsana sthitaḥ

original: vākpāruṣye ca bhūmau ca divyaṃ na parikalpayet // K_239 //
analyzed: vāc pāruṣye ca bhūmau ca divyam na parikalpayet

original: sthāvareṣu vivādeṣu divyāni paridhārayet /
analyzed: sthāvareṣu vivādeṣu divyāni paridhārayet

original: sākṣibhir likhitenārthe bhuktyā caiva prasādhayet // K_240 //
analyzed: sākṣibhiḥ likhitena arthe bhuktyā ca eva prasādhayet

original: pramāṇair hetunā vāpi divyenaiva tu niścayam /
analyzed: pramāṇaiḥ hetunā vā api divyena eva tu niścayam

original: sarveṣv eva vivādeṣu sadā kuryān narādhipaḥ // K_241 //
analyzed: sarveṣu eva vivādeṣu sadā kuryāt narādhipaḥ

original: likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: likhitam sākṣiṇaḥ bhuktiḥ pramāṇam trividham smṛtam

original: anumānaṃ vidur hetuṃ tarkaṃ caiva manīṣiṇaḥ // K_242 //
analyzed: anumānam viduḥ hetum tarkam ca eva manīṣiṇaḥ

original: pūrvābhāve pareṇaiva nānyathaiva kadācana /
analyzed: pūrva abhāve pareṇa eva na anyathā eva kadācana

original: pramāṇair vādinirdiṣṭair bhuktyā likhitasākṣibhiḥ // K_243 //
analyzed: pramāṇaiḥ vādi nirdiṣṭaiḥ bhuktyāḥ likhita sākṣibhiḥ

original: na kaścid abhiyoktāraṃ divyeṣu viniyojayet /
analyzed: na kaścid abhiyoktāram divyeṣu viniyojayet

original: abhiyuktāya dātavyaṃ divyaṃ divyaviśāradaiḥ // K_244 //
analyzed: abhiyuktāya dātavyam divyam divya viśāradaiḥ

original: mithyoktau sa catuṣpāt syāt pratyavaskandane tathā /
analyzed: mithyā uktau sa catuṣpād syāt pratyavaskandane tathā

original: prāṅnyāye sa ca vijñeyo dvipāt saṃpratipattiṣu // K_245 //
analyzed: prāṅnyāye sa ca vijñeyaḥ dvipāt saṃpratipattiṣu

original: parājayaś ca dvividhaḥ paroktaḥ svokta eva ca /
analyzed: parājayaḥ ca dvividhaḥ para uktaḥ sva uktaḥ eva ca

original: paroktaḥ syād daśavidhaḥ svokta ekavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ // K_246 //
analyzed: para uktaḥ syāt daśavidhaḥ sva uktaḥ ekavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: vivādāntarasaṃkrāntiḥ pūrvottaraviruddhatā /
dūṣaṇaṃ svakriyotpatteḥ paravākyopapādanam // K_247 //
analyzed: dūṣaṇam sva kriyā utpatteḥ para vākya upapādanam

original: anirdeśaś ca deśasya nirdeśo 'deśakālayoḥ /
analyzed: anirdeśaḥ ca deśasya nirdeśaḥ deśa kālayoḥ

original: sākṣiṇām upajāpaś ca vidveṣo vacanasya ca // K_248 //
analyzed: sākṣiṇām upajāpaḥ ca vidveṣaḥ vacanasya ca

original: [lekhyam]
analyzed: lekhyam

original: lekhyaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ svahastānyakṛtaṃ tathā /
analyzed: lekhyam tu dvividham proktam sva hasta anya kṛtam tathā

original: asākṣimatsākṣimac ca siddhir deśasthites tayoḥ // K_249 //
analyzed: ca siddhiḥ deśa sthiteḥ tayoḥ

original: grāhakeṇa svahastena likhitaṃ sākṣivarajitam /
analyzed: grāhakeṇa sva hastena likhitam sākṣi vara jitam

original: svahastalekhyaṃ vijñeyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatsmṛtaṃ budhaiḥ // K_250 //
analyzed: sva hasta lekhyam vijñeyam pramāṇam tat smṛtam budhaiḥ

original: utpattijātisaṃjñāṃ ca dhanasaṃkhyāṃ ca lekhayet /
analyzed: utpatti jāti saṃjñām ca dhana saṃkhyām ca lekhayet

original: smaraty evaṃ prayuktasya naśyed arthas tv alekhitaḥ // K_251 //
analyzed: smarati evam prayuktasya naśyet arthaḥ tu a lekhitaḥ

original: lekhyaṃ tu sākṣimatkāryam aviluptākṣarakramam /
analyzed: lekhyam tu sākṣimat kāryam avilupta akṣara kramam

original: deśācārasthitiyutaṃ samagraṃ sarvavastuṣu // K_252 //
analyzed: deśa ācāra sthiti yutam samagram sarva vastuṣu

original: varṇavākyakriyāyuktam asaṃdigdhaṃ sphuṭākṣaram /
analyzed: varṇa vākya kriyā yuktam asaṃdigdham sphuṭa akṣaram

original: ahīnakramacihnaṃ ca lekhyaṃ tat siddhim āpnuyāt // K_253 //
analyzed: ahīna krama cihnam ca lekhyam tat siddhim āpnuyāt

original: cātruvidyapuraśreṇī- gaṇapaurādikasthitiḥ /
tatsidhyarthaṃ tu yal lekhyaṃ tad bhavet sthitipatrakam // K_254 //
analyzed: tad sidhi artham tu yat lekhyam tat bhavet sthitipatrakam

original: abhiśāpe samuttīrṇe prāyaścitte kṛte janaiḥ /
analyzed: abhiśāpe samuttīrṇe prāyaścitte kṛte janaiḥ

original: viśuddhipatrakaṃ jñeyaṃ tebhyaḥ sākṣisamanvitam // K_255 //
analyzed: viśuddhi patrakam jñeyam tebhyaḥ sākṣi samanvitam

original: uttameṣu samasteṣu abhiśāpe samāgate /
analyzed: uttameṣu samasteṣu abhiśāpe samāgate

original: vṛttānuvādalekhyaṃ yat taj jñeyaṃ sandhipatrakam // K_256 //
analyzed: vṛtta anuvāda lekhyam yat tat jñeyam sandhipatrakam

original: sīmāvivāde nirṇīte sīmāpatraṃ vidhīyate // K_257 //
analyzed: sīmā vivāde nirṇīte sīmā patram vidhīyate

original: rājñaḥ svahastasaṃyuktaṃ samudrācihnitaṃ tathā /
analyzed: rājñaḥ sva hasta saṃyuktam sa mudrā cihnitam tathā

original: rājakīyaṃ smṛtaṃ lekhyaṃ sarveṣv artheṣu sākṣimat // K_258 //
analyzed: rājakīyam smṛtam lekhyam sarveṣu artheṣu sākṣimat

original: arthipratyarthivākyāni pratijñā sākṣivāk tathā /
analyzed: arthi pratyarthi vākyāni pratijñā sākṣi vāc tathā

original: nirṇayaś ca yathā tasya yathā cāvadhṛtaṃ svayam // K_259 //
analyzed: nirṇayaḥ ca yathā tasya yathā ca avadhṛtam svayam

original: etad yathākṣaraṃ lekhye yathāpūrvaṃ niveśayet /
analyzed: etat yathākṣaram lekhye yathāpūrvam niveśayet

original: abhiyoktṛabhiyuktānāṃ vacanaṃ prāṅ niveśayet // K_260 //
analyzed: abhiyoktṛ abhiyuktānām vacanam prāk niveśayet

original: sabhyānāṃ prāḍvivākasya kulānāṃ vā tataḥ param /
analyzed: sabhyānām prāḍvivākasya kulānām vā tatas param

original: niścayaṃ smṛtiśāstrasya mataṃ tatraiva lekhayet // K_261 //
analyzed: niścayam smṛti śāstrasya matam tatra eva lekhayet

original: siddhenārthena saṃyojyo vādī satkārapūrvakam /
analyzed: siddhena arthena saṃyojyaḥ vādī satkāra pūrvakam

original: lekhyaṃ svahastasaṃyuktaṃ tasmai dadyāt tu pārthivaḥ // K_262 //
analyzed: lekhyam sva hasta saṃyuktam tasmai dadyāt tu pārthivaḥ

original: sabhāsadaś ca ye tatra smṛtiśāstravidaḥ sthitāḥ /
analyzed: sabhāsadaḥ ca ye tatra smṛti śāstra vidaḥ sthitāḥ

original: yathālekhyavidhhau tadvat svahastaṃ tatra dāpayet // K_263 //
analyzed: yathā ālekhya vidhhau tadvat sva hastam tatra dāpayet

original: anena vidhinā lekhyaṃ paścātkāraṃ vidur budhāḥ /
analyzed: anena vidhinā lekhyam paścātkāram viduḥ budhāḥ

original: nirastā tu kriyā yatra pramāṇenaiva vādinā /
analyzed: nirastā tu kriyā yatra pramāṇena eva vādinā

original: paścātkāro bhavet tatra na sarvāsu vidhīyate // K_264 //
analyzed: paścātkāraḥ bhavet tatra na sarvāsu vidhīyate

original: anyavādīādihīnebhya itareṣāṃ pradīyate /
analyzed: anya vādī ādi hīnebhyaḥ itareṣām pradīyate

original: vṛttānuvādasaṃsiddhaṃ tac ca syāj jayapatrakam // K_265 //
analyzed: vṛtta anuvāda saṃsiddham tat ca syāt jaya patrakam

original: [lekhyaparīkṣā]
analyzed: lekhya parīkṣā

original: rājājñayā samāhūya yathānyāyaṃ vicārayet /
analyzed: rājā ājñayā samāhūya yathānyāyam vicārayet

original: lekhyācāreṇa likhitaṃ sākṣyācāreṇa sākṣiṇaḥ // K_266 //
analyzed: lekhya ācāreṇa likhitam sākṣi ācāreṇa sākṣiṇaḥ

original: varṇavākyakriyāyuktam asaṃdigdhaṃ sphuṭākṣaram /
analyzed: varṇa vākya kriyā yuktam asaṃdigdham sphuṭa akṣaram

original: ahīnakramacihnaṃ ca lekhyaṃ tatsiddhim āpnuyāt // K_267 //
analyzed: ahīna krama cihnam ca lekhyam tat siddhim āpnuyāt

original: deśācārayutaṃ varṣam āsapakṣādivṛddhimat /
analyzed: deśa ācāra yutam varṣam āsa pakṣa ādi vṛddhimat

original: ṛṇisākṣilekhakānām hastāṅgam lekhyam ucyate // K_268 //
analyzed: ṛṇi sākṣi lekhakānām hasta aṅgam lekhyam ucyate

original: sthānabhraṣṭās tv apaṅktisthāḥ saṃdigdhā lakṣaṇacyutāḥ /
analyzed: sthāna bhraṣṭāḥ tu a paṅkti sthāḥ saṃdigdhāḥ lakṣaṇa cyutāḥ

original: yadā tu saṃsthitā varṇāḥ kūṭalekhyaṃ tadā bhavet // K_269 //
analyzed: yadā tu saṃsthitāḥ varṇāḥ kūṭa lekhyam tadā bhavet

original: deśācāraviruddhaṃ yat saṃdigdhaṃ kramavarjitam /
analyzed: deśa ācāra viruddham yat saṃdigdham krama varjitam

original: kṛtam asvāminā yac ca sādhyahīnaṃ ca duṣyati // K_270 //
analyzed: kṛtam asvāminā yat ca sādhya hīnam ca duṣyati

original: mattenopādhibhītena tathonmattena pīḍitaiḥ /
analyzed: mattena upādhi bhītena tathā unmattena pīḍitaiḥ

original: strībhir bālāsvatantraiś ca kṛtaṃ lekhyaṃ na sidhyati // K_271 //
analyzed: strībhiḥ bāla asvatantraiḥ ca kṛtam lekhyam na sidhyati

original: khyāpitaṃ ced dvitīye 'hni na kaścid vinivartayet /
analyzed: khyāpitam ced dvitīye hni na kaścid vinivartayet

original: tathā tat syāt pramāṇaṃ tu mattonmattakṛtād ṛte // K_272 //
analyzed: tathā tat syāt pramāṇam tu matta unmatta kṛtāt ṛte

original: sākṣidoṣād bhaved duṣṭaṃ patraṃ vai lekhakasya vā /
analyzed: sākṣi doṣāt bhavet duṣṭam patram vai lekhakasya vā

original: dhanikasyopadhādoṣāt tathā dhāraṇikasya vā // K_273 //
analyzed: dhanikasya upadhā doṣāt tathā dhāraṇikasya vā

original: duṣṭair duṣṭaṃ bhavel lekhyaṃ śuddhaṃ śuddhair vinirdiśet /
analyzed: duṣṭaiḥ duṣṭam bhavet lekhyam śuddham śuddhaiḥ vinirdiśet

original: tat patram upadhāduṣṭaiḥ sākṣilekhakakārakaiḥ // K_274 //
analyzed: tat patram upadhā duṣṭaiḥ sākṣi lekhaka kārakaiḥ

original: pramāṇasya hi ye doṣā vaktavyās te vivādinā /
analyzed: pramāṇasya hi ye doṣāḥ vaktavyāḥ te vivādinā

original: gūḍhās tu prakaṭāḥ sabhyaiḥ kāle śāstrapradarśanāt // K_275 //
analyzed: gūḍhāḥ tu prakaṭāḥ sabhyaiḥ kāle śāstra pradarśanāt

original: sākṣilekhakakartāraḥ kūṭatāṃ yānti te yathā /
analyzed: sākṣi lekhaka kartāraḥ kūṭa tām yānti te yathā

original: tathā doṣāḥ prayoktavyā duṣṭair lekhyaṃ praduṣyāta // K_276 //
analyzed: tathā doṣāḥ prayoktavyāḥ duṣṭaiḥ lekhyam praduṣyāta

original: na lekhakena likhitaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ sākṣibhis tathā /
analyzed: na lekhakena likhitam na dṛṣṭam sākṣibhiḥ tathā

original: evaṃ pratyarthinokte tu kūṭalekhyaṃ prakīrtitam // K_277 //
analyzed: evam pratyarthinā ukte tu kūṭa lekhyam prakīrtitam

original: nātathyena pramāṇaṃ tu doṣeṇaiva tu dūṣayet /
analyzed: na atathyena pramāṇam tu doṣeṇa eva tu dūṣayet

original: mithyābhiyoge daṇḍyaḥ syāt sādhyārthāc cāpi hīyate // K_278 //
analyzed: mithyā abhiyoge daṇḍyaḥ syāt sādhya arthāt ca api hīyate

original: evaṃ duṣṭaṃ nṛpasthāne yasmiṃs tad dhi vicāryate /
analyzed: evam duṣṭam nṛpa sthāne yasmin tat hi vicāryate

original: vimṛśya brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ patradoṣān nirūpayet // K_279 //
analyzed: vimṛśya brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdham patra doṣān nirūpayet

original: yena te kūṭatāṃ yānti sākṣilekhakakārakāḥ /
analyzed: yena te kūṭa tām yānti sākṣi lekhaka kārakāḥ

original: tena duṣṭaṃ bhavel lekhyaṃ śuddhaiḥ śuddhiṃ vinirdiśet // K_280 //
analyzed: tena duṣṭam bhavet lekhyam śuddhaiḥ śuddhim vinirdiśet

original: dhanikena svahastena likhitaṃ sākṣivarjitam /
analyzed: dhanikena sva hastena likhitam sākṣi varjitam

original: bhavet kūṭaṃ na cet kartā kṛtaṃ hīti vibhāvayet // K_281 //
analyzed: bhavet kūṭam na ced kartā kṛtam hi iti vibhāvayet

original: dattaṃ lekhye svahastaṃ tu ṛṇiko yadi nihnate /
analyzed: dattam lekhye sva hastam tu ṛṇikaḥ yadi nihnate

original: patrasthaiḥ sākṣibhir vācyo lekhakasya matena vā // K_282 //
analyzed: patra sthaiḥ sākṣibhiḥ vācyaḥ lekhakasya matena vā

original: kṛtākṛtavivādeṣu sākṣibhiḥ patranirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: kṛta akṛta vivādeṣu sākṣibhiḥ patra nirṇayaḥ

original: dūṣite patrake vādī tadārūḍhāṃs tu nirdiśet // K_283 //
analyzed: dūṣite patrake vādī tad ārūḍhān tu nirdiśet

original: trividhasyāpi lekhyasya bhrāntiḥ sañjāyate nṛṇām /
analyzed: trividhasya api lekhyasya bhrāntiḥ sañjāyate nṛṇām

original: ṛṇisākṣilekhakānāṃ hastoktyā sādhayet tataḥ // K_284 //
analyzed: ṛṇi sākṣi lekhakānām hasta uktyā sādhayet tatas

original: atha pañcatvam āpanno lekhakaḥ saha sākṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: atha pañcatvam āpannaḥ lekhakaḥ saha sākṣibhiḥ

original: tatsvahastādibhis teṣāṃ viśudhyet tu na saṃśayaḥ // K_285 //
analyzed: tad sva hasta ādibhiḥ teṣām viśudhyet tu na saṃśayaḥ

original: ṛṇisvahastasaṃdehe jīvato vā mṛtasya vā /
analyzed: ṛṇi sva hasta saṃdehe jīvataḥ vā mṛtasya vā

original: tatsvahastakṛtair anyaiḥ patrais tallekhyanirṇayaḥ // K_286 //
analyzed: tad sva hasta kṛtaiḥ anyaiḥ patraiḥ tad lekhya nirṇayaḥ

original: samudre 'pi lekhye mṛtāḥ sarve 'pi te sthitāḥ (?) /
analyzed: sa mudre pi lekhye mṛtāḥ sarve pi te sthitāḥ

original: likhitaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ tu mṛteṣv api hi teṣu ca // K_287 //
analyzed: likhitam tat pramāṇam tu mṛteṣu api hi teṣu ca

original: pratyakṣam anumānena na kadācit prabādhyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣam anumānena na kadācid prabādhyate

original: tasmāl lekhyasya duṣṭasya vacobhiḥ sākṣiṇāṃ bhavet // K_288 //
analyzed: tasmāt lekhyasya duṣṭasya vacobhiḥ sākṣiṇām bhavet

original: nirṇayaḥ svadhanārthaṃ hi patraṃ dūṣayati svayam /
analyzed: nirṇayaḥ sva dhana artham hi patram dūṣayati svayam

original: likhitaṃ likhitenaiva sākṣimatsākṣibhir haret // K_289 //
analyzed: likhitam likhitena eva sākṣimat sākṣibhiḥ haret

original: kūṭoktau sākṣiṇāṃ vākyāl lekhakasya ca patrakam /
analyzed: kūṭa uktau sākṣiṇām vākyāt lekhakasya ca patrakam

original: nayec chuddhiṃ na yaḥ kūṭaṃ sa dāpyo damam uttamam // K_290 //
analyzed: nayet śuddhim na yaḥ kūṭam sa dāpyaḥ damam uttamam

original: āḍhyasya nikaṭasthasya yac chaktena na yācitam /
analyzed: āḍhyasya nikaṭa sthasya yat śaktena na yācitam

original: śuddharṇaśaṅkayā tat tu lekhyaṃ durbalatām iyāt // K_291 //
analyzed: śuddha ṛṇa śaṅkayā tat tu lekhyam durbala tām iyāt

original: lekhyaṃ triṃśatsamātītam adṛṣṭāśrāvitaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: lekhyam triṃśat samā atītam a dṛṣṭa a śrāvitam ca yat

original: na tat siddhim avāpnoti tiṣṭhatsv api hi sākṣiṣu // K_292 //
analyzed: na tat siddhim avāpnoti tiṣṭhatsu api hi sākṣiṣu

original: prayukte śāntalābhe tu likhitaṃ yo na darśayet /
analyzed: prayukte śānta lābhe tu likhitam yaḥ na darśayet

original: naiva yāceta ṛṇikaṃ na tat siddhim avāpnuyāt // K_293 //
analyzed: na eva yāceta ṛṇikam na tat siddhim avāpnuyāt

original: paścāt kāranibaddhaṃ yat tad yatnena vicārayet /
analyzed: paścāt kāra nibaddham yat tat yatnena vicārayet

original: yadi syād yuktiyuktaṃ tu pramāṇaṃ likhitaṃ tadā // K_294 //
analyzed: yadi syāt yukti yuktam tu pramāṇam likhitam tadā

original: anyathā dūrataḥ kāryaṃ punar eva vinirṇayet /
analyzed: anyathā dūratas kāryam punar eva vinirṇayet

original: atathyaṃ tathyabhāvena sthāpitaṃ jñānavibhramāt /
analyzed: atathyam tathya bhāvena sthāpitam jñāna vibhramāt

original: nivartyaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ syād yatnenāpi kṛtaṃ nṛpaiḥ // K_295 //
analyzed: nivartyam tat pramāṇam syāt yatnena api kṛtam nṛpaiḥ

original: mudrāśuddhaṃ kriyāśuddhaṃ bhuktiśuddhaṃ sacihnakam /
analyzed: mudrā śuddham kriyā śuddham bhukti śuddham sa cihnakam

original: rājñaḥ svahastasaṃśuddhaṃ śuddhim āyāti śāsanam // K_296 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ sva hasta saṃśuddham śuddhim āyāti śāsanam

original: nirdoṣaṃ prathitaṃ yat tu lekhyaṃ tat siddhim āpnuyāt // K_297 //
analyzed: nirdoṣam prathitam yat tu lekhyam tat siddhim āpnuyāt

original: dṛṣṭe patre sphuṭān doṣān noktav ānṛṇiko yadi /
analyzed: dṛṣṭe patre sphuṭān doṣān na uktau ānṛṇikaḥ yadi

original: tato viṃśativarṣāṇi sthitaṃ patraṃ sthiraṃ bhavet // K_298 //
analyzed: tatas viṃśati varṣāṇi sthitam patram sthiram bhavet

original: śaktasya saṃnidhāv arthe yena lekhyena bhujyate /
analyzed: śaktasya saṃnidhau arthe yena lekhyena bhujyate

original: varṣāṇi viṃśatiṃ yāvat tat patraṃ doṣavarjitam // K_299 //
analyzed: varṣāṇi viṃśatim yāvat tat patram doṣa varjitam

original: atha viṃśativarṣāṇi ādhir bhuktaḥ suniścitam /
analyzed: atha viṃśati varṣāṇi ādhiḥ bhuktaḥ su niścitam

original: tena lekhyena tat siddhir lekhyadoṣavivarjitā // K_300 //
analyzed: tena lekhyena tat siddhiḥ lekhya doṣa vivarjitā

original: sīmāvivāde nirṇīte sīmāpatraṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: sīmā vivāde nirṇīte sīmā patram vidhīyate

original: tasya doṣāḥ pravaktavyā yāvad varṣāṇi viṃśatiḥ // K_301 //
analyzed: tasya doṣāḥ pravaktavyāḥ yāvat varṣāṇi viṃśatiḥ

original: ādhānasahitaṃ yatra ṛṇaṃ lekhye niveśitam /
analyzed: ādhāna sahitam yatra ṛṇam lekhye niveśitam

original: mṛtasākṣi pramāṇaṃ tu svalpabhogeṣu tadviduḥ // K_302 //
analyzed: mṛta sākṣi pramāṇam tu su alpa bhogeṣu tat viduḥ

original: prāptaṃ vānena cet kiñcid dānaṃ cāpy anirūpitam /
analyzed: prāptam vā anena ced kiñcid dānam ca api anirūpitam

original: vināpi mudrayā lekhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ mṛtasākṣikam // K_303 //
analyzed: vinā api mudrayā lekhyam pramāṇam mṛta sākṣikam

original: yadi labdhaṃ bhavet kiñcit prajñaptir vā kṛtā bhavet /
analyzed: yadi labdham bhavet kiñcid prajñaptiḥ vā kṛtā bhavet

original: pramāṇam eva likhitaṃ mṛtā yady api sākṣiṇaḥ // K_304 //
analyzed: pramāṇam eva likhitam mṛtāḥ yadi api sākṣiṇaḥ

original: darśitaṃ pratikālaṃ yad grāhitaṃ smāritaṃ tathā /
analyzed: darśitam prati kālam yat grāhitam smāritam tathā

original: lekhyaṃ sidhyati sarvatra mṛteṣv api ca sākṣiṣu // K_305 //
analyzed: lekhyam sidhyati sarvatra mṛteṣu api ca sākṣiṣu

original: na divyaiḥ sākṣibhir vāpi hīyate likhitaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: na divyaiḥ sākṣibhiḥ vā api hīyate likhitam kvacid

original: lekhyadharmaḥ sadā śreṣṭho hy ato nānyena hīyate // K_306 //
analyzed: lekhya dharmaḥ sadā śreṣṭhaḥ hi atas na anyena hīyate

original: tadyuktapratilekhyena tadviśiṣṭena vā sadā /
analyzed: tad yukta pratilekhyena tad viśiṣṭena vā sadā

original: lekhyakriyā nirasyeta nirasyānyena na kvacit // K_307 //
analyzed: lekhya kriyā nirasyeta nirasya anyena na kvacid

original: darpaṇasthaṃ yathā bimbam asatsad iva dṛśyate /
analyzed: darpaṇa stham yathā bimbam asat sat iva dṛśyate

original: tathā lekhyasya bimbāni kurvanti kuśalā janāḥ // K_308 //
analyzed: tathā lekhyasya bimbāni kurvanti kuśalāḥ janāḥ

original: dravyaṃ gṛhītvā yal lekhyaṃ parasmai saṃpradīyate /
analyzed: dravyam gṛhītvā yat lekhyam parasmai saṃpradīyate

original: channam anyena cārūḍhaṃ saṃyataṃ cānyaveśmani // K_309 //
analyzed: channam anyena ca ārūḍham saṃyatam ca anya veśmani

original: datte vṛtte 'tha vā dravye kvacillikhitapūrvake /
analyzed: datte vṛtte vā dravye kvacid likhita pūrvake

original: eṣa eva vidhir jñeyo lekhyaśuddhivinirṇaye // K_310 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ jñeyaḥ lekhya śuddhi vinirṇaye

original: sthāvare vikrayādhāne lekhyaṃ kūṭaṃ karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: sthāvare vikraya ādhāne lekhyam kūṭam karoti yaḥ

original: sa samyagbhāvitaḥ kāryo jihvāpāṇyaṅghrivarjitaḥ // K_311 //
analyzed: sa samyak bhāvitaḥ kāryaḥ jihvā pāṇi aṅghri varjitaḥ

original: malair yad bheditaṃ dagdhaṃ chidritaṃ vītam eva vā /
analyzed: malaiḥ yat bheditam dagdham chidritam vītam eva vā

original: tad anyat kārayel lekhyaṃ svedenollikhitaṃ tathā // K_312 //
analyzed: tat anyat kārayet lekhyam svedena ullikhitam tathā

original: [bhuktiḥ]
analyzed: bhuktiḥ

original: likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇatrayam iṣyate /
analyzed: likhitam sākṣiṇaḥ bhuktiḥ pramāṇa trayam iṣyate

original: pramāṇeṣu smṛtā bhukteḥ sal lekhasamatā nṛṇām // K_313 //
analyzed: pramāṇeṣu smṛtā bhukteḥ sat lekha sama tā nṛṇām

original: rathyānirgamanadvāra- jalavāhādisaṃśaye /
analyzed: rathyā nirgamana dvāra jala vāha ādi saṃśaye

original: bhuktir eva tu gurvī syāt pramāṇeṣv iti niścayaḥ // K_314 //
analyzed: bhuktiḥ eva tu gurvī syāt pramāṇeṣu iti niścayaḥ

original: anumānād guruḥ sakṣī sākṣibhyo likhitaṃ guru /
analyzed: anumānāt guruḥ sakṣī sākṣibhyaḥ likhitam guru

original: avyāhatā tripuruṣī bhuktir ebhyo garīyasī // K_315 //
analyzed: avyāhatā tripuruṣī bhuktiḥ ebhyaḥ garīyasī

original: nopabhoge balaṃ kāryam āhartrā tatsutena vā /
analyzed: na upabhoge balam kāryam āhartrā tad sutena vā

original: paśustrīpuruṣādīnām iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ // K_316 //
analyzed: paśu strī puruṣa ādīnām iti dharmaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: bhuktis tu dvividhā proktā sāgamānāgamā tathā /
analyzed: bhuktiḥ tu dvividhā proktā sa āgamā anāgamā tathā

original: tripuruṣī yā svatantrā sā ced alpā tu sāgamā // K_317 //
analyzed: tripuruṣī yā svatantrā sā ced alpā tu sa āgamā

original: mukhyā paitāmahī bhuktiḥ paitṛkī cāpi saṃmatā /
analyzed: mukhyā paitāmahī bhuktiḥ paitṛkī ca api saṃmatā

original: tribhir etair avicchinnā sthirā ṣaṣṭyābdikī matā // K_318 //
analyzed: tribhiḥ etaiḥ avicchinnā sthirā ṣaṣṭyābdikī matā

original: sāgamena tu bhuktena samyagbhuktaṃ yadā tu yat /
analyzed: sa āgamena tu bhuktena samyak bhuktam yadā tu yat

original: āhartā labhate tat tu nāpahāryaṃ tu tat kvacit // K_319 //
analyzed: āhartā labhate tat tu na apahāryam tu tat kvacid

original: pranaṣṭāgamalekhyena bhogārūḍhena vādinā /
analyzed: pranaṣṭa āgama lekhyena bhoga ārūḍhena vādinā

original: kālaḥ pramāṇaṃ dānaṃ ca kīrtanīyāni saṃsadi // K_320 //
analyzed: kālaḥ pramāṇam dānam ca kīrtanīyāni saṃsadi

original: smārtakāle kriyā bhūmeḥ sāgamā bhuktir iṣyate /
analyzed: smārta kāle kriyā bhūmeḥ sa āgamā bhuktiḥ iṣyate

original: asmārte 'nugamābhāvāt kramāt tripuruṣāgatā // K_321 //
analyzed: asmārte nugama abhāvāt kramāt tri puruṣa āgatā

original: ādau tu kāraṇaṃ madhye bhuktis tu sāgamā (?) /
analyzed: ādau tu kāraṇam madhye bhuktiḥ tu sa āgamā

original: kāraṇaṃ bhuktir evaikā saṃtatā yā tripauruṣī // K_322 //
analyzed: kāraṇam bhuktiḥ evā ekā saṃtatā yā tri pauruṣī

original: āhartā bhuktiyukto 'pi lekhyadoṣān viśodhayet /
analyzed: āhartā lekhya doṣān viśodhayet

original: tatsuto bhuktidoṣāṃs tu lekhyadoṣāṃs tu nāpnuyāt // K_323 //
analyzed: tad sutaḥ bhukti doṣān tu lekhya doṣān tu na āpnuyāt

original: yenopāttaṃ hi yad dravyaṃ so 'bhiyuktas tad uddharet /
analyzed: yena upāttam hi yat dravyam saḥ abhiyuktaḥ tat uddharet

original: cirakālopabhoge 'pi bhuktis tasyaiva neṣyate // K_324 //
analyzed: cira kāla upabhoge bhuktiḥ tasya eva na iṣyate

original: cirantanam avijñātaṃ bhogaṃ lobhān na cālayet // K_325 //
analyzed: cirantanam a vijñātam bhogam lobhāt na cālayet

original: pitrā bhuktaṃ tu yad dravyaṃ bhuktyācāreṇa dharmataḥ /
analyzed: pitrā bhuktam tu yat dravyam bhukti ācāreṇa dharmataḥ

original: tasmin prete na vācyo 'sau bhuktyā prāptaṃ hi tasya tat // K_326 //
analyzed: tasmin prete na vācyā u sau bhuktyā prāptam hi tasya tat

original: tribhir eva tu yā bhuktā puruṣair bhū yathāvidhi /
analyzed: tribhiḥ eva tu yā bhuktā puruṣaiḥ yathāvidhi

original: lekhyābhāve 'pi tāṃ tatra caturthaḥ samavāpnuyāt // K_327 //
analyzed: lekhya abhāve pi tām tatra caturthaḥ samavāpnuyāt

original: yathā kṣīraṃ janayati dadhi kālād rasānvitam /
analyzed: yathā kṣīram janayati dadhi kālāt rasa anvitam

original: dānahetus tathā kālād bhogas tripuruṣāgataḥ // K_328 //
analyzed: dāna hetuḥ tathā kālāt bhogaḥ tri puruṣa āgataḥ

original: bhuktir balavatī śāstre saṃtatā yā cirantanī /
analyzed: bhuktiḥ balavatī śāstre saṃtatā yā cirantanī

original: vicchinnāpi sā jñeyā yā tu pūrvaprasādhitā // K_329 //
analyzed: vicchinnā api sā jñeyā yā tu pūrva prasādhitā

original: na bhogaṃ kalpayet strīṣu devarājadhaneṣu ca /
analyzed: na bhogam kalpayet strīṣu deva rāja dhaneṣu ca

original: bālaśrotriyavit te ca mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ kramāt // K_330 //
analyzed: bāla śrotriya vid te ca mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ kramāt

original: brahmacarī caret kaścid avrataṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadābdikam /
analyzed: brahmacarī caret kaścid avratam ṣaṭtriṃśat ābdikam

original: arthārthī cānyaviṣaye dīrghakālaṃ vasen naraḥ // K_331 //
analyzed: artha arthī ca anya viṣaye dīrgha kālam vaset naraḥ

original: samāvṛtto 'vratī kuryāt svadhanānveṣaṇaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: samāvṛttaḥ vratī kuryāt sva dhana anveṣaṇam tatas

original: pañcāśadābdiko bhogas tad dhanasyāpahārakaḥ // K_332 //
analyzed: pañcāśat ābdikaḥ bhogaḥ tat dhanasya apahārakaḥ

original: pravivedaṃ dvādaśābdaḥ kālo vidyārthināṃ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: pravivedam dvādaśa abdaḥ kālaḥ vidyā arthinām smṛtaḥ

original: śilpavidyārthināṃ caiva grahaṇāntaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // K_333 //
analyzed: śilpa vidyā arthinām ca eva grahaṇa antaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: suhṛdbhir bandhubhiś caiṣāṃ yat svaṃ bhuktam apaśyatām /
analyzed: suhṛdbhiḥ bandhubhiḥ ca eṣām yat svam bhuktam a paśyatām

original: nṛpāparādhināṃ caiva na tat kālena hīyate // K_334 //
analyzed: nṛpa aparādhinām ca eva na tat kālena hīyate

original: sanābhibhir bāndhavaiś ca yad bhuktaṃ svajanais tathā /
analyzed: sanābhibhiḥ bāndhavaiḥ ca yat bhuktam sva janaiḥ tathā

original: bhogāt tatra na siddhiḥ syād bhogam anyatra kalpayet // K_335 //
analyzed: bhogāt tatra na siddhiḥ syāt bhogam anyatra kalpayet

original: [yuktiḥ]
analyzed: yuktiḥ

original: arthinābhyarthito yas tu vighātaṃ na prayojayet /
analyzed: arthinā abhyarthitaḥ yaḥ tu vighātam na prayojayet

original: tricatuḥpañcakṛtvo vā paras tad ṛṇī bhavet (?) // K_336 //
analyzed: tri catur pañca kṛtvas vā paraḥ tat ṛṇī bhavet

original: dānaṃ prajñāpanā bhedaḥ saṃpralobhakriyā ca yā /
analyzed: dānam prajñāpanā bhedaḥ saṃpralobha kriyā ca yā

original: cittāpanayanaṃ caiva hetavo hi vibhāvakāḥ // K_337 //
analyzed: citta apanayanam ca eva hetavaḥ hi vibhāvakāḥ

original: eṣām anyatamo yatra vādinā bhāvito bhavet /
analyzed: eṣām anyatamaḥ yatra vādinā bhāvitaḥ bhavet

original: mūlakriyā tu tatra syād bhāvite vādinihnave // K_338 //
analyzed: mūla kriyā tu tatra syāt bhāvite vādi nihnave

original: [sākṣiṇaḥ]
analyzed: sākṣiṇaḥ

original: na kālaharaṇaṃ kāryaṃ rājñā sākṣiprabhāṣaṇe /
analyzed: na kāla haraṇam kāryam rājñā sākṣi prabhāṣaṇe

original: mahān doṣo bhavet kālād dharmavyāvṛttilakṣaṇaḥ // K_339 //
analyzed: mahān doṣaḥ bhavet kālāt dharma vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ

original: upasthitān parīkṣeta sākṣiṇo nṛpatiḥ svayam /
analyzed: upasthitān parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ nṛpatiḥ svayam

original: sākṣibhir bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ sabhyaiḥ saha parīkṣayet // K_340 //
analyzed: sākṣibhiḥ bhāṣitam vākyam sabhyaiḥ saha parīkṣayet

original: samyakkriyāparijñāne deyaḥ kālas tu sākṣiṇām /
analyzed: samyak kriyā parijñāne deyaḥ kālaḥ tu sākṣiṇām

original: saṃdigdhaṃ yatra sākṣyaṃ syāt sadyaḥ spaṣṭaṃ vivādayet // K_341 //
analyzed: saṃdigdham yatra sākṣyam syāt sadyas spaṣṭam vivādayet

original: sabhāntaḥ sākṣiṇaḥ sarvān arthipratyarthisaṃnidhau /
analyzed: sabhā antar sākṣiṇaḥ sarvān arthi pratyarthi saṃnidhau

original: prāṅvivāko niyuñjīta vidhinānena sāntvayan // K_342 //
analyzed: prāṅvivākaḥ niyuñjīta vidhinā anena sāntvayan

original: yad dvayor anayor vettha kārye 'smiṃś ceṣṭitaṃ mithaḥ /
analyzed: yat dvayoḥ anayoḥ vettha kārye smin ceṣṭitam mithas

original: tad brūta sarvaṃ satyena yuṣmākaṃ hy atra sākṣitā // K_343 //
analyzed: tat brūta sarvam satyena yuṣmākam hi atra sākṣitā

original: devabrāhmanasānnidhye sākṣyaṃ pṛcched ṛtaṃ dvijān /
analyzed: deva brāhmana sānnidhye sākṣyam pṛcchet ṛtam dvijān

original: udaṅmukhān prāṅmukhān vā pūrvāhṇe vai śuciḥ śucīn // K_344 //
analyzed: udak mukhān prāc mukhān vā pūrvāhṇe vai śuciḥ śucīn

original: āhūya sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcchen niyamya śapathair bhṛśam /
analyzed: āhūya sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcchet niyamya śapathaiḥ bhṛśam

original: samastān viditācārān vijñātārthān pṛthakpṛthak // K_345 //
analyzed: samastān vidita ācārān vijñāta arthān pṛthak pṛthak

original: arthipratyarthisāṃnidhyād anubhūtaṃ tu yad bhavet /
analyzed: arthi pratyarthi sāṃnidhyāt anubhūtam tu yat bhavet

original: tad grāhyaṃ sākṣiṇo vākyam anyathā na bṛhaspatiḥ // K_346 //
analyzed: tat grāhyam sākṣiṇaḥ vākyam anyathā na bṛhaspatiḥ

original: prakhyātakulaśīlāś ca lobhamohavivarjitāḥ /
analyzed: prakhyāta kula śīlāḥ ca lobha moha vivarjitāḥ

original: āptāḥ śuddhā viśiṣṭā ye teṣāṃ sākṣyam asaṃśayam // K_347 //
analyzed: āptāḥ śuddhāḥ viśiṣṭāḥ ye teṣām sākṣyam asaṃśayam

original: vibhāvyo vādinā yādṛk sadṛśair eva bhāvayet /
analyzed: vibhāvyaḥ vādinā yādṛś sadṛśaiḥ eva bhāvayet

original: notkṛṣṭaś cāvakṛṣṭas tu sākṣibhir bhāvayet sadā // K_348 //
analyzed: na utkṛṣṭaḥ ca avakṛṣṭaḥ tu sākṣibhiḥ bhāvayet sadā

original: liṅginaḥ śreṇipūgāś ca vaṇigvrātās tathāpare /
analyzed: liṅginaḥ śreṇi pūgāḥ ca vaṇij vrātāḥ tathā apare

original: samūhasthāś ca ye cānye vargās tān abravīd bhṛguḥ // K_349 //
analyzed: samūha sthāḥ ca ye ca anye vargāḥ tān abravīt bhṛguḥ

original: dāsacāraṇamallānāṃ hastyaśvāyudhajīvinām /
analyzed: dāsa cāraṇa mallānām hasti aśva āyudha jīvinām

original: pratyekaikaṃ samūhānāṃ nāyakā vargiṇas tathā /
analyzed: pratyeka ekam samūhānām nāyakāḥ vargiṇaḥ tathā

original: teṣāṃ vādaḥ svavargeṣu vargiṇas teṣu sākṣiṇaḥ // K_350 //
analyzed: teṣām vādaḥ sva vargeṣu vargiṇaḥ teṣu sākṣiṇaḥ

original: strīṇāṃ sākṣyaṃ striyaḥ kuryur dvijānāṃ sadṛśā dvijāḥ /
analyzed: strīṇām sākṣyam striyaḥ kuryuḥ dvijānām sadṛśāḥ dvijāḥ

original: śūdrāś ca santaḥ śūdrāṇām antyānām antyayonayaḥ // K_351 //
analyzed: śūdrāḥ ca santaḥ śūdrāṇām antyānām antya yonayaḥ

original: aśakya āgamo yatra videśaprativāsinām /
analyzed: aśakyaḥ āgamaḥ yatra videśa prativāsinām

original: traividyaprahitaṃ tatra lekhyasākṣyaṃ pravādayet // K_352 //
analyzed: traividya prahitam tatra lekhya sākṣyam pravādayet

original: abhyantaras tu nikṣepe sākṣyam eko 'pi vācyate /
analyzed: abhyantaraḥ tu nikṣepe sākṣyam ekaḥ vācyate

original: arthinā prahitaḥ sākṣī bhavaty eko 'pi dūtakaḥ // K_353 //
analyzed: arthinā prahitaḥ sākṣī bhavati ekaḥ pi dūtakaḥ

original: saṃskṛtaṃ yena yat paṇyaṃ tat tenaiva vibhāvayet /
analyzed: saṃskṛtam yena yat paṇyam tat tena eva vibhāvayet

original: eka eva pramāṇaṃ sa vivāde tatra kīrtitaḥ // K_354 //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva pramāṇam sa vivāde tatra kīrtitaḥ

original: lekhakaḥ prāṅvivākaś ca sabhyāś caivānupūrvaśaḥ /
analyzed: lekhakaḥ prāṅvivākaḥ ca sabhyāḥ ca eva anupūrvaśas

original: nṛpe paśyati yat kāryaṃ sākṣiṇaḥ samudāhṛtāḥ // K_355 //
analyzed: nṛpe paśyati yat kāryam sākṣiṇaḥ samudāhṛtāḥ

original: anye punar anirdiṣṭāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ samudāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: anye punar anirdiṣṭāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ samudāhṛtāḥ

original: grāmaś ca prāṅvivākaś ca rājā ca vyavahāriṇām // K_356 //
analyzed: grāmaḥ ca prāṅvivākaḥ ca rājā ca vyavahāriṇām

original: kāryeṣv abhyantaro yaś ca arthinā prahitaś ca yaḥ /
analyzed: kāryeṣu abhyantaraḥ yaḥ ca arthinā prahitaḥ ca yaḥ

original: kulyāḥ kulavivādeṣu bhaveyus te 'pi sākṣiṇaḥ // K_357 //
analyzed: kulyāḥ kula vivādeṣu bhaveyuḥ te pi sākṣiṇaḥ

original: rikthabhāgavivāde tu saṃdehe samupasthite /
analyzed: riktha bhāga vivāde tu saṃdehe samupasthite

original: kulyānāṃ vacanaṃ tatra pramāṇaṃ tadviparyaye // K_358 //
analyzed: kulyānām vacanam tatra pramāṇam tad viparyaye

original: sākṣiṇāṃ likhitānāṃ tu nirdiṣṭānāṃ ca vādinā /
analyzed: sākṣiṇām likhitānām tu nirdiṣṭānām ca vādinā

original: teṣām eko 'nyathāvādī bhedāt sarve na sākṣiṇaḥ // K_359 //
analyzed: teṣām ekaḥ nyathāvādī bhedāt sarve na sākṣiṇaḥ

original: anyena hi kṛtaḥ sākṣī naivānyastaṃ vivādayet /
analyzed: anyena hi kṛtaḥ sākṣī na eva anyaḥ tam vivādayet

original: tadabhāve niyukto vā bāndhavo vā vivādayet // K_360 //
analyzed: tad abhāve niyuktaḥ vā bāndhavaḥ vā vivādayet

original: tadvṛttijīvino ye ca tatsevāhitakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: tad vṛtti jīvinaḥ ye ca tad sevā hita kāriṇaḥ

original: tadbandhusuhṛdo bhṛtyā āptās te tu na sākṣiṇaḥ // K_361 //
analyzed: tad bandhu suhṛdaḥ bhṛtyāḥ āptāḥ te tu na sākṣiṇaḥ

original: mātṛṣvasṛsutāś caiva sodaryāsutamātulāḥ /
