analyzed: mātṛṣvasṛ sutāḥ ca eva

original: ete sanābhayas tūktāḥ sākṣyaṃ teṣu na yojayet // K_362 //
analyzed: ete sanābhayaḥ tu uktāḥ sākṣyam teṣu na yojayet

original: kulyāḥ saṃbandhinaś caiva vivāhyo bhaginīpatiḥ /
analyzed: kulyāḥ saṃbandhinaḥ ca eva vivāhyaḥ bhaginī patiḥ

original: pitā bandhuḥ pitṛvyaś ca śvaśuro guravas tathā // K_363 //
analyzed: pitā bandhuḥ pitṛvyaḥ ca śvaśuraḥ guravaḥ tathā

original: nagaragrāmadeśeṣu niyuktā ye padeṣu ca /
analyzed: nagara grāma deśeṣu niyuktāḥ ye padeṣu ca

original: vallabhāś ca na pṛccheyur bhaktās te rājapūruṣāḥ // K_364 //
analyzed: vallabhāḥ ca na pṛccheyuḥ bhaktāḥ te rāja pūruṣāḥ

original: ṛṇādiṣu parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ sthirakarmasu /
analyzed: ṛṇa ādiṣu parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ sthira karmasu

original: sāhasātyayike caiva parīkṣā kutracit smṛtā // K_365 //
analyzed: sāhasa ātyayike ca eva parīkṣā kutracid smṛtā

original: vyāghāteṣu nṛpājñāyāḥ saṃgrahe sāhaseṣu ca /
analyzed: vyāghāteṣu nṛpa ājñāyāḥ saṃgrahe sāhaseṣu ca

original: steyapāruṣyayoś caiva na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ // K_366 //
analyzed: steya pāruṣyayoḥ ca eva na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ

original: antarveśmani rātrau ca bahirgrāmāc ca yad bhavet /
analyzed: antarveśmani rātrau ca bahis grāmāt ca yat bhavet

original: eteṣv evābhiyogaś cen na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ // K_367 //
analyzed: eteṣu eva abhiyogaḥ ced na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ

original: na sākṣyaṃ sākṣibhir vācyam apṛṣṭair arthinā sadā /
analyzed: na sākṣyam sākṣibhiḥ vācyam apṛṣṭaiḥ arthinā sadā

original: na sākṣyaṃ teṣu vidyeta svayam ātmani yojayet // K_368 //
analyzed: na sākṣyam teṣu vidyeta svayam ātmani yojayet

original: lekhyārūḍhaś cottaraś ca sākṣī mārgadvayānvitaḥ // K_369 //
analyzed: lekhya ārūḍhaḥ ca uttaraḥ ca sākṣī mārga dvaya anvitaḥ

original: atha svahastenārūḍhas tiṣṭhaṃś caikaḥ sa eva tu /
analyzed: atha sva hastena ārūḍhaḥ tiṣṭhan ca ekaḥ saḥ eva tu

original: na cet pratyabhijānīyāt tatsvahastaiḥ prasādhayet // K_370 //
analyzed: na ced pratyabhijānīyāt tat sva hastaiḥ prasādhayet

original: arthinā svayam ānīto yo lekhye saṃniveśyate /
analyzed: arthinā svayam ānītaḥ yaḥ lekhye saṃniveśyate

original: sa sākṣī likhito nāma smāritaḥ patrakād ṛte // K_371 //
analyzed: sa sākṣī likhitaḥ nāma smāritaḥ patrakāt ṛte

original: yas tu kāryaprasiddhyarthaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāryaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu kārya prasiddhi artham dṛṣṭvā kāryam punar punar

original: smāryate hy arthinā sākṣī sa smārita ihocyate // K_372 //
analyzed: smāryate hi arthinā sākṣī sa smāritaḥ iha ucyate

original: prayojanārtham ānītaḥ prasaṅgād āgataś ca yaḥ /
analyzed: prayojana artham ānītaḥ prasaṅgāt āgataḥ ca yaḥ

original: dvau sākṣiṇau tv alikhitau pūrvapakṣasya sādhakau // K_373 //
analyzed: dvau sākṣiṇau tu a likhitau pūrvapakṣasya sādhakau

original: arthinā svārthasiddyarthaṃ pratyarthivacanaṃ sphuṭam /
analyzed: arthinā sva artha siddi artham pratyarthi vacanam sphuṭam

original: yaḥ śrāvitaḥ sthito gūḍho gūḍhasākṣī sa ucyate // K_374 //
analyzed: yaḥ śrāvitaḥ sthitaḥ gūḍhaḥ gūḍha sākṣī saḥ ucyate

original: sākṣiṇām api yaḥ sākṣyam uparyupari bhāṣate /
analyzed: sākṣiṇām api yaḥ sākṣyam upari upari bhāṣate

original: śravaṇāc chrāvaṇād vāpi sa sākṣyuttarasaṃjñitaḥ // K_375 //
analyzed: śravaṇāt śrāvaṇāt vā api sa sākṣī uttara saṃjñitaḥ

original: ullapyaṃ yasya viśrambhāt kāryaṃ vā viniveditam /
analyzed: ullapyam yasya viśrambhāt kāryam vā viniveditam

original: gūḍhacārī sa vijñeyaḥ kāryam adhyagatas tathā // K_376 //
analyzed: gūḍha cārī sa vijñeyaḥ kāryam adhyagataḥ tathā

original: arthī yatra vipannaḥ syāt tatra sākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ /
analyzed: arthī yatra vipannaḥ syāt tatra sākṣī mṛta antaraḥ

original: pratyarthī ca mṛto yatra tatrāpy evaṃ prakalpyate // K_377 //
analyzed: pratyarthī ca mṛtaḥ yatra tatra api evam prakalpyate

original: [sākṣidoṣodbhāvanam]
analyzed: sākṣi doṣa udbhāvanam

original: lekhyadoṣās tu ye kecit sākṣiṇāṃ caiva ye smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: lekhya doṣāḥ tu ye kecid sākṣiṇām ca eva ye smṛtāḥ

original: vādakāle tu vaktavyāḥ paścād uktān na dūṣayet // K_378 //
analyzed: vāda kāle tu vaktavyāḥ paścāt uktān na dūṣayet

original: ukter arthe sākṣiṇo yas tu dūṣayet prāgdūṣitān /
analyzed: ukteḥ arthe sākṣiṇaḥ yaḥ tu dūṣayet prāk dūṣitān

original: na ca tatkāraṇaṃ brūyāt prāpnuyāt pūrvasāhasam // K_379 //
analyzed: na ca tad kāraṇam brūyāt prāpnuyāt pūrvasāhasam

original: nātathyena pramāṇaṃ tu doṣeṇaiva tu dūṣayet /
analyzed: na atathyena pramāṇam tu doṣeṇa eva tu dūṣayet

original: mithyābhiyoge daṇḍyaḥ syāt sādhyārthāc cāpi hīyate // K_380 //
analyzed: mithyā abhiyoge daṇḍyaḥ syāt sādhya arthāt ca api hīyate

original: pratyarthinārthinā vāpi sākṣidūṣaṇasādhane /
analyzed: pratyarthinā arthinā vā api sākṣi dūṣaṇa sādhane

original: prastutārthopayogitvād vyavahārāntaraṃ na ca // K_381 //
analyzed: prastuta artha upayogi tvāt vyavahāra antaram na ca

original: sākṣidoṣāḥ pravaktavyāḥ saṃsadi prativādinā /
analyzed: sākṣi doṣāḥ pravaktavyāḥ saṃsadi prativādinā

original: patre vilikhya tān sarvān vācyaḥ pratyuttaraṃ tataḥ // K_382 //
analyzed: patre vilikhya tān sarvān vācyaḥ pratyuttaram tatas

original: pratipattau tu sākṣitvam arhanti na kadācana /
analyzed: pratipattau tu sākṣi tvam arhanti na kadācana

original: ato 'nyathā bhāvanīyāḥ kriyayā prativādinā // K_383 //
analyzed: atas nyathā bhāvanīyāḥ kriyayā prativādinā

original: abhāvayan dhanam dāpyaḥ pratyarthī sākṣiṇaḥ sphuṭam /
analyzed: abhāvayan dhanam dāpyaḥ pratyarthī sākṣiṇaḥ sphuṭam

original: bhāvitāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ sarve sākṣidharmanirākṛtāḥ // K_384 //
analyzed: bhāvitāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ sarve sākṣi dharma nirākṛtāḥ

original: ākāro 'ṅgitaceṣṭābhis tasya bhāvaṃ vibhāvayet /
analyzed: ākāraḥ ṅgita ceṣṭābhiḥ tasya bhāvam vibhāvayet

original: prativādī bhaved dhīnaḥ so 'numānena lakṣyate // K_385 //
analyzed: prativādī bhavet dhīnaḥ saḥ numānena lakṣyate

original: kampaḥ svedo 'tha vaikalyam oṣṭhaśoṣābhimarśane /
analyzed: kampaḥ vaikalyam oṣṭha śoṣa abhimarśane

original: bhūlekhanaṃ sthānahānis tiryagūrdhvanirīkṣaṇam /
analyzed: bhū lekhanam sthāna hāniḥ tiryak ūrdhva nirīkṣaṇam

original: svarabhedaś ca duṣṭasya cihnāny āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // K_386 //
analyzed: svarabhedaḥ ca duṣṭasya cihnāni āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: sabhāntaḥsthais tu vaktavyaṃ sākṣyaṃ nānyatra sākṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: sabhā antar sthaiḥ tu vaktavyam sākṣyam na anyatra sākṣibhiḥ

original: sarvasākṣyeṣv ayaṃ dharmo hy anyatra sthāvareṣu tu // K_387 //
analyzed: sarva sākṣyeṣu ayam dharmaḥ hi anyatra sthāvareṣu tu

original: arthipratyarthisāṃnidhye sādhyārthasya ca saṃnidhau /
analyzed: arthi pratyarthi sāṃnidhye sādhya arthasya ca saṃnidhau

original: pratyakṣaṃ deśayet sakṣyaṃ parokṣaṃ na kathaṃcana // K_388 //
analyzed: pratyakṣam deśayet sakṣyam parokṣam na kathaṃcana

original: arthasyopari vaktavyaṃ tayor api vinā kvacit /
analyzed: arthasya upari vaktavyam tayoḥ api vinā kvacid

original: catuṣpadeṣv ayaṃ dharmo dvipadasthāvareṣu ca // K_389 //
analyzed: catuṣpadeṣu ayam dharmaḥ dvipada sthāvareṣu ca

original: taulyagaṇimameyānām abhāve 'pi vivādayet /
analyzed: taulya gaṇima meyānām abhāve vivādayet

original: kriyākāreṣu sarveṣu sākṣitvaṃ na tato 'nyathā // K_390 //
analyzed: kriyākāreṣu sarveṣu sākṣi tvam na tatas nyathā

original: vadhe cet prāṇināṃ sākṣyaṃ vādayec chivasaṃnidhau /
analyzed: vadhe ced prāṇinām sākṣyam vādayet śiva saṃnidhau

original: tadabhāve tu cihnasya nānyathaiva pravādayet // K_391 //
analyzed: tad abhāve tu cihnasya na anyathā eva pravādayet

original: svabhāvoktaṃ vacas teṣāṃ grāhyaṃ yad doṣavarjitam /
analyzed: svabhāva uktam vacaḥ teṣām grāhyam yat doṣa varjitam

original: ukte tu sākṣiṇo rājñā na praṣṭavyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // K_392 //
analyzed: ukte tu sākṣiṇaḥ rājñā na praṣṭavyāḥ punar punar

original: svabhāvenaiva yad brūyus tad grāhyaṃ vyāvahārikam /
analyzed: svabhāvena eva yat brūyuḥ tat grāhyam vyāvahārikam

original: ato yad anyad vibrūyur dharmārthaṃ tad apārthakam // K_393 //
analyzed: atas yat anyat vibrūyuḥ dharma artham tat apārthakam

original: samavetais tu yad dṛṣṭaṃ vaktavyaṃ tat tathaiva tu /
analyzed: samavetaiḥ tu yat dṛṣṭam vaktavyam tat tathā eva tu

original: vibhinnaikaikakāryaṃ yad vaktavyaṃ tat pṛthak pṛthak // K_394 //
analyzed: vibhinna eka eka kāryam yat vaktavyam tat pṛthak pṛthak

original: bhinnakāle tu yat kāryaṃ vijñātaṃ tatra sākṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: bhinna kāle tu yat kāryam vijñātam tatra sākṣibhiḥ

original: ekaikaṃ vādayet tatra bhinnakālaṃ tu tad bhṛguḥ // K_395 //
analyzed: ekaikam vādayet tatra bhinna kālam tu tat bhṛguḥ

original: ṛṇādiṣu vivādeṣu sthiraprāyeṣu niścitam /
analyzed: ṛṇa ādiṣu vivādeṣu sthira prāyeṣu niścitam

original: ūne vāpy adhike vārthe prokte sādhyaṃ na sidhyati // K_396 //
analyzed: ūne vā api adhike vā arthe prokte sādhyam na sidhyati

original: sādhyārthāṃśe 'pi gadite sākṣibhiḥ sakalaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: sādhya artha aṃśe gadite sākṣibhiḥ sakalam bhavet

original: strīsaṅge sāhase caurye yat sādhyaṃ parikalpitam // K_397 //
analyzed: strī saṅge sāhase caurye yat sādhyam parikalpitam

original: ūnādhikaṃ tu yatra syāt tat sākṣyaṃ tatra varjayet /
analyzed: ūna adhikam tu yatra syāt tat sākṣyam tatra varjayet

original: sākṣī tatra na daṇḍyaḥ syād abruvan daṇḍam arhati // K_398 //
analyzed: sākṣī tatra na daṇḍyaḥ syāt abruvān daṇḍam arhati

original: deśaṃ kālaṃ dhanaṃ saṃkhyāṃ rūpaṃ jātyākṛtī vayaḥ /
analyzed: deśam kālam dhanam saṃkhyām rūpam jāti ākṛtī vayaḥ

original: visaṃvaded yatra sākṣye tad anuktaṃ vidur budhāḥ // K_399 //
analyzed: visaṃvadet yatra sākṣye tat anuktam viduḥ budhāḥ

original: nirdiṣṭeṣv arthajāteṣu sākṣī cet sākṣya āgate /
analyzed: nirdiṣṭeṣu artha jāteṣu sākṣī ced sākṣye āgate

original: na brūyād akṣarasamaṃ na tan nigaditaṃ bhavet // K_400 //
analyzed: na brūyāt akṣara samam na tat nigaditam bhavet

original: ūnam abhyadhikaṃ vārthaṃ vibrūyur yatra sākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ūnam abhyadhikam vā artham vibrūyuḥ yatra sākṣiṇaḥ

original: tad apy ayuktaṃ vijñeyam eṣa sākṣiviniścayaḥ // K_401 //
analyzed: tat api ayuktam vijñeyam eṣa sākṣi viniścayaḥ

original: [sākṣiṇāṃ doṣā daṇḍāś ca]
analyzed: sākṣiṇām doṣāḥ daṇḍāḥ ca

original: apṛṣṭaḥ sarvavacane pṛṣṭasyākathane tathā /
analyzed: a pṛṣṭaḥ sarva vacane pṛṣṭasya a kathane tathā

original: sākṣiṇaḥ saṃniroddhavyā garhyā daṇḍyāś ca dharmataḥ // K_402 //
analyzed: sākṣiṇaḥ saṃniroddhavyāḥ garhyāḥ daṇḍyāḥ ca dharmataḥ

original: vākpāruṣye chale vāde dapyāḥ syur triśataṃ damam /
analyzed: vāc pāruṣye chale vāde dapyāḥ syuḥ tri śatam damam

original: ṛṇādivādeṣu dhanaṃ te syur dāpyā ṛṇaṃ tathā // K_403 //
analyzed: ṛṇa ādi vādeṣu dhanam te syuḥ dāpyāḥ ṛṇam tathā

original: yaḥ sākṣī naiva nirdiṣṭā nāhūto nāpi darśitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sākṣī na eva nirdiṣṭā na āhūtaḥ na api darśitaḥ

original: brūyān mithyeti tathyaṃ vā daṇḍyaḥ so 'pi narādhamaḥ // K_404 //
analyzed: brūyāt mithyā iti tathyam vā daṇḍyaḥ saḥ nara adhamaḥ

original: sākṣī sākṣyaṃ na ced brūyāt samadaṇḍaṃ vahed ṛṇam /
analyzed: sākṣī sākṣyam na ced brūyāt sama daṇḍam vahet ṛṇam

original: ato 'nyeṣu vivādeṣu triśataṃ daṇḍam arhati // K_405 //
analyzed: atas nyeṣu vivādeṣu tri śatam daṇḍam arhati

original: uktvānyathā bruvāṇāś ca daṇḍyāḥ syur vākchalānvitāḥ // K_406 //
analyzed: uktvā anyathā bruvāṇāḥ ca daṇḍyāḥ syuḥ vāc chala anvitāḥ

original: yena kāryasya lobhena nirdiṣṭāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: yena kāryasya lobhena nirdiṣṭāḥ kūṭa sākṣiṇaḥ

original: gṛhītvā tasya sarvasvaṃ kuryān nirviṣayaṃ tataḥ // K_407 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā tasya sarva svam kuryāt nirviṣayam tatas

original: yatra vai bhāvitaṃ kāryaṃ sākṣibhir vādinā bhavet /
analyzed: yatra vai bhāvitam kāryam sākṣibhiḥ vādinā bhavet

original: prativādī yadā tatra bhāvayet kāryam anyathā /
analyzed: prativādī yadā tatra bhāvayet kāryam anyathā

original: bahubhiś ca kulīnair vā pūrvāḥ syuḥ kūṭasākṣiṇaḥ // K_408 //
analyzed: bahubhiḥ ca kulīnaiḥ vā pūrvāḥ syuḥ kūṭa sākṣiṇaḥ

original: yadā śuddhā kriyā nyāyāt tadā tadvākyaśodhanam /
analyzed: yadā śuddhā kriyā nyāyāt tadā tad vākya śodhanam

original: śuddhāc ca vākyād yaḥ śuddhaḥ sa śuddho 'rtha iti sthitiḥ // K_409 //
analyzed: śuddhāt ca vākyāt yaḥ śuddhaḥ sa śuddhaḥ rthaḥ iti sthitiḥ

original: saptāhāt tu pratīyeta yatra sākṣy anṛtaṃ vadet /
analyzed: sapta ahāt tu pratīyeta yatra sākṣī anṛtam vadet

original: rogo 'gnir jñātimaraṇaṃ dvisaptāhāt trisapta vā /
analyzed: rogaḥ agniḥ jñāti maraṇam dvi sapta ahāt tri sapta vā

original: ṣaṭcatvāriṃśake vāpi dravyajātyādibhedataḥ // K_410 //
analyzed: ṣaṭcatvāriṃśake vā api dravya jāti ādi bhedataḥ

original: [divyāni teṣāṃ ca vivādapadaviṣayiṇī vyavasthā]
analyzed: divyāni teṣām ca vivāda pada viṣayiṇī vyavasthā

original: na kaścid abhiyoktāraṃ divyeṣu viniyojayet /
analyzed: na kaścid abhiyoktāram divyeṣu viniyojayet

original: abhiyuktāya dātavyaṃ divyaṃ divyaviśāradaiḥ // K_411 //
analyzed: abhiyuktāya dātavyam divyam divya viśāradaiḥ

original: pārthivaiḥ śaṅkitānāṃ tu tulādīni niyojayet /
analyzed: pārthivaiḥ śaṅkitānām tu tulā ādīni niyojayet

original: ātmaśuddhividhāne ca na śiras tatra kalpayet // K_412 //
analyzed: ātma śuddhi vidhāne ca na śiraḥ tatra kalpayet

original: lokāpavādaduṣṭānāṃ śaṅkitānāṃ ca dasyubhiḥ /
analyzed: loka apavāda duṣṭānām śaṅkitānām ca dasyubhiḥ

original: tulādīni niyojyāni na śiras tatra vai bhṛguḥ // K_413 //
analyzed: tulā ādīni niyojyāni na śiraḥ tatra vai bhṛguḥ

original: na śaṅkāsu śiraḥ kośe kalpayet tu kadācana /
analyzed: na śaṅkāsu śiraḥ kośe kalpayet tu kadācana

original: aśirāṃsi ca divyāni rājabhṛtyeṣu dāpayet // K_414 //
analyzed: aśirāṃsi ca divyāni rāja bhṛtyeṣu dāpayet

original: śaṅkāviśvāsasaṃdhāne vibhāge rikthināṃ sadā /
analyzed: śaṅkā viśvāsa saṃdhāne vibhāge rikthinām sadā

original: kriyāsamūhakartṛtve kośam eva pradāpayet // K_415 //
analyzed: kriyā samūha kartṛ tve kośam eva pradāpayet

original: dattasyāpahnavo yatra pramāṇaṃ tatra kalpayet /
analyzed: dattasya apahnavaḥ yatra pramāṇam tatra kalpayet

original: steyasāhasayor divyaṃ svalpe 'py arthe pradāpayet // K_416 //
analyzed: steya sāhasayoḥ divyam su alpe pi arthe pradāpayet

original: sarvadravyapramāṇaṃ tu jñātvā hema prakalpayet /
analyzed: sarva dravya pramāṇam tu jñātvā hema prakalpayet

original: hemapramāṇayuktaṃ tu tadā divyaṃ niyojayet // K_417 //
analyzed: hema pramāṇa yuktam tu tadā divyam niyojayet

original: jñātvā saṃkhyāṃ suvarṇānāṃ śatanāśe viṣaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: jñātvā saṃkhyām suvarṇānām śata nāśe viṣam smṛtam

original: aśītes tu vināśe vai dadyāc caiva hutāśanam // K_418 //
analyzed: aśīteḥ tu vināśe vai dadyāt ca eva hutāśanam

original: ṣaṣṭyā nāśe jalaṃ deyaṃ catvāriṃśati vai ghaṭam /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭyāḥ nāśe jalam deyam catvāriṃśati vai ghaṭam

original: viṃśaddaśavināśe vai kośapānaṃ vidhīyate // K_419 //
analyzed: viṃśat daśa vināśe vai kośa pānam vidhīyate

original: pañcādhikasya vā nāśe tadardhārdhasya tandulāḥ /
analyzed: pañca adhikasya vā nāśe tad ardha ardhasya tandulāḥ

original: tadardhārdhasya nāśe tu spṛśet putrādimastakam // K_420 //
analyzed: tad ardha ardhasya nāśe tu spṛśet putra ādi mastakam

original: tadardhārdhasya nāśe tu laukikāś ca kriyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: tad ardha ardhasya nāśe tu laukikāḥ ca kriyāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: evaṃ vicārayan rājā dharmārthābhyāṃ na hīyate // K_421 //
analyzed: evam vicārayan rājā dharma arthābhyām na hīyate

original: [divyānām arthipratyarthijātiśilpānusāriṇyo vyavasthāḥ]
analyzed: divyānām arthi pratyarthi jāti śilpa anusāriṇyaḥ vyavasthāḥ

original: rājanye 'gniṃ ghaṭaṃ vipre vaiśye toyaṃ niyojayet /
analyzed: rājanye gnim ghaṭam vipre vaiśye toyam niyojayet

original: sarveṣu sarvadivyaṃ vā viṣaṃ varṃjya dviyottame // K_422 //
analyzed: sarveṣu sarva divyam vā viṣam

original: gorakṣakān vāṇijakāṃs tathā kārukuśīlavān /
analyzed: gorakṣakān vāṇijakān tathā kāru kuśīlavān

original: preṣyān vārdhuṣikāṃś caiva grāhayec śūdravad dvijān // K_423 //
analyzed: preṣyān vārdhuṣikān ca eva grāhayet śūdra vat dvijān

original: na lohaśilpinām agniṃ salilaṃ nāmbusevinām /
analyzed: na loha śilpinām agnim salilam na ambu sevinām

original: mantrayogavidāṃ caiva viṣaṃ dadyāc ca na kvacit /
analyzed: mantra yoga vidām ca eva viṣam dadyāt ca na kvacid

original: taṇḍulair na niyuñjīta vratinaṃ mukharogiṇam // K_424 //
analyzed: taṇḍulaiḥ na niyuñjīta vratinam mukha rogiṇam

original: kuṣṭhināṃ varjayed agniṃ salilaṃ śvāsakāsinām /
analyzed: kuṣṭhinām varjayet agnim salilam śvāsa kāsinām

original: pittaśleṣmavatāṃ nityaṃ viṣaṃ tu parivarjayet // K_425 //
analyzed: pitta śleṣmavatām nityam viṣam tu parivarjayet

original: madyapastrīvyasanināṃ kitavānāṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: madyapa strī vyasaninām kitavānām tathā eva ca

original: kośaḥ prājñair na dātavyo ye ca nāstikavṛttayaḥ // K_426 //
analyzed: kośaḥ prājñaiḥ na dātavyaḥ ye ca nāstika vṛttayaḥ

original: mātāpitṛdvijaguru- bālastrīrājaghātinām /
analyzed: mātā pitṛ dvija guru bāla strī rāja ghātinām

original: mahāpātakayuktānāṃ nāstikānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // K_427 //
analyzed: mahāpātaka yuktānām nāstikānām viśeṣataḥ

original: liṅgināṃ praśaṭhānāṃ tu mantrayogakriyāvidām /
analyzed: liṅginām praśaṭhānām tu mantra yoga kriyā vidām

original: varṇasaṃkarajātānāṃ pāpābhyāsapravartinām // K_428 //
analyzed: varṇa saṃkara jātānām pāpa abhyāsa pravartinām

original: eteṣv evābhiyogeṣu nindyeṣv eva ca yatnataḥ /
analyzed: eteṣu eva abhiyogeṣu nindyeṣu eva ca yatnataḥ

original: divyaṃ prakalpyen naiva rājā dharmaparāyaṇaḥ // K_429 //
analyzed: divyam prakalpyet na eva rājā dharma parāyaṇaḥ

original: etair eva niyuktānāṃ sādhūnāṃ divyam arhati /
analyzed: etaiḥ eva niyuktānām sādhūnām divyam arhati

original: necchanti sādhavo yatra tatra śodhyāḥ svakair naraiḥ // K_430 //
analyzed: na icchanti sādhavaḥ yatra tatra śodhyāḥ svakaiḥ naraiḥ

original: mahāpātakayukteṣu nāstikeṣu viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: mahāpātaka yukteṣu nāstikeṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: na deyaṃ teṣu divyaṃ tu pāpābhyāsarateṣu ca // K_431 //
analyzed: na deyam teṣu divyam tu pāpa abhyāsa rateṣu ca

original: eṣu vādeṣu divyāni pratiṣiddhāni yatnataḥ /
analyzed: eṣu vādeṣu divyāni pratiṣiddhāni yatnataḥ

original: kārayet sajjanais tāni nābhiśastaṃ tyajen manuḥ // K_432 //
analyzed: kārayet sat janaiḥ tāni na abhiśastam tyajet manuḥ

original: aspṛśyādhamadāsānāṃ mlecchānāṃ pāpakāriṇām /
analyzed: aspṛśya adhama dāsānām mlecchānām pāpa kāriṇām

original: prātilomyapasūtānāṃ niścayo na tu rājani /
analyzed: prātilomya apasūtānām niścayaḥ na tu rājani

original: tatprasiddhāni divyāni saṃśaye teṣu nirdiśet // K_433 //
analyzed: tad prasiddhāni divyāni saṃśaye teṣu nirdiśet

original: [divyadeśāḥ]
analyzed: divya deśāḥ

original: indrasthāne 'bhiśastānāṃ mahāpātakināṃ nṛṇām /
analyzed: indrasthāne mahāpātakinām nṛṇām

original: nṛpadrohe pravṛttānāṃ rājadvāre prayojayet // K_434 //
analyzed: nṛpa drohe pravṛttānām rājadvāre prayojayet

original: prātilomyaprasūtānāṃ divyaṃ deyaṃ catuṣpathe /
analyzed: prātilomya prasūtānām divyam deyam catuṣpathe

original: ato 'nyeṣu sabhāmadhye divyaṃ deyaṃ vidur budhāḥ // K_435 //
analyzed: atas nyeṣu sabhā madhye divyam deyam viduḥ budhāḥ

original: kāladeśavirodhe tu yathāyuktaṃ prakalpayet /
analyzed: kāla deśa virodhe tu yathā yuktam prakalpayet

original: anyena hārayed divyaṃ vidhir eṣa viparyaye // K_436 //
analyzed: anyena hārayet divyam vidhiḥ eṣa viparyaye

original: adeśakāladattāni bahirvāsakṛtāni ca /
analyzed: a deśa kāla dattāni bahis vāsa kṛtāni ca

original: vyabhicāraṃ sadārtheṣu kurvantīha na saṃśayaḥ // K_437 //
analyzed: vyabhicāram sadā artheṣu kurvanti iha na saṃśayaḥ

original: sādhayet tat punaḥ sādhyaṃ vyāghāte sādhanasya hi /
analyzed: sādhayet tat punar sādhyam vyāghāte sādhanasya hi

original: dattāny api yathoktāni rājā divyāni varjayet /
analyzed: dattāni api yathā uktāni rājā divyāni varjayet

original: mūrkhair lubdhaiś ca duṣṭaiś ca punar deyāni tāni vai // K_438 //
analyzed: mūrkhaiḥ lubdhaiḥ ca duṣṭaiḥ ca punar deyāni tāni vai

original: tasmād yathoktavidhinā divyaṃ deyaṃ viśāradaiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā ukta vidhinā divyam deyam viśāradaiḥ

original: ayathoktaprayuktaṃ tu na śaktaṃ tasya sādhane // K_439 //
analyzed: ayathā ukta prayuktam tu na śaktam tasya sādhane

original: śikyac chede tulābhaṅge tathā vāpi guṇasya vā /
analyzed: śikyat chede tulābhaṅge tathā vā api guṇasya vā

original: śuddhes tu saṃśaye caiva parīkṣeta punar naram // K_440 //
analyzed: śuddheḥ tu saṃśaye ca eva parīkṣeta punar naram

original: [agnidivyavidhiḥ]
praskhalaty abhiyuktaś cet sthānād anyatra dahyate /
analyzed: praskhalati abhiyuktaḥ ced sthānāt anyatra dahyate

original: na dagdhaṃ tu vidur devās tasya bhūyo 'pi dāpayet // K_441 //
analyzed: na dagdham tu viduḥ devāḥ tasya bhūyaḥ dāpayet

original: [udakadivyavidhiḥ]
śarāṃs tv anāyasair agraiḥ prakurvīta viśuddhaye /
analyzed: śarān tu anāyasaiḥ agraiḥ prakurvīta viśuddhaye

original: veṇakāṇḍamayāṃś caiva kṣeptā ca sudṛḍhaṃ kṣipet // K_442 //
analyzed: veṇa kāṇḍa mayān ca eva kṣeptā ca su dṛḍham kṣipet

original: kṣipte tu majjanaṃ kāryaṃ gamanaṃ samakālikam /
analyzed: kṣipte tu majjanam kāryam gamanam sama kālikam

original: gamane tv āgamaḥ kāryaḥ pumān anyo jale viśet // K_443 //
analyzed: gamane tu āgamaḥ kāryaḥ pumān anyaḥ jale viśet

original: śiromānaṃ tu dṛśyeta na karṇau nāpi nāsikā /
analyzed: śiraḥ mānam tu dṛśyeta na karṇau na api nāsikā

original: apsu praveśane yasya śuddhaṃ tam api nirdiśet // K_444 //
analyzed: apsu praveśane yasya śuddham tam api nirdiśet

original: nimajjyotplavate yas tu dṛṣṭaś cet prāṇibhir naraḥ /
analyzed: nimajjya utplavate yaḥ tu dṛṣṭaḥ ced prāṇibhiḥ naraḥ

original: punas tatra nimajjet sa deśacihnavibhāvite // K_445 //
analyzed: punar tatra nimajjet sa deśa cihna vibhāvite

original: [viṣadivyavidhiḥ]
ajāśṛṅganibhaṃ śyāmaṃ supīnaṃ śṛṅgasaṃbhavam /
analyzed: ajā śṛṅga nibham śyāmam su pīnam śṛṅga saṃbhavam

original: bhaṅge ca śṛṅgaverābhaṃ khyātaṃ tacśṛṅgiṇāṃ viṣam // K_446 //
analyzed: bhaṅge ca śṛṅgavera ābham khyātam tat śṛṅgiṇām viṣam

original: raktaṃ tadasitaṃ kuryāt kaṭinaṃ caiva tallakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: raktam tat asitam kuryāt ca eva tad lakṣaṇāt

original: anena vidhinā jñeyaṃ divyaṃ divyaviśāradaiḥ // K_447 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā jñeyam divyam divya viśāradaiḥ

original: vatsanābhanibhaṃ pītaṃ varṇajñānena niścayaḥ /
analyzed: vatsanābha nibham pītam varṇa jñānena niścayaḥ

original: śuktiśaṅkhākṛtir bhaṅge vidyāt tadvatsanābhakam // K_448 //
analyzed: śukti śaṅkha ākṛtiḥ bhaṅge vidyāt tat vatsanābhakam

original: madhukṣīrasamāyuktaṃ svacchaṃ kurvīta tatkṣaṇāt /
bāhyam evaṃ samākhyātaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dharmasādhakaiḥ // K_449 //
analyzed: bāhyam evam samākhyātam lakṣaṇam dharma sādhakaiḥ

original: pūrvāhṇe śītale deśe viṣaṃ dadyāt tu dehinām /
analyzed: pūrvāhṇe śītale deśe viṣam dadyāt tu dehinām

original: ghṛtena yojitaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ piṣṭaṃ triṃśadguṇena tu // K_450 //
analyzed: ghṛtena yojitam ślakṣṇam piṣṭam triṃśadguṇena tu

original: viṣasya palaṣaḍbhāgād bhāgo viṃśatim astu yaḥ /
analyzed: viṣasya pala ṣaṣ bhāgāt bhāgaḥ viṃśatim astu yaḥ

original: tam aṣṭabhāgahīnaṃ śodhye deyaṃ ghṛtāplutam // K_451 //
analyzed: tam aṣṭa bhāga hīnam śodhye deyam ghṛta āplutam

original: [kośadivyavidhiḥ]
svalpe 'parādhe devānāṃ snāpayitvāyudhodakam /
analyzed: su alpe parādhe devānām snāpayitvā āyudha udakam

original: pāyyo vikāre cāśuddho niyamyaḥ śucir anyathā // K_452 //
analyzed: pāyyaḥ vikāre ca aśuddhaḥ niyamyaḥ śuciḥ anyathā

original: [taṇḍulavidhiḥ]
analyzed: taṇḍula vidhiḥ

original: devatāsnānapānīya- divye taṇḍulabhakṣaṇe /
analyzed: devatā snāna pānīya divye taṇḍula bhakṣaṇe

original: śuddhaniṣṭhīvanāc śuddho niyamyo 'śucir anyathā // K_453 //
analyzed: śuddha niṣṭhīvanāt śuddhaḥ niyamyaḥ śuciḥ anyathā

original: avaṣṭambhābhiyuktasya viśuddhasyāpi kośataḥ /
analyzed: avaṣṭambha abhiyuktasya viśuddhasya api kośataḥ

original: sadaṇḍam abhiyogaṃ ca dāpayed abhiyojakam /
analyzed: sa daṇḍam abhiyogam ca dāpayet abhiyojakam

original: divyena śuddhaṃ puruṣaṃ sat kuryād dhārmiko nṛpaḥ // K_454 //
analyzed: divyena śuddham puruṣam sat kuryāt dhārmikaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: śoṇitaṃ dṛśyate yatra hanuvālaṃ ca sīdati /
analyzed: śoṇitam dṛśyate yatra hanu vālam ca sīdati

original: gātraṃ ca kampate yasya tam aśuddhaṃ vinirdiśet // K_455 //
analyzed: gātram ca kampate yasya tam aśuddham vinirdiśet

original: atha daivavisaṃvādāt trisaptāhāt tu dāpayet /
analyzed: atha daiva visaṃvādāt tri sapta ahāt tu dāpayet

original: abhiyuktaṃ tu yatnena tam arthaṃ daṇḍam eva ca // K_456 //
analyzed: abhiyuktam tu yatnena tam artham daṇḍam eva ca

original: tasyaikasya na sarvasya janasya yadi tad bhavet /
analyzed: tasya ekasya na sarvasya janasya yadi tat bhavet

original: rogo 'gnir jñātimaraṇam ṛṇaṃ dāpyo damaṃ ca saḥ // K_457 //
analyzed: rogaḥ gniḥ jñāti maraṇam ṛṇam dāpyaḥ damam ca saḥ

original: kṣayātisāravisphoṭās tālvasthiparipīḍanam /
analyzed: kṣaya atisāra visphoṭāḥ tālu asthi paripīḍanam

original: netraruggalarogaś ca tathonmādaḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: netra ruj gala rogaḥ ca tathā unmādaḥ prajāyate

original: śirorugbhujabhaṅgaś ca daivikā vyādhayo nṛṇām // K_458 //
analyzed: śiraḥ ruj bhuja bhaṅgaḥ ca daivikāḥ vyādhayaḥ nṛṇām

original: śatārdhaṃ dāpayec śuddham aśuddho daṇḍabhāg bhavet // K_459 //
analyzed: śata ardham dāpayet śuddham aśuddhaḥ daṇḍa bhāj bhavet

original: viṣe toye hutāśe ca tulākośe ca taṇḍule /
analyzed: viṣe toye hutāśe ca tulā kośe ca taṇḍule

original: taptamāṣakadivye ca kramād daṇḍaṃ prakalpayet // K_460 //
analyzed: tapta māṣaka divye ca kramāt daṇḍam prakalpayet

original: sahasraṃ ṣaṭśataṃ caiva tathā pañca śatāni ca /
analyzed: sahasram ṣaṭśatam ca eva tathā pañca śatāni ca

original: catustridvyekam evaṃ ca hīnaṃ hīneṣu kalpayet // K_461 //
analyzed: catur tri dvi ekam evam ca hīnam hīneṣu kalpayet

original: [śapathavidhiḥ]
analyzed: śapatha vidhiḥ

original: yatropadiśyate karma kartur aṅgaṃ na tūcyate /
analyzed: yatra upadiśyate karma kartuḥ aṅgam na tu ucyate

original: dakṣiṇas tatra vijñeyaḥ karmaṇāṃ pāragaḥ karaḥ // K_462 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇaḥ tatra vijñeyaḥ karmaṇām pāragaḥ karaḥ

original: ācaturdaśakād ahno yasya no rājadaivikam /
analyzed: ā caturdaśakāt ahnaḥ yasya no rāja daivikam

original: vyasanaṃ jāyate ghoraṃ sa jñeyaḥ śapathe śuciḥ // K_463 //
analyzed: vyasanam jāyate ghoram sa jñeyaḥ śapathe śuciḥ

original: [unmattāsvatantrādikṛtānāṃ vicāraḥ]
analyzed: unmatta asvatantra ādi kṛtānām vicāraḥ

original: unmattenaiva mattena tathā bhāvāntareṇa vā /
analyzed: unmattena eva mattena tathā bhāva antareṇa vā

original: yad dattaṃ yat kṛtaṃ vātha pramāṇaṃ naiva tad bhavet // K_464 //
analyzed: yat dattam yat kṛtam vā atha pramāṇam nā eva tat bhavet

original: asvatantrakṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tasya svāmī nivartayet /
analyzed: asvatantra kṛtam kāryam tasya svāmī nivartayet

original: na bhartrā vivadetānyo bhītonmattakṛtād ṛte // K_465 //
analyzed: na bhartrā vivadeta anyaḥ bhīta unmatta kṛtāt ṛte

original: pitāsvatantraḥ pitṛmān bhrātā bhātṛvya eva vā /
analyzed: pitā asvatantraḥ pitṛmān bhrātā bhātṛvyaḥ eva vā

original: kaniṣṭho vāvibhaktasvo dāsaḥ karmakaras tathā // K_466 //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhaḥ vā a vibhakta svaḥ dāsaḥ karmakaraḥ tathā

original: na kṣetragṛhadāsānāṃ dānādhamanavikrayāḥ /
analyzed: na kṣetra gṛha dāsānām dāna ādhamana vikrayāḥ

original: asvatantrakṛtāḥ siddhiṃ prāpnuyur nānuvarṇitāḥ // K_467 //
analyzed: asvatantra kṛtāḥ siddhim prāpnuyuḥ na anuvarṇitāḥ

original: pramāṇaṃ sarva evaite paṇyānāṃ krayavikraye /
analyzed: pramāṇam sarve eva ete paṇyānām kraya vikraye

original: yadi saṃvyavahāraṃ te kurvanto 'py anumoditāḥ // K_468 //
analyzed: yadi saṃvyavahāram te kurvantaḥ pi anumoditāḥ

original: kṣetrādīṇāṃ tathaiva syur bhrātā bhrātṛsutaḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: kṣetra ādīṇām tathā eva syuḥ bhrātā bhrātṛ sutaḥ sutaḥ

original: nisṛṣṭāḥ kṛtyakaraṇe guruṇā yadi gacchatā // K_469 //
analyzed: nisṛṣṭāḥ kṛtya karaṇe guruṇā yadi gacchatā

original: nisṛṣṭārthas tu yo yasmin tasminn arthe prabhus tu saḥ /
analyzed: nisṛṣṭa arthaḥ tu yaḥ yasmin tasmin arthe prabhuḥ tu saḥ

original: tadbhartā tatkṛtaṃ kāryaṃ nānyathā kartum arhati // K_470 //
analyzed: tad bhartā tad kṛtam kāryam na anyathā kartum arhati

original: sutasya sutadārāṇāṃ vaśitvaṃ tv anuśāsane /
analyzed: sutasya suta dārāṇām vaśi tvam tu anuśāsane

original: vikraye caiva dāne ca vaśitvaṃ na sute pituḥ // K_471 //
analyzed: vikraye ca eva dāne ca vaśi tvam na sute pituḥ

original: [nirṇayakṛtyam]
analyzed: nirṇaya kṛtyam

original: śuddhis tu śāstratattvajñaiś cikitsā samudāhṛtā /
analyzed: śuddhiḥ tu śāstra tattva jñaiḥ cikitsā samudāhṛtā

original: prāyaścittaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ ca tābhyāṃ sā dvividhā smṛtā // K_472 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam ca daṇḍam ca tābhyām sā dvividhā smṛtā

original: anekārthābhiyoge 'pi yāvat saṃsādhayed dhanī /
analyzed: aneka artha abhiyoge yāvat saṃsādhayet dhanī

original: sākṣibhis tāvad evāsau labhate sādhitaṃ dhanam // K_473 //
analyzed: sākṣibhiḥ tāvat eva asau labhate sādhitam dhanam

original: sarvāpalāpaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā mitho 'lpam api saṃvadet /
analyzed: sarva apalāpam yaḥ kṛtvā mithas lpam api saṃvadet

original: sarvam eva tu dāpyaḥ syād abhiyukto bṛhaspatiḥ // K_474 //
analyzed: sarvam eva tu dāpyaḥ syāt abhiyuktaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: evaṃ dharmāsanasthena samenaiva vivādinā /
analyzed: evam dharma āsana sthena samena eva vivādinā

original: kāryāṇāṃ nirṇayo dṛśyo brāhmaṇaiḥ saha nānyathā // K_475 //
analyzed: kāryāṇām nirṇayaḥ dṛśyaḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha na anyathā

original: vyavahārān svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā prāṅvivākataḥ /
analyzed: vyavahārān svayam dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā prāṅ vivākataḥ

original: jayapatraṃ tato dadyāt parijñānāya pārthivaḥ // K_476 //
analyzed: jaya patram tatas dadyāt parijñānāya pārthivaḥ

original: [daṇḍavidhiḥ]
analyzed: daṇḍa vidhiḥ

original: rājā tu svāmine vipraṃ sāntvenaiva pradāpayet /
analyzed: rājā tu svāmine vipram sāntvena eva pradāpayet

original: deśācāreṇa cānyāṃs tu duṣṭān saṃpīḍya dāpayet // K_477 //
analyzed: deśa ācāreṇa ca anyān tu duṣṭān saṃpīḍya dāpayet

original: rikthinaṃ suhṛdaṃ vāpi cchalenaiva pradāpayet /
analyzed: rikthinam suhṛdam vā api chalena eva pradāpayet

original: vaṇijaḥ karṣakāṃś cāpi śilpinaś cābravīd bhṛguḥ // K_478 //
analyzed: vaṇijaḥ karṣakān ca api śilpinaḥ ca abravīt bhṛguḥ

original: dhanadānāsahaṃ buddhvā svādhīnaṃ karma kārayet /
analyzed: dhana dāna asaham buddhvā svādhīnam karma kārayet

original: aśaktau bandhanāgāraṃ praveśyo brāhmaṇād ṛte // K_479 //
analyzed: aśaktau bandhanāgāram praveśyaḥ brāhmaṇāt ṛte

original: karṣakān kṣatraviśśūdrān samīhānāṃs tu dāpayet // K_480 //
analyzed: karṣakān kṣatra viś śūdrān tu dāpayet

original: ācāryasya pitur mātur bāndhavānāṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ācāryasya pituḥ mātuḥ bāndhavānām tathā eva ca

original: eteṣām aparādheṣu daṇḍo naiva vidhīyate // K_481 //
analyzed: eteṣām aparādheṣu daṇḍaḥ na eva vidhīyate

original: prāṇātyaye tu yatra syād akāryakaraṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: prāṇātyaye tu yatra syāt akārya karaṇam kṛtam

original: daṇḍas tatra tu naiva syād eṣa dharmo bhṛgusmṛtaḥ // K_482 //
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ tatra tu nā eva syāt eṣa dharmaḥ bhṛgu smṛtaḥ

original: na jātu brāhmaṇaṃ hanyāt sarvapāpeṣv avasthitam /
analyzed: na jātu brāhmaṇam hanyāt sarva pāpeṣu avasthitam

original: rāṣṭrāc cainaṃ bahiḥ kuryāt samagradhanam akṣatam // K_483 //
analyzed: rāṣṭrāt ca enam bahis kuryāt samagra dhanam akṣatam

original: caturṇām api varṇānāṃ prāyaścittam akurvatām /
analyzed: caturṇām api varṇānām prāyaścittam a kurvatām

original: śarīradhanasaṃyuktaṃ daṇḍaṃ dharmyaṃ prakalpayet // K_484 //
analyzed: śarīra dhana saṃyuktam daṇḍam dharmyam prakalpayet

original: yena doṣeṇa śūdrasya daṇḍo bhavati dharmataḥ /
analyzed: yena doṣeṇa śūdrasya daṇḍaḥ bhavati dharmataḥ

original: tena cet kṣatraviprāṇāṃ dviguṇo dviguṇo bhavet // K_485 //
analyzed: tena ced kṣatra viprāṇām dviguṇaḥ dviguṇaḥ bhavet

original: pravrajyāvasitaṃ śūdraṃ japahomaparāyaṇam /
analyzed: pravrajyā vasitam śūdram japa homa parāyaṇam

original: vadhena śāsayet pāpaṃ daṇḍyo vā dviguṇaṃ damam // K_486 //
analyzed: vadhena śāsayet pāpam daṇḍyaḥ vā dviguṇam damam

original: sarveṣu cāparādheṣu puṃso yo 'rthadamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣu ca aparādheṣu puṃsaḥ yaḥ ṛtha damaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tadardhaṃ yoṣito dadyur vadhe puṃso 'ṅga kartanam // K_487 //
analyzed: tad ardham yoṣitaḥ dadyuḥ vadhe puṃsaḥ ṅga kartanam

original: nāsvatantrāḥ striyo grāhyāḥ pumāṃs tatrāparādhyati /
analyzed: na asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ grāhyāḥ pumān tatra aparādhyati

original: prabhuṇā śāsanīyās tā rājā tu puruṣaṃ nayet // K_488 //
analyzed: prabhuṇā śāsanīyāḥ tāḥ rājā tu puruṣam nayet

original: proṣitasvāmikā nārī prāpitā yady api grahe /
analyzed: proṣita svāmikā nārī prāpitā yadi api grahe

original: tāvat sā bandhane sthāpyā yāvat pratyāgataḥ prabhuḥ // K_489 //
analyzed: tāvat sā bandhane sthāpyā yāvat pratyāgataḥ prabhuḥ

original: kalpito yasya yo daṇḍas tv aparādhasya yatnataḥ /
analyzed: kalpitaḥ yasya yaḥ daṇḍaḥ tu aparādhasya yatnataḥ

original: paṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ tu syāt tanmūlyaṃ vātha rājani // K_490 //
analyzed: paṇānām grahaṇam tu syāt tad mūlyam vā atha rājani

original: māṣapādo dvipādo vā daṇḍo yatra pravartitaḥ /
analyzed: māṣa pādaḥ dvi pādaḥ vā daṇḍaḥ yatra pravartitaḥ

original: anirdiṣṭaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ māṣakaṃ tu prakalpayet // K_491 //
analyzed: anirdiṣṭam tu vijñeyam māṣakam tu prakalpayet

original: yatrokto māṣakair daṇḍo rājataṃ tatra nirdiśeta /
analyzed: yatra uktaḥ māṣakaiḥ daṇḍaḥ rājatam tatra

original: kṛṣṇalaiś coktam eva syād uktadaṇḍaviniścayaḥ // K_492 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇalaiḥ ca uktam eva syāt ukta daṇḍa viniścayaḥ

original: māṣo viṃśatibhāgas tu jñeyaḥ kārṣāpaṇasya tu /
analyzed: māṣaḥ viṃśati bhāgaḥ tu jñeyaḥ kārṣāpaṇasya tu

original: kākaṇī tu caturbhāgā māṣakasya paṇasya ca // K_493 //
analyzed: kākaṇī tu catur bhāgā māṣakasya paṇasya ca

original: pañcanadyāḥ pradeśe tu saṃjñeyaṃ vyavahārikī /
analyzed: pañca nadyāḥ pradeśe tu saṃjñā iyam vyavahārikī

original: kārṣāpaṇoṇḍikā jñeyās tāś catasras tu dhānakaḥ /
analyzed: jñeyāḥ tāḥ catasraḥ tu dhānakaḥ

original: te dvādaśa suvarṇās tu dīnāraś citrakaḥ smṛtaḥ // K_494 //
analyzed: te dvādaśa suvarṇāḥ tu dīnāraḥ citrakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: [punarnyāyaḥ]
analyzed: punar nyāyaḥ

original: asat sad iti yaḥ pakṣaḥ sabhyair evāvadhāryate /
analyzed: asat sat iti yaḥ pakṣaḥ sabhyaiḥ eva avadhāryate

original: tīritaḥ so 'nuśiṣṭas tu sākṣivākyāt prakīrtitaḥ // K_495 //
analyzed: tīritaḥ saḥ nuśiṣṭaḥ tu sākṣi vākyāt prakīrtitaḥ

original: kulādibhir niścite 'pi santoṣaṃ na gatas tu yaḥ /
analyzed: kula ādibhiḥ niścite santoṣam na gataḥ tu yaḥ

original: vicārya tat kṛtaṃ rājā kukṛtaṃ punar uddharet // K_496 //
analyzed: vicārya tat kṛtam rājā kukṛtam punar uddharet

original: [ṛṇādāne vṛddhivicāraḥ]
analyzed: ṛṇa ādāne vṛddhi vicāraḥ

original: na strībhyo dāsabālebhyaḥ prayacchet kvacid uddhṛtam /
analyzed: na strībhyaḥ dāsa bālebhyaḥ prayacchet kvacid uddhṛtam

original: dātā na labhate tat tu tebhyo dadyāt tu yad vasu // K_497 //
analyzed: dātā na labhate tat tu tebhyaḥ dadyāt tu yat vasu

original: ṛṇikena tu yā vṛddhir adhikā saṃprakalpitā /
analyzed: ṛṇikena tu yā vṛddhiḥ adhikā saṃprakalpitā

original: āpatkālakṛtā nityaṃ dātavyā kāritā tu sā /
analyzed: āpad kāla kṛtā nityam dātavyā kāritā tu sā

original: anyathā kāritā vṛddhir na dātavyā kathaṃcana // K_498 //
analyzed: anyathā kāritā vṛddhiḥ na dātavyā kathaṃcana

original: ekāntenaiva vṛddhiṃ tu śodhayed yatra carṇikam /
analyzed: ekāntena eva vṛddhim tu śodhayet yatra ca ṛṇikam

original: pratikālaṃ dadāty eva śikhāvṛddhis tu sā smṛtā // K_499 //
analyzed: prati kālam dadāti eva śikhāvṛddhiḥ tu sā smṛtā

original: gṛhāt toṣaḥ phalaṃ kṣetrād bhogalābhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // K_500 //
analyzed: gṛhāt toṣaḥ phalam kṣetrāt bhoga lābhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: ādhibhogas tv aśeṣo yo vṛddhis tu parikalpitaḥ /
analyzed: ādhi bhogaḥ tu aśeṣaḥ yaḥ vṛddhiḥ tu parikalpitaḥ

original: prayogo yatra caivaṃ syād ādhibhogaḥ sa ucyate // K_501 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ yatra ca evam syāt ādhi bhogaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: [ākṛtavṛddhiḥ]
analyzed: ākṛta vṛddhiḥ

original: yo yācitakam ādāya tam adattvā diśaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: yaḥ yācitakam ādāya tam a dattvā diśam vrajet

original: ūrdhvaṃ saṃvatsarāt tasya taddhanaṃ vṛddhim āpnuyāt // K_502 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam saṃvatsarāt tasya tat dhanam vṛddhim āpnuyāt

original: kṛtvoddhāram adattvā yo yācitas tu diśaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: kṛtvā uddhāram a dattvā yaḥ yācitaḥ tu diśam vrajet

original: ūrdhvaṃ māsatrayāt tasya taddhanaṃ vṛddhim āpnuyāt // K_503 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam māsa trayāt tasya tat dhanam vṛddhim āpnuyāt

original: svadeśe 'pi sthito yas tu na dadyād yācitaḥ kvacit /
analyzed: sva deśe sthitaḥ yaḥ tu na dadyāt yācitaḥ kvacid

original: taṃ tato 'kāritāṃ vṛddhim anicchantaṃ ca dāpayet // K_504 //
analyzed: tam kāritām vṛddhim an icchantam ca dāpayet

original: prītidattaṃ na vardheta yāvan na pratiyācitam /
analyzed: prīti dattam na vardheta yāvat na pratiyācitam

original: yācyamānam adattaṃ ced vardhate pañcakaṃ śatam // K_505 //
analyzed: yācyamānam adattam ced vardhate pañcakam śatam

original: nikṣiptaṃ vṛddhiśeṣaṃ ca krayavikrayam eva ca /
analyzed: nikṣiptam vṛddhi śeṣam ca kraya vikrayam eva ca

original: yācyamānam adattaṃ ced vardhate pañcakaṃ śatam // K_506 //
analyzed: yācyamānam adattam ced vardhate pañcakam śatam

original: paṇyaṃ gṛhītvā yo mūlyam adattvaiva diśaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: paṇyam gṛhītvā yaḥ mūlyam a dattvā eva diśam vrajet

original: ṛtutrayasyāpariṣṭāt taddhanaṃ vṛddhim āpnuyāt // K_507 //
analyzed: ṛtu trayasya apariṣṭāt tat dhanam vṛddhim āpnuyāt

original: carmasasyāsavadyūte paṇyamūlye ca sarvadā /
analyzed: carma sasya āsava dyūte paṇya mūlye ca sarvadā

original: strīśulkeṣu na vṛddhiḥ syāt prātibhāvyāgateṣu ca // K_508 //
analyzed: strī śulkeṣu na vṛddhiḥ syāt prātibhāvya āgateṣu ca

original: [vṛddheḥ parimāṇaṃ]
analyzed: vṛddheḥ parimāṇam

original: grāhyaṃ syād dviguṇaṃ dravyaṃ prayuktaṃ dhanināṃ sadā /
analyzed: grāhyam syāt dviguṇam dravyam prayuktam dhaninām sadā

original: labhate cen na dviguṇaṃ punar vṛddhiṃ prakalpayet // K_509 //
analyzed: labhate ced na dviguṇam punar vṛddhim prakalpayet

original: maṇimuktāpravālānāṃ suvarṇarajatasya ca /
analyzed: maṇi muktā pravālānām suvarṇa rajatasya ca

original: tiṣṭhati dviguṇā vṛddhiḥ phālakaiṭāvikasya ca // K_510 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhati dviguṇā vṛddhiḥ phāla kaiṭāvikasya ca

original: tailānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ madyānām atha sarpiṣām /
analyzed: tailānām ca eva sarveṣām madyānām atha sarpiṣām

original: vṛddhir aṣṭaguṇā jñeyā guḍasya lavaṇasya ca // K_511 //
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ aṣṭaguṇā jñeyā guḍasya lavaṇasya ca

original: kupyaṃ pañcaguṇaṃ bhūmis tathaivāṣṭaguṇā matā /
analyzed: kupyam pañcaguṇam bhūmiḥ tathā eva aṣṭaguṇā matā

original: sadya eveti vacanāt sadya eva pradīyate // K_512 //
analyzed: sadyas eva iti vacanāt sadyas eva pradīyate

original: [ṛṇoddharaṇaṃ]
analyzed: ṛṇa uddharaṇam

original: [anekarṇasamavāye vidhiḥ]
analyzed: aneka ṛṇa samavāye vidhiḥ

original: ekāhe likhitaṃ yat tu tat tu kuryād ṛṇaṃ samam /
analyzed: eka ahe likhitam yat tu tat tu kuryāt ṛṇam samam

original: grahaṇaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ lābham anyathā tu yathākramam // K_513 //
analyzed: grahaṇam rakṣaṇam lābham anyathā tu yathākramam

original: nānāṛṇasamavāye tu yad yat pūrvakṛtaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: nānā ṛṇa samavāye tu yat yat pūrva kṛtam bhavet

original: tat tad evāgrato deyaṃ rājñaḥ syāc śrotriyād anu // K_514 //
analyzed: tat tat eva agratas deyam rājñaḥ syāt śrotriyāt anu

original: yasya dravyeṇa yat paṇyaṃ sādhitaṃ yo vibhāvayet /
analyzed: yasya dravyeṇa yat paṇyam sādhitam yaḥ vibhāvayet

original: tad dravyam ṛṇikenaiva dātavyaṃ tasya nānyathā // K_515 //
analyzed: tat dravyam ṛṇikena eva dātavyam tasya na anyathā

original: [ādhiḥ]
analyzed: ādhiḥ

original: dravyaṃ gṛhītvā vṛddhyarthaṃ bhogayogyaṃ dadāti cet /
analyzed: dravyam gṛhītvā vṛddhi artham bhoga yogyam dadāti ced

original: jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ vāpi bhogyādhiḥ sa tu kathyate /
analyzed: jaṅgamam sthāvaram vā api bhogya ādhiḥ sa tu kathyate

original: mūlyaṃ tadādhikaṃ dattvā svakṣetrādikam āpnuyāt // K_516 //
analyzed: mūlyam tadā adhikam dattvā sva kṣetra ādikam āpnuyāt

original: ādhim ekaṃ dvayor yas tu kuryāt kā pratipad bhavet /
analyzed: ādhim ekam dvayoḥ yaḥ tu kuryāt kā pratipad bhavet

original: tayoḥ pūrvakṛtaṃ grāhyaṃ tatkartā coradaṇḍabhāk // K_517 //
analyzed: tayoḥ pūrva kṛtam grāhyam tad kartā cora daṇḍa bhāj

original: ādhānaṃ vikrayo dānaṃ lekhyasākṣyakṛtaṃ yadā /
analyzed: ādhānam vikrayaḥ dānam lekhya sākṣya kṛtam yadā

original: ekakriyāviruddhaṃ tu lekhyaṃ tatrāpahārakam // K_518 //
analyzed: eka kriyā viruddham tu lekhyam tatra apahārakam

original: anirdiṣṭaṃ ca nirdiṣṭam ekatra ca vilekhitam /
analyzed: anirdiṣṭam ca nirdiṣṭam ekatra ca vilekhitam

original: viśeṣalikhitaṃ jyāya iti kātyāyano 'bravīt // K_519 //
analyzed: viśeṣa likhitam jyāyaḥ iti kātyāyanaḥ bravīt

original: yo 'vidyamānaṃ prathamam anirdiṣṭasvarūpakam /
analyzed: yaḥ vidyamānam prathamam a nirdiṣṭa svarūpakam

original: ākāśabhūtam ādadhyād anirdiṣṭaṃ ca tad bhavet /
analyzed: ākāśa bhūtam ādadhyāt a nirdiṣṭam ca tat bhavet

original: yad yat tadāsya vidyeta tad ādiṣṭaṃ vinirdiśet // K_520 //
analyzed: yat yat tadā asya vidyeta tat ādiṣṭam vinirdiśet

original: yas tu sarvasvam ādiśya prāk paścān nāmacihnitam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu sarva svam ādiśya prāk paścāt nāma cihnitam

original: ādadhyāt tat kathaṃ na syāc cihnitaṃ balavattaram // K_521 //
analyzed: ādadhyāt tat katham na syāt cihnitam balavattaram

original: maryādācihnitaṃ kṣetraṃ grāmaṃ vāpi yadā bhavet /
analyzed: maryādā cihnitam kṣetram grāmam vā api yadā bhavet

original: grāmādayaś ca likhyante tadā siddhim avāpnuyāt // K_522 //
analyzed: grāma ādayaḥ ca likhyante tadā siddhim avāpnuyāt

original: ādhīkṛtaṃ tu yat kiṃcid vinaṣṭaṃ daivarājataḥ /
analyzed: ādhīkṛtam tu yat kiṃcid vinaṣṭam daiva rājataḥ

original: tatra ṛṇaṃ sodayaṃ dāpyo dhaninām adhamarṇakaḥ // K_523 //
analyzed: tatra ṛṇam sa udayam dāpyaḥ dhaninām adhama ṛṇakaḥ

original: na ced dhanikadoṣeṇa nipated vā mriyeta vā /
analyzed: na ced dhanika doṣeṇa nipatet vā mriyeta vā

original: ādhim anyaṃ sa dāpyaḥ syād ṛṇān mucyeta narṇikaḥ // K_524 //
analyzed: ādhim anyam sa dāpyaḥ syāt ṛṇāt mucyeta na ṛṇikaḥ

original: akāmam ananujñātam adhiṃ yaḥ karma kārayet /
analyzed: akāmam ananujñātam adhim yaḥ karma kārayet

original: bhoktā karmaphalaṃ dāpyo vṛddhiṃ vā labhate na saḥ // K_525 //
analyzed: bhoktā karma phalam dāpyaḥ vṛddhim vā labhate na saḥ

original: yas tv ādhiṃ karma kurvāṇaṃ vācā daṇḍena karmabhiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu ādhim karma kurvāṇam vācā daṇḍena karmabhiḥ

original: pīḍayed bhatsayec caiva prāpnuyāt pūrvasāhasam // K_526 //
analyzed: pīḍayet bhatsayet ca eva prāpnuyāt pūrvasāhasam

original: balādakāmaṃ yatrādhim anisṛṣṭaṃ praveśayet /
analyzed: balāt akāmam yatra ādhim a nisṛṣṭam praveśayet

original: prāpnuyāt sāhasaṃ pūrvam ādhātā cādhim āpnuyāt // K_527 //
analyzed: prāpnuyāt sāhasam pūrvam ādhātā ca ādhim āpnuyāt

original: ādhiṃ duṣṭena lekhyena bhuṅkte yam ṛṇikād dhanī /
analyzed: ādhim duṣṭena lekhyena bhuṅkte yam ṛṇikāt dhanī

original: nṛpo damaṃ dāpayitvā ādhikekhyaṃ vināśayet // K_528 //
analyzed: nṛpaḥ damam dāpayitvā ādhika īkhyam vināśayet

original: ādhātā yatra na syāt tu dhanī bandhaṃ nivedayet /
analyzed: ādhātā yatra na syāt tu dhanī bandham nivedayet

original: rājñas tataḥ sa vikhyāto vikreya iti dhāraṇā /
analyzed: rājñaḥ tatas sa vikhyātaḥ vikreyaḥ iti dhāraṇā

original: savṛddhikaṃ gṛhītvā tu śeṣaṃ rājan yathārpayet // K_529 //
analyzed: sa vṛddhikam gṛhītvā tu śeṣam rājan yathā arpayet

original: [pratibhūvidhānam]
analyzed: pratibhū vidhānam

original: dānopasthānavādeṣu viśvāsaśapathāya ca /
analyzed: dāna upasthāna vādeṣu viśvāsa śapathāya ca

original: lagnakaṃ kārayed evaṃ yathāyogaṃ viparyaye // K_530 //
analyzed: lagnakam kārayet evam yathāyogam viparyaye

original: darśanapratibhūryas taṃ deśe kāle na darśayet /
analyzed: darśana pratibhūḥ yaḥ tam deśe kāle na darśayet

original: nibandham āvahet tatra daivarājakṛtād ṛte // K_531 //
analyzed: nibandham āvahet tatra daiva rāja kṛtāt ṛte

original: naṣṭasyānveṣaṇārthaṃ tu deyaṃ pakṣatrayaṃ param /
analyzed: naṣṭasya anveṣaṇa artham tu deyam pakṣa trayam param

original: yady asau darśayet tatra moktavyaḥ pratibhūr bhavet // K_532 //
analyzed: yadi asau darśayet tatra moktavyaḥ pratibhūḥ bhavet

original: kāle vyatīte pratibhūr yadi taṃ naiva darśayet /
analyzed: kāle vyatīte pratibhūḥ yadi tam nā eva darśayet

original: sa tam arthaṃ pradāpyaḥ syāt prete caivaṃ vidhīyate // K_533 //
analyzed: sa tam artham pradāpyaḥ syāt prete ca evam vidhīyate

original: gṛhītvā bandhakaṃ yatra darśane 'sya sthito bhavet /
analyzed: gṛhītvā bandhakam yatra darśane sya sthitaḥ bhavet

original: vinā pitrā dhanaṃ tasmād dāpyaḥ syāt tad ṛṇaṃ sutaḥ // K_534 //
analyzed: vinā pitrā dhanam tasmāt dāpyaḥ syāt tat ṛṇam sutaḥ

original: yo yasya pratibhūs tiṣṭhed darśanāyeha mānavaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yasya pratibhūḥ tiṣṭhet darśanāya iha mānavaḥ

original: adarśayan sa taṃ tasmai prayacchet svadhanād ṛṇam // K_535 //
analyzed: adarśayan sa tam tasmai prayacchet sva dhanāt ṛṇam

original: ādyau tu vitathe dāpyau tatkālāveditaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: ādyau tu vitathe dāpyau tad kāla āveditam dhanam

original: uttarau tu visaṃvāde tau vinā tatsutau tathā // K_536 //
analyzed: uttarau tu visaṃvāde tau vinā tad sutau tathā

original: ekacchāyāśrite sarvaṃ dadyāt tu proṣite sutaḥ /
analyzed: ekacchāyāśrite sarvam dadyāt tu proṣite sutaḥ

original: mṛte pitari pitṛaṃśaṃ pararṇaṃ na bṛhaspatiḥ // K_537 //
analyzed: mṛte pitari pitṛ aṃśam para ṛṇam na bṛhaspatiḥ

original: ekacchāyāpraviṣṭānāṃ dāpyo tas tatra dṛśyate /
analyzed: eka chāyā praviṣṭānām dāpya u taḥ tatra dṛśyate

original: proṣite tatsutaḥ sarvaṃ pitraṃśaṃ tu mṛte sutaḥ // K_538 //
analyzed: proṣite tad sutaḥ sarvam pitṛ aṃśam tu mṛte sutaḥ

original: prātibhāvyaṃ tu yo dadyāt pīḍitaḥ pratibhāvitaḥ /
analyzed: prātibhāvyam tu yaḥ dadyāt pīḍitaḥ pratibhāvitaḥ

original: tripakṣāt parataḥ so 'rthaṃ dviguṇaṃ labdhum arhati // K_539 //
analyzed: tri pakṣāt paratas saḥ ṛtham dviguṇam labdhum arhati

original: yasyārthe yena yad dattaṃ vidhinābhyarthitena tu /
analyzed: yasya arthe yena yat dattam vidhinā abhyarthitena tu

original: sākṣibhir bhāvitenaiva pratibhūs tat samāpnuyāt // K_540 //
analyzed: sākṣibhiḥ bhāvitena eva pratibhūḥ tat samāpnuyāt

original: satyaṃkāravisaṃvāde dviguṇaṃ pratidāpayet /
analyzed: satyaṃkāra visaṃvāde dviguṇam pratidāpayet

original: akurvatas tu tad dhāni satyaṃkāraprayojanam // K_541 //
analyzed: a kurvataḥ tu tat satyaṃkāra prayojanam

original: [pitrādibhiḥ kṛtam ṛṇaṃ kena pratideyam]
analyzed: pitṛ ādibhiḥ kṛtam ṛṇam kena pratideyam

original: kuṭumbārtham aśaktena gṛhītaṃ vyādhitena vā /
analyzed: kuṭumba artham aśaktena gṛhītam vyādhitena vā

original: upaplavanimitte ca vidyād āpatkṛte tu tat // K_542 //
analyzed: upaplava nimitte ca vidyāt āpad kṛte tu tat

original: kanyāvaivāhikaṃ caiva pretakārye ca yatkṛtam /
analyzed: kanyā vaivāhikam ca eva preta kārye ca yat kṛtam

original: etat sarvaṃ pradātavyaṃ kuṭumbena kṛtaṃ prabhoḥ // K_543 //
analyzed: etat sarvam pradātavyam kuṭumbena kṛtam prabhoḥ

original: ṛṇaṃ putrakṛtaṃ pitrā na deyam iti dharmataḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇam putra kṛtam pitrā na deyam iti dharmataḥ

original: deyaṃ pratiśrutaṃ yat syāt yac ca syād anumoditam // K_544 //
analyzed: deyam pratiśrutam yat syāt yat ca syāt anumoditam

original: proṣitasyāmatenāpi kuṭumbārtham ṛṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: kuṭumba artham ṛṇam kṛtam

original: dāsastrīmātṛśiṣyair vā dadyāt putreṇa vā bhṛguḥ // K_545 //
analyzed: dāsa strī mātṛ śiṣyaiḥ vā dadyāt putreṇa vā bhṛguḥ

original: bhartrā putreṇa vā sārdhaṃ kevalenātmanā kṛtam /
analyzed: bhartrā putreṇa vā sārdham kevalena ātmanā kṛtam

original: ṛṇam evaṃvidhaṃ deyaṃ nānyathā tatkṛtaṃ striyā // K_546 //
analyzed: ṛṇam evaṃvidham deyam na anyathā tat kṛtam striyā

original: martukāmena yā bhartrā proktā deyam ṛṇaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: martu kāmena yā bhartrā proktā deyam ṛṇam tvayā

original: aprapannāpi sā dāpyā dhanaṃ yady āśritaṃ striyām // K_547 //
analyzed: aprapannā api sā dāpyā dhanam yadi āśritam striyām

original: vidyamāneapi rogārte svadeśāt proṣite 'pi vā /
analyzed: vidyamāne api roga ārte sva deśāt proṣite vā

original: viṃśāt saṃvatsarād deyaṃ ṛṇaṃ pitṛkṛtaṃ sutaiḥ // K_548 //
analyzed: viṃśāt saṃvatsarāt deyam ṛṇam pitṛ kṛtam sutaiḥ

original: vyādhitonmattavṛddhānāṃ tathā dīrghapravāsinām /
analyzed: vyādhita unmatta vṛddhānām tathā dīrghapravāsinām

original: ṛṇam evaṃvidhaṃ putrāñ jīvatām api dāpayet // K_549 //
analyzed: ṛṇam evaṃvidham jīvatām api dāpayet

original: sāṃnidhye 'pi pituḥ putrair ṛṇaṃ deyaṃ vibhāvitam /
analyzed: sāṃnidhye pi pituḥ putraiḥ ṛṇam deyam vibhāvitam

original: jātyandhapatitonmatta- kṣayaśvitrādirogiṇaḥ // K_550 //
analyzed: jāti andha patita unmatta kṣaya śvitra ādi rogiṇaḥ

original: pitṝṇāṃ sūnubhir jātair dānenaivādhamād ṛṇāt /
analyzed: pitṝṇām sūnubhiḥ jātaiḥ dānena eva adhamāt ṛṇāt

original: vimokṣas tu yatas tasmād icchanti pitaraḥ sutān // K_551 //
analyzed: vimokṣaḥ tu yatas tasmāt icchanti pitaraḥ sutān

original: nāprāptavyavahāreṇa pitary uparate kvacit /
analyzed: na aprāptavyavahāreṇa pitari uparate kvacid

original: kāle tu vidhinā deyaṃ vaseyur narake 'nyathā // K_552 //
analyzed: kāle tu vidhinā deyam vaseyuḥ narake nyathā

original: aprāptavyavahāraś cet svatantro 'pīha narṇabhāk /
analyzed: aprāptavyavahāraḥ ced svatantraḥ u pi iha na ṛṇa bhāj

original: svātantryaṃ hi smṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhe guṇavayaḥkṛtam // K_553 //
analyzed: svātantryam hi smṛtam jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhe guṇa vayaḥ kṛtam

original: yad dṛṣṭaṃ dattaśeṣaṃ vā deyaṃ paitāmahaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: yat dṛṣṭam datta śeṣam vā deyam paitāmaham tu tat

original: sadoṣaṃ vyāhataṃ pitrā naiva deyam ṛṇaṃ kvacit // K_554 //
analyzed: sa doṣam vyāhatam pitrā nā eva deyam ṛṇam kvacid

original: pitrā dṛṣṭam ṛṇaṃ yat tu kramāyātaṃ pitāmahāt /
analyzed: pitrā dṛṣṭam ṛṇam yat tu krama āyātam pitāmahāt

original: nirdoṣaṃ noddhṛtaṃ putrair deyaṃ pautrais tu tadbhṛguḥ // K_555 //
analyzed: nirdoṣam nā uddhṛtam putraiḥ deyam pautraiḥ tu tad bhṛguḥ

original: paitāmahaṃ tu yat putrair na dattaṃ rogibhiḥ sthitaiḥ /
analyzed: paitāmaham tu yat putraiḥ na dattam rogibhiḥ sthitaiḥ

original: tasmād evaṃvidhaṃ pautrair deyaṃ paitāmahaṃ samam // K_556 //
analyzed: tasmāt evaṃvidham pautraiḥ deyam paitāmaham samam

original: ṛṇaṃ tu dāpayet putraṃ yadi syān nirupadravaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇam tu dāpayet putram yadi syāt nirupadravaḥ

original: draviṇārhaś ca dhuryaś ca nānyathā dāpayet sutam // K_557 //
analyzed: draviṇa arhaḥ ca dhuryaḥ ca na anyathā dāpayet sutam

original: yad deyaṃ pitṛbhir nityaṃ tadabhāve tu taddhanāt /
analyzed: yat deyam pitṛbhiḥ nityam tad abhāve tu tad dhanāt

original: tad dhanaṃ putraputrair vā deyaṃ tatsvāmine tadā // K_558 //
analyzed: tat dhanam putra putraiḥ vā deyam tad svāmine tadā

original: pitrarṇe vidyamāne tu na ca putro dhanaṃ haret /
analyzed: pitrā ṛṇe vidyamāne tu na ca putraḥ dhanam haret

original: deyaṃ taddhanike dravyaṃ mṛte gṛhṇaṃs tu dāpyate // K_559 //
analyzed: deyam tad dhanike dravyam mṛte gṛhṇan tu dāpyate

original: putrābhāve tu dātavyam ṛṇaṃ pautreṇa yatnataḥ /
analyzed: putra abhāve tu dātavyam ṛṇam pautreṇa yatnataḥ

original: caturthena na dātavyaṃ tasmāt tad vinirvartate // K_560 //
analyzed: caturthena na dātavyam tasmāt tat vinirvartate

original: prātibhāvyāgataṃ pautrair dātavyaṃ na tu tatkvacit /
analyzed: prātibhāvya āgatam pautraiḥ dātavyam na tu tat kvacid

original: putreṇāpi samaṃ deyam ṛṇaṃ sarvatra paitṛkam // K_561 //
analyzed: putreṇa api samam deyam ṛṇam sarvatra paitṛkam

original: rikthahartrā ṛṇaṃ deyaṃ tadabhāve ca yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: riktha hartrā ṛṇam deyam tad abhāve ca yoṣitaḥ

original: putraiś ca tadabhāve 'nyai rikthabhāgbhir yathākramam // K_562 //
analyzed: putraiḥ ca tad abhāve riktha bhāgbhiḥ yathākramam

original: yāvan na paitṛkaṃ dravyaṃ vidyamānaṃ labhet sutaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat na paitṛkam dravyam vidyamānam labhet sutaḥ

original: susamṛddo 'pi dāpyaḥ syāt tāvan naivādhamarṇikaḥ // K_563 //
analyzed: dāpyaḥ syāt tāvat na eva adhamarṇikaḥ

original: likhitaṃ muktakaṃ vāpi deyaṃ yat tu pratiśrutam /
analyzed: likhitam muktakam vā api deyam yat tu pratiśrutam

original: parapūrvastriyai yat tu vidyāt kāmakṛtaṃ nṛṇām // K_564 //
analyzed: para pūrva striyai yat tu vidyāt kāma kṛtam nṛṇām

original: yatra hiṃsāṃ samutpādya krodhād dravyaṃ vināśya vā /
analyzed: yatra hiṃsām samutpādya krodhāt dravyam vināśya vā

original: uktaṃ tuṣṭikaraṃ yat tu vidyād krodhakṛtaṃ tu tat // K_565 //
analyzed: uktam tuṣṭi karam yat tu vidyāt krodha kṛtam tu tat

original: svasthenārtena vā deyaṃ bhāvitaṃ dharmakāraṇāt /
analyzed: svasthena ārtena vā deyam bhāvitam dharma kāraṇāt

original: adattvā tu mṛte dāpyas tatsuto nātra saṃśayaḥ // K_566 //
analyzed: a dattvā tu mṛte dāpyaḥ tad sutaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: nirdhanair anapatyais tu yat kṛtaṃ śauṇḍikādibhiḥ /
analyzed: nirdhanaiḥ anapatyaiḥ tu yat kṛtam śauṇḍika ādibhiḥ

original: tatstrīṇām upabhoktā tu dadyāt tadṛṇam eva hi // K_567 //
analyzed: tad strīṇām upabhoktā tu dadyāt tat ṛṇam eva hi

original: śauṇḍikavyādhajanaka- gopanāvikayoṣitām /
analyzed: śauṇḍika vyādha janaka gopa nāvika yoṣitām

original: adhiṣṭhātā ṛṇaṃ dāpyas tāsāṃ bhartṛkriyāsu tat // K_568 //
analyzed: adhiṣṭhātā ṛṇam dāpyaḥ tāsām bhartṛ kriyāsu tat

original: na ca bhāryākṛtam ṛṇaṃ kathaṃcit patyur ābhavet /
analyzed: na ca bhāryā kṛtam ṛṇam kathaṃcid patyuḥ ābhavet

original: āpatkṛtād ṛte puṃsāṃ kuṭumbārthe hi vistaraḥ // K_569 //
analyzed: āpad kṛtāt ṛte puṃsām kuṭumba arthe hi vistaraḥ

original: anyatra rajakavyādha- gopaśauṇḍikayoṣitām /
analyzed: anyatra rajaka vyādha gopa śauṇḍika yoṣitām

original: teṣāṃ tu tatparā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbaṃ ca tadāśrayam // K_570 //
analyzed: teṣām tu tad parā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbam ca tad āśrayam

original: amatenaiva putrasya pradhanā yānyam āśrayet /
analyzed: amatena eva putrasya yā anyam āśrayet

original: putreṇaivāpahāryaṃ tad- dhanaṃ duhitṛbhir vinā // K_571 //
analyzed: putreṇa eva apahāryam tat dhanam duhitṛbhiḥ vinā

original: ṛṇārtham āharet tantuṃ na sukhārthaṃ kadācana /
analyzed: ṛṇa artham āharet tantum na sukha artham kadācana

original: ayukte kāraṇe yasmāt pitarau tu na dāpayet // K_572 //
analyzed: ayukte kāraṇe yasmāt pitarā tu na dāpayet

original: yā svaputraṃ tu jahyāt strī samartham api putriṇī /
analyzed: yā sva putram tu jahyāt strī samartham api putriṇī

original: āhṛtya strīdhanaṃ tatra pitryarṇaṃ śodhayen manuḥ // K_573 //
analyzed: āhṛtya strīdhanam tatra pitrya ṛṇam śodhayet manuḥ

original: bālaputrādhikārthā ca bhartāraṃ yānyam āśritā /
analyzed: bāla putra adhika arthā ca bhartāram yā anyam āśritā

original: āśritas tadṛṇaṃ dadyād bālaputrāvidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // K_574 //
analyzed: āśritaḥ tad ṛṇam dadyāt smṛtaḥ

original: dīrghapravāsinirbandhu- jaḍonmattārtaliṅginām /
analyzed: dīrgha pravāsi nirbandhu jaḍa unmatta ārta liṅginām

original: jīvatām api dātavyaṃ tatstrīdravyasamāśritaiḥ // K_575 //
analyzed: jīvatām api dātavyam tat strī dravya samāśritaiḥ

original: vyasanābhiplute putre bālo vā yatna dṛśyate /
analyzed: vyasana abhiplute putre bālaḥ vā dṛśyate

original: dravyahṛd dāpyate tatra tasyābhāve purandhrihṛt // K_576 //
analyzed: dravya hṛt dāpyate tatra tasya abhāve purandhri hṛt

original: pūrvaṃ dadyād dhanagrāhaḥ putras tasmād anantaram /
analyzed: pūrvam dadyāt dhana grāhaḥ putraḥ tasmāt anantaram

original: yoṣidgrāhaḥ sutābhāve putro vātyantanirdhanaḥ // K_577 //
analyzed: yoṣit grāhaḥ suta abhāve putraḥ vā atyanta nirdhanaḥ

original: deyaṃ bhāryākṛtam ṛṇaṃ bhartrā putreṇa mātṛkam /
analyzed: deyam bhāryā kṛtam ṛṇam bhartrā putreṇa mātṛkam

original: bhartur arthe kṛtaṃ yat syād abhidhāya gate diśam // K_578 //
analyzed: bhartuḥ arthe kṛtam yat syāt abhidhāya gate diśam

original: deyaṃ putrakṛtaṃ tat syād yac ca syād anuvarṇitam /
analyzed: deyam putra kṛtam tat syāt yat ca syāt anuvarṇitam

original: kṛtāsaṃvāditaṃ yac ca śrutvā caivānucoditam // K_579 //
analyzed: kṛta a saṃvāditam yat ca śrutvā ca eva anucoditam

original: [adharmaṇikasyāvarodhādinā dhanoddhāravicāra]
dhāryo 'varuddhas tv ṛṇikaḥ prakāśaṃ janasaṃsadi /
analyzed: dhāryaḥ varuddhaḥ tu ṛṇikaḥ prakāśam jana saṃsadi

original: yāvan na dadyād deyaṃ ca deśācārasthitir yathā // K_580 //
analyzed: yāvat na dadyāt deyam ca deśa ācāra sthitiḥ yathā

original: viṇmūtraśaṅkā yasya syād dhāryamāṇasya dehinaḥ /
analyzed: viṣ mūtra śaṅkā yasya syāt dhāryamāṇasya dehinaḥ

original: pṛṣṭhato vānugantavyo nibaddhaṃ vā samutsṛjet // K_581 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas vā anugantavyaḥ nibaddham vā samutsṛjet

original: sa kṛtapratibhūś caiva moktavyaḥ syād dine dine /
analyzed: sa kṛta pratibhūḥ ca eva moktavyaḥ syāt dine dine

original: āhārakāle rātrau ca nibandhe pratibhūḥ sthitaḥ // K_582 //
analyzed: āhāra kāle rātrau ca nibandhe pratibhūḥ sthitaḥ

original: yo darśanapratibhuvaṃ nādhigacchen na cāśrayet /
analyzed: yaḥ darśana pratibhuvam na adhigacchet na ca āśrayet

original: sa cārake niroddhavyaḥ sthāpyo vāvedya rakṣiṇaḥ // K_583 //
analyzed: sa cārake niroddhavyaḥ sthāpyaḥ vā āvedya rakṣiṇaḥ

original: na cārake niroddhavya āryaḥ prātyayikaḥ śuciḥ /
analyzed: na cārake niroddhavyaḥ āryaḥ prātyayikaḥ śuciḥ

original: so 'nibaddhaḥ pramoktavyo nibaddhaḥ śapathena vā // K_584 //
analyzed: saḥ nibaddhaḥ pramoktavyaḥ nibaddhaḥ śapathena vā

original: pīḍanenoparodhena sādhayed ṛṇikaṃ dhanī /
analyzed: pīḍanena uparodhena sādhayet ṛṇikam dhanī

original: karmaṇā vyavahāreṇa sāntvenādau vibhāvitaḥ // K_585 //
analyzed: karmaṇā vyavahāreṇa sāntvena ādau vibhāvitaḥ

original: ādadītārtham evaṃ tu vyājenācaritena ca /
analyzed: ādadīta artham evam tu vyājena ācaritena ca

original: karmaṇā kṣatraviśśūdrān samahīnāṃś ca dāpayet // K_586 //
analyzed: karmaṇā kṣatra viś śūdrān sama hīnān ca dāpayet

original: rājānaṃ svāminaṃ vipraṃ sāntvenaiva pradāpayet /
analyzed: rājānam svāminam vipram sāntvena eva pradāpayet

original: rikthinaṃ suhṛdaṃ vāpi cchalenaiva prasādhayet // K_587 //
analyzed: rikthinam suhṛdam vā api chalena eva prasādhayet

original: vaṇijaḥ karṣakāś caiva śilpinaś cābravīd bhṛguḥ /
analyzed: vaṇijaḥ karṣakāḥ ca eva śilpinaḥ ca abravīt bhṛguḥ

original: deśācāreṇa dāpyāḥ syur duṣṭān saṃpīḍya dāpayet // K_588 //
analyzed: deśa ācāreṇa dāpyāḥ syuḥ duṣṭān saṃpīḍya dāpayet

original: pīḍayet tu dhanī yatra ṛṇikaṃ nyāyavādinam /
analyzed: pīḍayet tu dhanī yatra ṛṇikam nyāya vādinam

original: tasmād arthāt sa hīyeta tatsamaṃ cāpnuyād damam // K_589 //
analyzed: tasmāt arthāt sa hīyeta tad samam ca āpnuyāt damam

original: yadi hy ādāv anādiṣṭam aśubhaṃ karma kārayet /
analyzed: yadi hi ādau an ādiṣṭam aśubham karma kārayet

original: prāpnuyāt sāhasaṃ pūrvam ṛṇān mucyeta carṇikaḥ // K_590 //
analyzed: prāpnuyāt sāhasam pūrvam ṛṇāt mucyeta ca ṛṇikaḥ

original: uddhārādikam ādāya svāmine na dadāti yaḥ /
analyzed: uddhāra ādikam ādāya svāmine na dadāti yaḥ

original: sa tasya dāso bhṛtyaḥ strī paśur vā jāyate gṛhe // K_591 //
analyzed: sa tasya dāsaḥ bhṛtyaḥ strī paśuḥ vā jāyate gṛhe

original: [upanidhiḥ]
analyzed: upanidhiḥ

original: trayaproṣitanikṣipta- bandhānvāhitayācitam /
analyzed: traya proṣita nikṣipta bandha anvāhita yācitam

original: vaiśyavṛttyarpitaṃ caiva so 'rthas tūpanidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // K_592 //
analyzed: vaiśya vṛtti arpitam ca eva saḥ ṛthaḥ tu upanidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: nikṣiptaṃ yasya yat kiṃcit tatprayatnena pālayet /
analyzed: nikṣiptam yasya yat kiṃcid tat prayatnena pālayet

original: daivarājakṛtād anyo vināśas tasya kīrtyate // K_593 //
analyzed: daiva rāja kṛtāt anyaḥ vināśaḥ tasya kīrtyate

original: yasya doṣeṇa yat kiṃcid vināśyeta hriyeta vā /
analyzed: yasya doṣeṇa yat kiṃcid vināśyeta hriyeta vā

original: tad dravyaṃ sodayaṃ dāpyo daivarājakṛtād vinā // K_594 //
analyzed: tat dravyam sa udayam dāpyaḥ daiva rāja kṛtāt vinā

original: yācitānantaraṃ nāśe daivarājakṛte 'pi saḥ /
analyzed: yācita anantaram nāśe daiva rāja kṛte pi saḥ

original: grahītā pratidāpyaḥ syān mūlyamātraṃ na saṃśayaḥ // K_595 //
analyzed: grahītā pratidāpyaḥ syāt mūlya mātram na saṃśayaḥ

original: nyāsādikaṃ paradravyaṃ prabhakṣitam upekṣitam /
analyzed: nyāsa ādikam para dravyam prabhakṣitam upekṣitam

original: ajñānanāśitaṃ caiva yena dāpyaḥ sa eva tat // K_596 //
analyzed: ajñāna nāśitam ca eva yena dāpyaḥ saḥ eva tat

original: bhakṣitaṃ sodayaṃ dāpyaḥ samaṃ dāpya upekṣitam /
analyzed: bhakṣitam sa udayam dāpyaḥ samam dāpya upekṣitam

original: kiṃcin nyūnaṃ pradāpyaḥ syād dravyam ajñānanāśitam // K_597 //
analyzed: kiṃcid nyūnam pradāpyaḥ syāt dravyam ajñāna nāśitam

original: arājadaivikenāpi nikṣiptaṃ yatra nāśitam /
analyzed: a rāja daivikena api nikṣiptam yatra nāśitam

original: grahītuḥ saha bhāṇḍena dātur naṣṭaṃ tad ucyate // K_598 //
analyzed: grahītuḥ saha bhāṇḍena dātuḥ naṣṭam tat ucyate

original: jñātvā dravyaviyogaṃ tu dātā yatra vinikṣipet /
analyzed: jñātvā dravya viyogam tu dātā yatra vinikṣipet

original: sarvopāyavināśe 'pi grahītā naiva dāpyate // K_599 //
analyzed: sarva upāya vināśe grahītā na eva dāpyate

original: grāhakasya hi yad doṣān naṣṭaṃ tu grāhakasya tat /
analyzed: grāhakasya hi yat doṣāt naṣṭam tu grāhakasya tat

original: tasmin naṣṭe hṛte vāpi grahītā mūlyam āharet // K_600 //
analyzed: tasmin naṣṭe hṛte vā api grahītā mūlyam āharet

original: grāhyas tūpanidhiḥ kāle kālahīnaṃ tu varjayet /
analyzed: grāhyaḥ tu upanidhiḥ kāle kāla hīnam tu varjayet

original: kālahīnaṃ dadaddaṇḍaṃ dviguṇaṃ ca pradāpyate // K_601 //
analyzed: kāla hīnam dadat daṇḍam dviguṇam ca pradāpyate

original: sarveṣūpanidhiṣv ete vidhayaḥ parikīrtitāḥ // K_602 //
analyzed: sarveṣu upanidhiṣu ete vidhayaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: yaiś ca saṃskriyate nyāso divasaiḥ pariniścitaiḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ ca saṃskriyate nyāsaḥ divasaiḥ pariniścitaiḥ

original: tadūrdhvaṃ sthāpayec śilpī dāpyo daivahate 'pi tat // K_603 //
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam sthāpayet śilpī dāpyaḥ daiva hate tat

original: nyāsadoṣād vināśaḥ syāc śilpinaṃ tan na dāpayet /
analyzed: nyāsa doṣāt vināśaḥ syāt śilpinam tat na dāpayet

original: dāpayec śilpidoṣāt tat saṃskārārthaṃ yad arpitam // K_604 //
analyzed: dāpayet śilpi doṣāt tat saṃskāra artham yat arpitam

original: svalpenāpi ca yat karma naṣṭaṃ ced bhṛtakasya tat /
analyzed: su alpena api ca yat karma naṣṭam ced bhṛtakasya tat

original: paryāptaṃ ditsatas tasya vinaśyet tad agṛhṇataḥ // K_605 //
analyzed: paryāptam ditsataḥ tasya vinaśyet tat agṛhṇataḥ

original: yadi tat kāryam uddiśya kālaṃ pariniyamya vā /
analyzed: yadi tat kāryam uddiśya kālam pariniyamya vā

original: yācito 'rdhakṛte tasminn aprāpte na tu dāpyate // K_606 //
analyzed: yācitaḥ ṛdh kṛte tasmin aprāpte na tu dāpyate

original: prāptakāle kṛte kārye na dadyād yācito 'pi san /
analyzed: prāpta kāle kṛte kārye na dadyāt san

original: tasmin naṣṭe vāpi grahītā mūlyam āharet // K_607 //
analyzed: tasmin naṣṭe vā api grahītā mūlyam āharet

original: yācyamāno na dadyād vā dāpyas tat sodayaṃ bhavet // K_608 //
analyzed: yācyamānaḥ na dadyāt vā dāpyaḥ tat sa udayam bhavet

original: atha kāryavipattis tu tasyaiva svāmino bhavet /
analyzed: atha kārya vipattiḥ tu tasya eva svāminaḥ bhavet

original: aprāpte vai sa kāle tu dāpyas tv ardhakṛte 'pi tat // K_609 //
analyzed: aprāpte vai sa kāle tu dāpyaḥ tu ardha kṛte tat

original: yo yācitakam ādāya na dadyāt pratiyācitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yācitakam ādāya na dadyāt pratiyācitaḥ

original: sa nigṛhya balād dāpyo daṇḍyaś ca na dadāti yaḥ // K_610 //
analyzed: sa nigṛhya balāt dāpyaḥ daṇḍyaḥ ca na dadāti yaḥ

original: anumārgeṇa kāryeṣu anyasmin vacanān mama /
analyzed: anumārgeṇa kāryeṣu anyasmin vacanāt mama

original: dadyās tvam iti yo dattaḥ sa ihānvādhir ucyate // K_611 //
analyzed: dadyāḥ tvam iti yaḥ dattaḥ saḥ iha anvādhiḥ ucyate

original: [asvāmivikrayaḥ]
analyzed: asvāmi vikrayaḥ

original: asvāmivikrayaṃ dānam ādhiṃ ca vinivartayet // K_612 //
analyzed: asvāmi vikrayam dānam ādhim ca vinivartayet

original: abhiyoktā dhanaṃ kuryāt prathamaṃ jñātibhiḥ svakam /
analyzed: abhiyoktā dhanam kuryāt prathamam jñātibhiḥ svakam

original: paścād ātmaviśudhyarthaṃ krayaṃ ketā svabandhubhiḥ // K_613 //
analyzed: paścāt ātma viśudhi artham krayam ketā sva bandhubhiḥ

original: nāṣṭikas tu prakurvīta tad dhanaṃ jñātṛbhiḥ svakam /
analyzed: nāṣṭikaḥ tu prakurvīta tat dhanam jñātṛbhiḥ svakam

original: adattatyaktavikrītaṃ kṛtvā svaṃ labhate dhanam // K_614 //
analyzed: adatta tyakta vikrītam kṛtvā svam labhate dhanam

original: prakāśaṃ vā krayaṃ kuryān mūlaṃ vāpi samarpayet /

analyzed: mūla ānayana kālaḥ tu deyaḥ yojana saṃkhyayā

analyzed: prakāśam ca krayam kuryāt sādhubhiḥ jñātibhiḥ svakaiḥ

original: na tatrānyā kriyā proktā daivikī na ca mānuṣī // K_616 //
analyzed: na tatra anyā kriyā proktā daivikī na ca mānuṣī

original: yadā mūlam upanyasya punar vādī krayaṃ vadet /
analyzed: yadā mūlam upanyasya punar vādī krayam vadet

original: āharen mūlam evāsau na krayeṇa prayojanam // K_617 //
analyzed: āharet mūlam eva asau na krayeṇa prayojanam

original: asamāhāryamūlas tu krayam eva viśodhayet /
analyzed: asamāhārya mūlaḥ tu krayam eva viśodhayet

original: viśodhite kraye rājñā na vaktavyaḥ sa kiṃcana // K_618 //
analyzed: viśodhite kraye rājñā na vaktavyaḥ sa kiṃcana

original: anupasthāpayan mūlaṃ krayaṃ vāpy aviśodhayan /
analyzed: an upasthāpayan mūlam krayam vā api a viśodhayan

original: yathābhiyogaṃ dhanine dhanaṃ dāpyo damaṃ ca saḥ // K_619 //
analyzed: yathā abhiyogam dhanine dhanam dāpyaḥ damam ca saḥ

original: yadi svaṃ naiva kurute jñātibhir nāṣṭiko dhanam /

original: prasaṅgavinivṛttyarthaṃ coravaddaṇḍam arhati // K_620 //
analyzed: prasaṅga vinivṛtti artham cora vat daṇḍam arhati

original: vaniṅvīthīparigataṃ vijñātaṃ rājapuruṣaiḥ /
analyzed: vaniṅ vīthī parigatam vijñātam rāja puruṣaiḥ

original: avijñātāśrayāt krītaṃ vikretā yatra vā mṛtaḥ // K_621 //
analyzed: a vijñāta āśrayāt krītam vikretā yatra vā mṛtaḥ

analyzed: svāmī datvā ardha mūlyam tu pragṛhṇīta dhanam

original: [sambhūyasamutthānam]
analyzed: sambhūya samutthānam

analyzed: samavetāḥ tu ye kecid śalpinaḥ vaṇijaḥ vā

original: avibhajya pṛthagbhūtaiḥ prāptaṃ tatra phalaṃ samam // K_624 //
analyzed: a vibhajya pṛthak bhūtaiḥ prāptam tatra phalam samam

original: bhāṇḍapiṇḍavyayoddhāra- bhārasārārthavīkṣaṇam /
analyzed: bhāṇḍa piṇḍa vyaya uddhāra bhāra sāra artha vīkṣaṇam

analyzed: kuryuḥ te vyabhicāreṇa samayena vyavasthitāḥ

analyzed: bahūnām saṃmataḥ yaḥ tu dadyāt ekaḥ dhanam naraḥ

original: ṛṇaṃ ca kārayed vāpi sarvair eva kṛtaṃ bhavet // K_627 //

original: svecchādeyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ tu rasā dhānyaṃ ca sāvidhi /
analyzed: sva icchā ādeyam hiraṇyam tu rasāḥ dhānyam ca

original: samavetais tu yad dattaṃ prārthanīyaṃ tathaiva tat /

original: na ca yāceta yaḥ kaścil lābhāt sa parihīyate // K_630 //

original: ekadvitricaturbhāgān hareyus te yathottaram // K_632 //

analyzed: para rāṣṭrāt dhanam yat syāt cauraiḥ svāmi ājñayā āhṛtam

original: śūro 'ṃśāṃs trīn samartho dvau śoṣās tv ekaikam eva ca // K_634 //
analyzed: ṃśān trīn samarthaḥ dvau śoṣāḥ tu ekaikam eva ca

original: teṣāṃ cet prasṛtānāṃ yo grahaṇaṃ samavāpnuyāt /
analyzed: teṣām ced prasṛtānām yaḥ grahaṇam samavāpnuyāt

analyzed: nartakānām eṣaḥ eva dharmaḥ sadbhiḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: tālajño labhate hy ardhaṃ gāyanās tu samāṃśinaḥ /
analyzed: tāla jñaḥ labhate hi ardham gāyanāḥ tu sama aṃśinaḥ

analyzed: vaṇijām karṣakāṇām ca corāṇām śilpinām tathā

original: aniyamyāṃśakartṝṇāṃ sarveṣām eṣa nirṇayaḥ // K_637 //
analyzed: aniyamya aṃśa kartṝṇām sarveṣām eṣa nirṇayaḥ

original: [dattānapākarma dattāpradānikaṃ vā]
analyzed: datta anapākarma datta apradānikam vā

original: vikrayaṃ caiva dānaṃ ca na neyāḥ syur anicchavaḥ /
analyzed: vikrayam ca eva dānam ca na neyāḥ syuḥ anicchavaḥ

original: dārāḥ putrāś ca sarvasvam ātmanaiva tu yojayet // K_638 //
analyzed: dārāḥ putrāḥ ca sarva svam ātmanā eva tu yojayet

original: āpatkāle tu kartavyaṃ dānaṃ vikraya eva vā /

analyzed: yat dravyam tat svakam deyam adeyam syāt atas nyathā

original: ataś ca sutadārāṇāṃ vaśitvaṃ tv anuśāsane /

original: vikraye caiva dāne ca vaśitvaṃ na sute pituḥ // K_641 //
analyzed: vikraye ca eva dāne ca vaśi tvam na sute pituḥ

analyzed: na dadyāt dāpyaḥ prāpnuyāt pūrvasāhasam

original: pratiśrutasyādānena dattasyācchādanena ca /

original: kalpakoṭiśataṃ martyas tiryagyonau ca jāyate // K_643 //

original: avijñātopalabdhyarthaṃ dānaṃ yatra nirūpitam /

original: upalabdhikriyālabdhaṃ sā bhṛtiḥ parikīrtitā // K_644 //
analyzed: upalabdhi kriyā labdham sā bhṛtiḥ parikīrtitā

original: bhayatrāṇāya rakṣārthaṃ tathā kāryaprasādhanāt /

original: anena vidhinā labdhaṃ vidyāt pratyupakārataḥ // K_645 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā labdham vidyāt pratyupakārataḥ

original: prāṇasaṃśayam āpannaṃ yo mām uttārayed itaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa saṃśayam āpannam yaḥ mām uttārayet itas

original: sarvasvaṃ tasya dāsyāmīty ukte 'pi na tathā bhavet // K_646 //
analyzed: sarva svam tasya dāsyāmi iti ukte na tathā bhavet

original: kāmakrodhāsvatantrārta- klībonmattapramohitaiḥ /

original: vyatyāsaparihāsāc ca yad dattaṃ tat punar haret // K_647 //

original: yā tu kāryasya siddhyartham utkocā syāt pratiśrutā /

original: tasminn api pasiddhe 'rthe na deyā syāt kathaṃcana // K_648 //

original: atha prāg eva dattā syāt pratidāpyas tathā balāt /
