original: daṇḍaṃ caikādaśaguṇam āhur gārgīyamānavāḥ // K_649 //
analyzed: daṇḍam ca ekādaśaguṇam āhuḥ gārgīya mānavāḥ

original: stenasāhasikodvṛtta- pārajāyikaśaṃsanāt /
analyzed: stena sāhasika udvṛtta pārajāyika śaṃsanāt

original: darśanād vṛttanaṣṭasya tathāsatyapravartanāt // K_650 //
analyzed: darśanāt vṛtta naṣṭasya tathā asatya pravartanāt

original: prāptam etais tu yat kiṃcit tad utkocākhyam ucyate /
analyzed: prāptam etaiḥ tu yat kiṃcid tat utkoca ākhyam ucyate

original: na dātā tatra daṇḍyaḥ syān madhyasthaś caiva doṣabhāk // K_651 //
analyzed: na dātā tatra daṇḍyaḥ syāt madhyasthaḥ ca eva doṣa bhāj

original: niyukto yas tu kāryeṣu sa ced utkocam āpnuyāt /
analyzed: niyuktaḥ yaḥ tu kāryeṣu sa ced utkocam āpnuyāt

original: sa dāpyas taddhanaṃ kṛtsnaṃ damaś caikādaśādhikam // K_652 //
analyzed: sa dāpyaḥ tad dhanam kṛtsnam damaḥ ca ekādaśa adhikam

original: aniyuktas tu kāryārtham utkocaṃ yam avāpnuyāt /
analyzed: a niyuktaḥ tu kārya artham utkocam yam avāpnuyāt

original: kṛtapratyupakārārthas tasya doṣo na vidyate // K_653 //
analyzed: kṛta pratyupakāra arthaḥ tasya doṣaḥ na vidyate

original: svasthenārtena vā dattaṃ śrāvritaṃ dharmakāraṇāt /
analyzed: svasthena ārtena vā dattam śrāvritam dharma kāraṇāt

original: adattvā tu mṛte dāpyas tatsuto nātra saṃśayaḥ // K_654 //
analyzed: a dattvā tu mṛte dāpyaḥ tad sutaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: yogādhamanavikrītaṃ yogadānapatigraham /
analyzed: yogādhamanavikrītam yogadāna pati graham

original: yasya vāpy upadhiṃ paśyet tat sarvaṃ vinivartayet // K_655 //
analyzed: yasya vā api upadhim paśyet tat sarvam vinivartayet

original: bhṛtāvaniścitāyāṃ tu daśabhāgam avāpnuyāt /
analyzed: bhṛtau aniścitāyām tu daśa bhāgam avāpnuyāt

original: lābhagovīryasasyānāṃ vaṇiggopakṛṣīvalāḥ // K_656 //
analyzed: lābha go vīrya sasyānām vaṇij gopa kṛṣīvalāḥ

original: [vetanasyānapākarma]
analyzed: vetanasya an apākarma

original: karmārambhaṃ tu yaḥ kṛtvā siddhaṃ naiva tu kārayet /
analyzed: karma ārambham tu yaḥ kṛtvā siddham na eva tu kārayet

original: balāt kārayitavyo 'sau akurvan daṇḍam arhati // K_657 //
analyzed: balāt kārayitavyaḥ sau akurvan daṇḍam arhati

original: vighnayan vāhako dāpyaḥ prasthāne dviguṇāṃ bhṛtim // K_658 //
analyzed: vighnayan vāhakaḥ dāpyaḥ prasthāne dviguṇām bhṛtim

original: na tu dāpyo hṛtaṃ corair dagdhamūḍhaṃ jalena vā // K_659 //
analyzed: na tu dāpyaḥ hṛtam coraiḥ dagdha mūḍham jalena vā

original: tyajet pathi sahāyaṃ yaḥ śrāntaṃ rogārtam eva vā /
analyzed: tyajet pathi sahāyam yaḥ śrāntam roga ārtam eva vā

original: prāpnuyāt sāhasaṃ pūrvaṃ grāme tryaham apālayan // K_660 //
analyzed: prāpnuyāt sāhasam pūrvam grāme tri aham a pālayan

original: yadā tu pathi tadbhāṇḍam āsidhyeta hriyeta vā /
analyzed: yadā tu pathi tat bhāṇḍam āsidhyeta hriyeta vā

original: yāvān adhvā gatas tena prāpnuyāt tāvatīṃ bhṛtim // K_661 //
analyzed: yāvān adhvā gataḥ tena prāpnuyāt tāvatīm bhṛtim

original: hastyaśvagokharoṣṭrādīn gṛhītvā bhāṭakena yaḥ /
analyzed: hasti aśva go khara uṣṭra ādīn gṛhītvā bhāṭakena yaḥ

original: nārpayet kṛtakṛtyārthaḥ sa tu dāpyaḥ sabhāṭakam // K_662 //
analyzed: na arpayet kṛtakṛtya arthaḥ sa tu dāpyaḥ sa bhāṭakam

original: gṛhavāryāpaṇādīṇi gṛhītvā bhāṭakena yaḥ /
analyzed: gṛha vāri āpaṇa ādīṇi gṛhītvā bhāṭakena yaḥ

original: svāmine nārpayed yāvat tāvad dāpyaḥ sabhāṭakam // K_663 //
analyzed: svāmine na arpayet yāvat tāvat dāpyaḥ sa bhāṭakam

original: [svāmipālavivādaḥ]
analyzed: svāmi pāla vivādaḥ

original: kṣetrārāmavivīteṣu gṛheṣu paśuvāṭiṣu /
analyzed: kṣetra ārāma vivīteṣu gṛheṣu paśu vāṭiṣu

original: grahaṇaṃ tatpraviṣṭānāṃ tāḍanaṃ vā bṛhaspatiḥ // K_664 //
analyzed: grahaṇam tad praviṣṭānām tāḍanam vā bṛhaspatiḥ

original: adhamottamamadhyānāṃ paśūnāṃ caiva tāḍane /
analyzed: adhama uttama madhyānām paśūnām ca eva tāḍane

original: svāmī tu vivaded yatra daṇḍaṃ tatra prakalpayet // K_665 //
analyzed: svāmī tu vivadet yatra daṇḍam tatra prakalpayet

original: ajāteṣv eva sasyeṣu kuryād āvaraṇaṃ mahat /
analyzed: ajāteṣu eva sasyeṣu kuryāt āvaraṇam mahat

original: duḥkheneha nivāryante labdhasvādurasā mṛgāḥ // K_666 //
analyzed: duḥkhena iha nivāryante labdha svādu rasāḥ mṛgāḥ

original: dāpayet paṇapādaṃ gāṃ dvau pādau mahiṣīṃ tathā /
analyzed: dāpayet paṇa pādam gām dvau pādau mahiṣīm tathā

original: tathājāvikavatsānāṃ pādo daṇḍaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // K_667 //
analyzed: tathā ajāvika vatsānām pādaḥ daṇḍaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: [samayasyānapākarma saṃvidvyatikramo vā]
analyzed: samayasya anapākarma saṃvid vyatikramaḥ vā

original: samūhināṃ tu yo dharmas tena dharmeṇa te sadā /
analyzed: samūhinām tu yaḥ dharmaḥ tena dharmeṇa te sadā

original: prakuryuḥ sarvakarmāṇi svadharmeṣu vyavasthitāḥ // K_668 //
analyzed: prakuryuḥ sarva karmāṇi svadharmeṣu vyavasthitāḥ

original: avirodhena dharmasya nirgataṃ rājaśāsanam /
analyzed: avirodhena dharmasya nirgatam rāja śāsanam

original: tasyaivācaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ kartavyaṃ tu nṛpājñayā // K_669 //
analyzed: tasya eva ācaraṇam pūrvam kartavyam tu nṛpa ājñayā

original: rājapravartitān dharmān yo naro nānupālayet /
analyzed: rāja pravartitān dharmān yaḥ naraḥ na anupālayet

original: garhyaḥ sa pāpo daṇḍyaś ca lopayan rājaśāsanam // K_670 //
analyzed: garhyaḥ sa pāpaḥ daṇḍyaḥ ca lopayan rāja śāsanam

original: yuktiyuktaṃ ca yo hanyād vaktur yo 'navakāśadaḥ /
analyzed: yukti yuktam ca yaḥ hanyāt vaktuḥ yaḥ na avakāśa daḥ

original: ayuktaṃ caiva yo brūte sa dāpyaḥ pūrvasāhasam // K_671 //
analyzed: ayuktam ca eva yaḥ brūte sa dāpyaḥ pūrvasāhasam

original: sāhasī bhedakārī ca gaṇadravyavināśakaḥ /
analyzed: sāhasī bheda kārī ca gaṇa dravya vināśakaḥ

original: ucchedyāḥ sarva evaite vikhyāpyaivaṃ nṛpe bhṛguḥ // K_672 //
analyzed: ucchedyāḥ sarve eva ete vikhyāpya evam nṛpe bhṛguḥ

original: ekapātre ca vā paṅktyāṃ saṃbhoktā yasya yo bhavet /
analyzed: eka pātre ca vā paṅktyām saṃbhoktā yasya yaḥ bhavet

original: akurvaṃs tat tathā daṇḍyas tasya doṣam adarśayan // K_673 //
analyzed: akurvān tat tathā daṇḍyaḥ tasya doṣam adarśayān

original: gaṇam uddiśya yat kiṃcit kṛtvarṇaṃ bhakṣitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: gaṇam uddiśya yat kiṃcid kṛtvā ṛṇam bhakṣitam bhavet

original: ātmārthaṃ viniyuktaṃ vā deyaṃ tair eva tad bhavet // K_674 //
analyzed: ātma artham viniyuktam vā deyam taiḥ eva tat bhavet

original: gaṇānāṃ śreṇivargāṇāṃ gatāḥ syur ye tu madhyatām /
analyzed: gaṇānām śreṇi vargāṇām gatāḥ syuḥ ye tu madhya tām

original: prāktanasya dhanarṇasya samāṃśāḥ sarva eva te // K_675 //
analyzed: prāktanasya dhana ṛṇasya sama aṃśāḥ sarve eva te

original: tathaiva bhojyavaibhājya- dānadharmakriyāsu ca /
analyzed: tathā eva dāna dharma kriyāsu ca

original: samūhastho 'ṃśabhāgī syāt pragatas tv aṃśabhāṅ na tu // K_676 //
analyzed: samūha sthaḥ ṃśa bhāgī syāt pragataḥ tu aṃśa bhāj na tu

original: yat taiḥ prāptaṃ rakṣitaṃ vā gaṇārthe vā ṛṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: yat taiḥ prāptam rakṣitam vā gaṇa arthe vā ṛṇam kṛtam

original: rājaprasādalabdhaṃ ca sarveṣām eva tatsamam // K_677 //
analyzed: rāja prasāda labdham ca sarveṣām eva tat samam

original: [naigamādisaṃjñālakṣaṇam]
analyzed: naigama ādi saṃjñā lakṣaṇam

original: nānāpaurasamūhas tu naigamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: nānā paura samūhaḥ tu naigamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: nānāyudhadharā vrātāḥ samavetāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // K_678 //
analyzed: nānā āyudha dharāḥ vrātāḥ samavetāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: samūho vaṇijādīnāṃ pūgaḥ saṃparikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: samūhaḥ vaṇija ādīnām pūgaḥ saṃparikīrtitaḥ

original: pravrajyāvasitā ye tu pāṣaṇḍāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // K_679 //
analyzed: pravrajyā avasitāḥ ye tu pāṣaṇḍāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ samūhas tu gaṇaḥ saṃparikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām samūhaḥ tu gaṇaḥ saṃparikīrtitaḥ

original: śilpopajīvino ye tu śilpinaḥ parikīrtitāḥ // K_680 //
analyzed: śilpa upajīvinaḥ ye tu śilpinaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: ārhatasaugatānāṃ tu samūhaḥ saṅgha ucyate /
analyzed: ārhata saugatānām tu samūhaḥ saṅghaḥ ucyate

original: cāṇḍālaśvapacādīnāṃ samūho gulma ucyate // K_681 //
analyzed: cāṇḍāla śvapaca ādīnām samūhaḥ gulmaḥ ucyate

original: gaṇapāṣaṇḍapūgāś ca vrātāś ca śreṇayas tathā /
analyzed: gaṇa pāṣaṇḍa pūgāḥ ca vrātāḥ ca śreṇayaḥ tathā

original: samūhasthāś ca ye cānye vargākhyās te bṛhaspatiḥ // K_682 //
analyzed: samūha sthāḥ ca ye ca anye varga ākhyāḥ te bṛhaspatiḥ

original: [krayakikrayānuśayaḥ krīsvānuśayo vikrīye saṃpradānaṃ vā]
analyzed: kraya ki kraya anuśayaḥ krī sva anuśayaḥ vikrīye saṃpradānam vā

original: krītvā prāptaṃ na gṛhṇīyād yo na dadyād adūṣitam /
analyzed: krītvā prāptam na gṛhṇīyāt yaḥ na dadyāt a dūṣitam

original: sa mūlyād daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ dattvā svadravyam āpnuyāt // K_683 //
analyzed: sa mūlyāt daśamam bhāgam dattvā sva dravyam āpnuyāt

original: aprāpte 'rthakriyākāle kṛte naiva pradāpayet /
analyzed: aprāpte ṛtha kriyā kāle kṛte na eva pradāpayet

original: evaṃ dharmo daśāhāt tu parato 'nuśayo na tu // K_684 //
analyzed: evam dharmaḥ daśa ahāt tu paratas nuśayaḥ na tu

original: bhūmer daśāhe vikretur āyas tatkretur eva ca /
analyzed: bhūmeḥ daśa ahe vikretuḥ āyaḥ tad kretuḥ eva ca

original: dvādaśāhaḥ sapiṇḍānām api cālpam ataḥ param // K_685 //
analyzed: dvādaśa ahaḥ sapiṇḍānām api ca alpam atas param

original: krītvānuśayavān paṇyaṃ tyajed dohyādi yo naraḥ /
analyzed: krītvā anuśayavān paṇyam tyajet dohya ādi yaḥ naraḥ

original: aduṣṭam eva kāle tu sa mūlyād daśamaṃ vahet // K_686 //
analyzed: aduṣṭam eva kāle tu sa mūlyāt daśamam vahet

original: krītvā gacchann anuśayaṃ krayī hastam upāgate /
analyzed: krītvā gacchan anuśayam krayī hastam upāgate

original: ṣaḍbhāgaṃ tatra mūlyasya dattvā krītaṃ tyajed budhaḥ // K_687 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ bhāgam tatra mūlyasya dattvā krītam tyajet budhaḥ

original: avijñātaṃ tu yat krītaṃ duṣṭaṃ paścād vibhāvitam /
analyzed: a vijñātam tu yat krītam duṣṭam paścāt vibhāvitam

original: krītaṃ tat svāmine deyaṃ kāle ced anyathā na tu // K_688 //
analyzed: krītam tat svāmine deyam kāle ced anyathā na tu

original: nirdoṣaṃ darśayitvā tu yaḥ sadoṣaṃ prayacchati /
analyzed: nirdoṣam darśayitvā tu yaḥ sa doṣam prayacchati

original: mūlyaṃ tad dviguṇaṃ dāpyo vinayaṃ tāvad eva ca // K_689 //
analyzed: mūlyam tat dviguṇam dāpyaḥ vinayam tāvat eva ca

original: upahanyeta vā paṇyaṃ dahyetāpahriyeta vā /
analyzed: upahanyeta vā paṇyam dahyeta apahriyeta vā

original: vikretur eva so 'nartho vikrīyāsaṃprayacchataḥ // K_690 //
analyzed: vikretuḥ eva saḥ narthaḥ vikrīya asaṃprayacchataḥ

original: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇāti krīta paṇyaṃ ca yaḥ krayī /
analyzed: dīyamānam na gṛhṇāti krīta paṇyam ca yaḥ krayī

original: vikrītaṃ ca tad anyatra vikretā nāparādhruyāt // K_691 //
analyzed: vikrītam ca tat anyatra vikretā na aparādhruyāt

original: mattonmattena vikrītaṃ hīnamūlyaṃ bhayena vā /
analyzed: matta unmattena vikrītam hīna mūlyam bhayena vā

original: asvatantreṇa mugdhena tyājyaṃ tasya punar bhavet // K_692 //
analyzed: asvatantreṇa mugdhena tyājyam tasya punar bhavet

original: tryahaṃ dohyaṃ parīkṣeta patrcāhad vāhyam eva tu /
analyzed: tri aham dohyam parīkṣeta patrca ahat vāhyam eva tu

original: muktāvajrapravālānāṃ saptāhaṃ syāt pravīkṣaṇam // K_693 //
analyzed: muktā vajra pravālānām sapta aham syāt pravīkṣaṇam

original: dvipadām ardhamāsaṃ tu puṃsāṃ tad dviguṇaṃ striyāḥ /
analyzed: dvipadām ardha māsam tu puṃsām tat dviguṇam striyāḥ

original: daśāhaṃ sarvabījānām ekāhaṃ lohavāsasām // K_694 //
analyzed: daśa aham sarva bījānām eka aham loha vāsasām

original: ato 'rvākpaṇyadoṣas tu yadi saṃjāyate kvacit /
analyzed: atas rvāc paṇya doṣaḥ tu yadi saṃjāyate kvacid

original: vikretuḥ pratideyaṃ tat kretā mūlyam avāpnuyāt // K_695 //
analyzed: vikretuḥ pratideyam tat kretā mūlyam avāpnuyāt

original: paribhuktaṃ tu yad vāsaḥ kliṣṭarūpaṃ malīmasam /
analyzed: paribhuktam tu yat vāsaḥ kliṣṭa rūpam malīmasam

original: sadoṣam api tat krītaṃ viketur na bhavet punaḥ // K_696 //
analyzed: sa doṣam api tat krītam viketuḥ na bhavet punar

original: sādhāraṇaṃ tu yat krītaṃ naiko dadyān narādhamaḥ /
analyzed: sādhāraṇam tu yat krītam na ekaḥ dadyāt nara adhamaḥ

original: nādadyān na ca gṛhṇīyād vikrīyāc ca na caiva hi // K_697 //
analyzed: na ādadyāt na ca gṛhṇīyāt ca na ca eva hi

original: krītvā mūlyena yat paṇyaṃ duṣkrītaṃ manyate krayī /
analyzed: krītvā mūlyena yat paṇyam duṣkrītam manyate krayī

original: vikretuḥ pratideyaṃ tat tasminn evāhnyavīkṣitam // K_698 //
analyzed: vikretuḥ pratideyam tat tasmin eva ahni avīkṣitam

original: dvitīye 'hni dadat kretā mūlyāt tryaṃśāṃśam āharet /
analyzed: dvitīye hni dadat kretā mūlyāt tri aṃśa aṃśam āharet

original: dviguṇaṃ tṛtīye 'hni parataḥ kretur eva tat // K_699 //
analyzed: dviguṇam tṛtīye hni paratas kretuḥ eva tat

original: dravyasvaṃ pañcadhā kṛtvā tribhāgo mūlyam ucyate /
analyzed: dravya svam pañcadhā kṛtvā tri bhāgaḥ mūlyam ucyate

original: lābhaś caturtho bhāgaḥ syāt pañcamaḥ satyam ucyate // K_700 //
analyzed: lābhaḥ caturthaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt pañcamaḥ satyam ucyate

original: sandhiś ca parivṛttiś ca viṣamā vā tribhogataḥ /
analyzed: sandhiḥ ca parivṛttiḥ ca viṣamā vā tri bhogataḥ

original: ājñayāpi krayaś cāpi daśābdaṃ vinivartayet // K_701 //
analyzed: ājñayā api krayaḥ ca api daśa abdam vinivartayet

original: jñātyādīn ananujñāpya samīpasthānaninditān /
analyzed: jñāti ādīn an anujñāpya samīpa sthān aninditān

original: krayavikrayadharmo 'pi bhūmer nāstīti nirṇayaḥ // K_702 //
analyzed: kraya vikraya dharmaḥ pi bhūmeḥ na asti iti nirṇayaḥ

original: svagrāme daśarātraṃ syād anyagrāme tripakṣakam /
analyzed: sva grāme daśa rātram syāt anya grāme tri pakṣakam

original: rāṣṭrāntareṣu ṣaṇmāsaṃ bhāṣābhede tu vatsaram // K_703 //
analyzed: rāṣṭra antareṣu ṣaṣ māsam bhāṣā bhede tu vatsaram

original: palāyite tu karade karapratibhuvā saha /
analyzed: palāyite tu kara de kara pratibhuvā saha

original: karārthaṃ karadakṣetraṃ vikrīṇīyuḥ sabhāsadaḥ // K_704 //
analyzed: kara artham kara da kṣetram vikrīṇīyuḥ sabhāsadaḥ

original: samavetais tu sāmantair abhijñaiḥ pāpabhīrubhiḥ /
analyzed: samavetaiḥ tu sāmantaiḥ abhijñaiḥ pāpa bhīrubhiḥ

original: kṣetrārāmagṛhādīnāṃ dvipadāṃ ca catuṣpadām // K_705 //
analyzed: kṣetra ārāma gṛha ādīnām dvipadām ca catuṣpadām

original: kalpitaṃ mūlyam ity āhur bhāgaṃ kṛtvā tad aṣṭadhā /
analyzed: kalpitam mūlyam iti āhuḥ bhāgam kṛtvā tat aṣṭadhā

original: ekabhāgātiriktaṃ vā hīnaṃ vānucitaṃ smṛtam // K_706 //
analyzed: eka bhāga atiriktam vā hīnam vā anucitam smṛtam

original: samāḥ śatam atīte 'pi sarvaṃ tad vinivartate /
analyzed: samāḥ śatam atīte sarvam tat vinivartate

original: krayavikrayaṇe krayyaṃ yan mūlyaṃ dharmato 'rhati // K_707 //
analyzed: kraya vikrayaṇe krayyam yat mūlyam dharmataḥ rhati

original: tat turye pañcame ṣaṣṭe saptame 'ṃśe 'ṣṭame 'pi vā /
analyzed: tat turye pañcame ṣaṣṭe saptame ṃśe ṣṭame pi vā

original: hīne yadi vinirvṛtte krayavikrāyaṇe sati // K_708 //
analyzed: hīne yadi vinirvṛtte sati

original: hīnamūlyaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ kṛtam apy akṛtaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: hīna mūlyam tu tat sarvam kṛtam api akṛtam bhavet

original: uktād alpatare hīne krayo naiva praduṣyati // K_709 //
analyzed: uktāt alpatare hīne krayaḥ nā eva praduṣyati

original: tenāpy aṃśena hīyeta mūlyataḥ krayavikraye /
analyzed: tena api aṃśena hīyeta mūlyataḥ kraya vikraye

original: katam apy akṛtaṃ prāhur anye dharmavido janāḥ // K_710 //
analyzed: api a kṛtam prāhuḥ anye dharma vidaḥ janāḥ

original: ardhādhike krayaḥ sidhyed uktalābho daśādhikaḥ /
analyzed: ardha adhike krayaḥ sidhyet ukta lābhaḥ daśa adhikaḥ

original: avakrayas tribhāgena sadya eva rucikrayaḥ // K_711 //
analyzed: avakrayaḥ tri bhāgena sadyas eva ruci krayaḥ

original: mūlyāt svalpapradāne 'pi krayasiddhiḥ kṛtā bhavet /
analyzed: mūlyāt su alpa pradāne pi kraya siddhiḥ kṛtā bhavet

original: cakravṛddyāṃ pradātavyaṃ deyaṃ tat samayād ṛte // K_712 //
analyzed: cakravṛddyām pradātavyam deyam tat samayāt ṛte

original: [abhyupetyāśuśrūṣā]
analyzed: abhyupetyā śuśrūṣā

analyzed: yaḥ tu na grāhayet śilpam karmāṇi anyāni kārayet

analyzed: prāpnuyāt sāhasam pūrvam tasmāt śiṣyaḥ nivartate

original: tatra karma ca yat kuryād ācāryasyaiva tat phalam // K_714 //
analyzed: tatra karma ca yat kuryāt ācāryasya eva tat phalam

analyzed: svatantrasya ātmanaḥ dānāt dāsa tvam dāra vat bhṛguḥ

analyzed: triṣu varṇeṣu vijñeyam dāsyam viprasya na kvacid

original: varṇānām anulāmyena dāsyaṃ na pratilomataḥ /
analyzed: varṇānām dāsyam na pratilomataḥ

original: rājanyavaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ tyajatāṃ hi svatantratām // K_716 //
analyzed: rājanya vaiśya śūdrāṇām tyajatām hi svatantra tām

original: samavarṇo 'pi vipraṃ tu dāsatvaṃ naiva kārayet /

original: brāhmaṇasya hi dāsatvān nṛpatejo vihanyate // K_717 //

analyzed: kṣatra viś śūdra dharmaḥ tu sama varṇe kadācana

original: kārayed dāsakarmāṇi brāhmaṇaṃ na bṛhaspatiḥ // K_718 //
analyzed: kārayet dāsa karmāṇi brāhmaṇam na bṛhaspatiḥ

original: śīlādhyayanasaṃpanne tadūnaṃ karma kāmataḥ /

original: tatrāpi nāśubhaṃ kiṃcit prakurvīta dvijottamaḥ // K_719 //
analyzed: tatra api na aśubham kiṃcid prakurvīta dvijottamaḥ

original: viṇmūtronmārjanaṃ caiva nagnatvaparimardanam /

analyzed: prāyas dāsī sutāḥ kuryuḥ gavādi grahaṇam ca yat

original: pravrajyāvasitā yatra trayo varṇā dvijādayaḥ /

analyzed: nirvāsam kārayet vipram dāsa tvam kṣatra viś nṛpaḥ

original: śūdraṃ tu kārayed dāsaṃ krītam akrītam eva vā /
analyzed: śūdram tu kārayet dāsam krītam a krītam eva vā

original: dāsyāyaiva hi sṛṣṭaḥ sa svayam eva svayam bhuvā // K_722 //

analyzed: sva dāsīm yaḥ tu saṃgacchet prasūtā ca bhavet tatas

original: avekṣya bījaṃ kāryā syān na dāsī sānvayā tu sā // K_723 //
analyzed: avekṣya bījam kāryā syāt na dāsī sa anvayā tu sā

original: dāsasya tu dhanaṃ yat syāt svāmī tasya prabhuḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: dāsasya tu dhanam yat syāt svāmī tasya prabhuḥ smṛtaḥ

original: prakāśaṃ vikrayād yat tu na svāmī dhanam arhati // K_724 //
analyzed: prakāśam vikrayāt yat tu na svāmī dhanam arhati

analyzed: dāsena ūḍhā sva dāsī yā sā api dāsī tvam āpnuyāt

original: yasmād bhartā prabhus tasyāḥ svāmyadhīnaḥ prabhur yataḥ // K_725 //
analyzed: yasmāt bhartā prabhuḥ tasyāḥ svāmī adhīnaḥ prabhuḥ yatas

original: ādadyād brāhmaṇīṃ yas tu cikrīṇīta tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ādadyāt brāhmaṇīm yaḥ tu cikrīṇīta tathā eva ca

original: saṃkrāmayeta vānyatra daṇḍyas tac cākṛtaṃ bhavet // K_727 //
analyzed: saṃkrāmayeta vā anyatra daṇḍyaḥ tat ca akṛtam bhavet

original: bāladhātrīm adāsīṃ ca dāsīm iva bhunakti yaḥ /
analyzed: bāla dhātrīm adāsīm ca dāsīm iva bhunakti yaḥ

original: paricārakapatnīṃ vā prāpnuyāt pūrvasāhasam // K_728 //
analyzed: paricāraka patnīm vā prāpnuyāt pūrva sāhasam

original: vikrośamānāṃ yo bhaktāṃ dāsīṃ vikretum icchati /

original: anāpadisthaḥ śaktaḥ san prāpnuyād dviśataṃ damam // K_729 //
analyzed: anāpadisthaḥ śaktaḥ san prāpnuyāt dviśatam damam

original: tavāham iti cātmānaṃ yo 'svatantraḥ prayacchati /

original: na sa taṃ prāpnuyāt kāmaṃ pūrvasvāmī labheta tam // K_730 //
analyzed: na sa tam prāpnuyāt kāmam pūrva svāmī labheta tam

original: pravrajyāvasito dāso moktavyaś ca na kenacit /
analyzed: pravrajyā avasitaḥ dāsaḥ moktavyaḥ ca na kenacid

original: anākālabhṛto dāsyān mucyate goyugaṃ dadat // K_731 //
analyzed: an ākālabhṛtaḥ dāsyāt mucyate go yugam dadat

original: [sīmāvivādaḥ]
analyzed: sīmā vivādaḥ

original: ādhikyaṃ nyūnatā cāṃśe astināstitvam eva ca /
analyzed: ādhikyam nyūna tā ca aṃśe astināsti tvam eva ca

original: abhogabhuktiḥ sīmā ca ṣaṭ bhūvād asya hetavaḥ // K_732 //
analyzed: abhoga bhuktiḥ sīmā ca ṣaṣ asya hetavaḥ

analyzed: tasmin bhogaḥ prayoktavyaḥ sarva sākṣiṣu tiṣṭhati

original: lekhyārūḍhaś cetaraś ca sākṣī mārgadvayānvitaḥ // K_733 //
analyzed: lekhya ārūḍhaḥ ca itaraḥ ca sākṣī mārga dvaya anvitaḥ

original: kṣetravāstutaḍāgeṣu kūpopavanasetuṣu /
analyzed: kṣetra vāstu taḍāgeṣu kūpa upavana setuṣu

analyzed: dvayoḥ vivāde sāmantaḥ pratyayaḥ sarva vastuṣu

analyzed: grāma sīmāsu ca tathā tadvat nagara deśayoḥ

original: gṛhaṃ gṛhasya nirdiṣṭa samantāt parirabhya hi // K_736 //

analyzed: teṣām abhāve sāmanta maula vṛddha uddhṛta ādayaḥ

original: saṃsaktās tv atha sāmantās tat saṃsaktās tathottarāḥ /
analyzed: saṃsaktāḥ tu atha sāmantāḥ tat saṃsaktāḥ tathā uttarāḥ

analyzed: tyaktvā duṣṭān tu sāmantān anyān maula ādibhiḥ saha

analyzed: upaśravaṇa saṃbhoga kārya ākhyāna upacihnitāḥ

original: viṇmūtrodakavapraṃ ca vahniśvabhraniveśanam /

original: aratnidvayam utsṛjya parakuḍyān niveśayet // K_754 //

original: sarve janāḥ sadā yena prayānti sa catuṣpathaḥ /
analyzed: sarve janāḥ sadā yena prayānti sa catuṣpathaḥ

analyzed: aniruddhaḥ yathākālam rājamārgaḥ saḥ ucyate

analyzed: puṇyāni pāvanīyāni prāpnuyāt pūrvasāhasam

analyzed: tad aṣṭa bhāga hīnam tu karṣakaḥ phalam āpnuyāt

analyzed: a śakta preta naṣṭeṣu kṣetrikeṣu a nivāritaḥ

original: kṣetraṃ ced vikṛṣet kaścid aśnuvīta sa tatphalam // K_765 //

original: vikṛṣyamāṇe kṣetre ca kṣetrikaḥ punar āvrajet /
analyzed: vikṛṣyamāṇe kṣetre ca kṣetrikaḥ punar āvrajet

original: śīlopacāraṃ tat sarvaṃ dattvā kṣetramavāpnuyāt // K_766 //
analyzed: śīla upacāram tat sarvam dattvā kṣetram avāpnuyāt

original: tadaṣṭabhāgāpacayād yāvat sapta gatāḥ samāḥ /

original: [vākpāruṣyam]
analyzed: vāc pāruṣyam

original: anukuryād anubrūyād vākpāruṣyaṃ tad ucyate // K_768 //
analyzed: anukuryāt anubrūyāt vāc pāruṣyam tat ucyate

original: niṣṭhurāślīlatīvratvāt tad api trividhaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: niṣṭhura aślīla tīvra tvāt tat api trividham smṛtam

analyzed: ākṣepaḥ niṣṭhuram jñeyam aślīlam nyaṅga saṃjñitam

analyzed: para deśāt dhṛtam dravyam vaideśyena yadā bhavet

original: gṛhītvā tasya taddravyam adaṇḍaṃ taṃ visarjayet // K_826 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā tasya tat dravyam a daṇḍam tam visarjayet

original: corāṇāṃ bhaktadā ye syus tathāgnyudakadāyakāḥ /
analyzed: corāṇām bhakta dāḥ ye syuḥ tathā agni udaka dāyakāḥ

original: kretāraś caiva bhāṇḍānāṃ pratigrāhiṇa eva ca /
analyzed: kretāraḥ ca eva bhāṇḍānām pratigrāhiṇaḥ eva ca

original: samadaṇḍāḥ smṛtā hy ete ye ca pracchādayanti tān // K_827 //
analyzed: sama daṇḍāḥ smṛtāḥ hi ete ye ca pracchādayanti tān

original: avidvān yājako vā syāt pravaktā cānavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: a vidvān yājakaḥ vā syāt pravaktā ca anavasthitaḥ

original: tau ubhau coradaṇḍena vinīya sthāpayet pathi // K_828 //
analyzed: tau ubhau cora daṇḍena vinīya sthāpayet pathi

original: [strīsaṃgrahaṇam]
analyzed: strī saṃgrahaṇam

original: dūtopacārayuktaś ced avelāsthānasaṃsthitiḥ /
analyzed: dūta upacāra yuktaḥ ced avelā sthāna saṃsthitiḥ

original: kṇṭhakeśāṇ calagrāhaḥ karṇanāsākarādiṣu /
analyzed: kṇṭha keśāṇ cala grāhaḥ karṇa nāsā kara ādiṣu

original: ekasthānāsanāhārāḥ saṃgraho navadhā smṛtaḥ // K_829 //
analyzed: eka sthāna āsana āhārāḥ saṃgrahaḥ navadhā smṛtaḥ

original: strīṣu vṛttopabhogaḥ syāt prasahya puruṣo yadā /
analyzed: strīṣu vṛtta upabhogaḥ syāt prasahya puruṣaḥ yadā

original: vadhe tatra pravarteta kāryātikramaṇaṃ hi tat // K_830 //
analyzed: vadhe tatra pravarteta kārya atikramaṇam hi tat

original: kāmārtā svairiṇī yā tu svayam eva prakāmayet /
analyzed: kāma ārtā svairiṇī yā tu svayam eva prakāmayet

original: rājādeśena moktavyā vikhyāpya janasaṃnidhau // K_831 //
analyzed: rāja ādeśena moktavyā vikhyāpya jana saṃnidhau

original: ārambhakṛtsahāyaś ca tathā mārgānudeśakaḥ /
analyzed: ārambha kṛt sahāyaḥ ca tathā mārga anudeśakaḥ

original: āśrayaḥ śastradātā ca bhaktadātā vikarmiṇām // K_832 //
analyzed: āśrayaḥ śastra dātā ca bhakta dātā vikarmiṇām

original: yuddhopadeśakaś caiva tadvināśapradarśakaḥ /
analyzed: yuddha upadeśakaḥ ca eva tad vināśa pradarśakaḥ

original: upekṣākāryayuktaś ca doṣavaktranumokakaḥ // K_833 //
analyzed: upekṣā kārya yuktaḥ ca

original: aniṣeddhākṣamo yaḥ syāt sarve tatkāryakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: aniṣeddha akṣamaḥ yaḥ syāt sarve tad kārya kāriṇaḥ

original: yathāśaktyanurūpaṃ tu daṇḍam eṣāṃ prakalpayet // K_834 //
analyzed: yathāśakti anurūpam tu daṇḍam eṣām prakalpayet

original: [strīpuṃdharmaḥ]
analyzed: strī pum dharmaḥ

original: patyā cāpy aviyoginyā śuśrūṣyo 'gnir vinītayā /
analyzed: patyā ca api aviyoginyā śuśrūṣyaḥ agniḥ vinītayā

original: saubhāgyavad avvaidhavya- kāmyayā bhartṛbhaktayā // K_835 //
analyzed: saubhāgyavat kāmyayā bhartṛ bhaktayā

original: matiśuśrūṣayaiva strī sarvān kāmān samaśnute /
analyzed: mati śuśrūṣayā eva strī sarvān kāmān samaśnute

original: divaḥ punar ihāyātā sukhānāṃ śevadhir bhavet // K_836 //
analyzed: divaḥ punar iha āyātā sukhānām śevadhiḥ bhavet

original: mṛte bhartari yā sādhvī brahmacarye vyavasthitā /
analyzed: mṛte bhartari yā sādhvī brahmacarye vyavasthitā

original: sārundhatīsamācārā brahmaloke mahīyate // K_837 //
analyzed: sā arundhatī sama ācārā brahma loke mahīyate

original: [dāyavibhāgaḥ]
analyzed: dāya vibhāgaḥ

original: sakalaṃ dravyajātaṃ yad bhāgair gṛhṇanti tat samaiḥ /
analyzed: sakalam dravya jātam yat bhāgaiḥ gṛhṇanti tat samaiḥ

original: pitaro bhrātaraś caiva vibhāgo dharmya ucyate // K_838 //
analyzed: pitaraḥ bhrātaraḥ ca eva vibhāgaḥ dharmyaḥ ucyate

original: paitāmahaṃ samānaṃ syāt pituḥ putrasya cobhayoḥ /
analyzed: paitāmaham samānam syāt pituḥ putrasya ca ubhayoḥ

original: svayaṃ copārjite pitrā na putraḥ svāmyam arhati // K_839 //
analyzed: svayam ca upārjite pitrā na putraḥ svāmyam arhati

original: paitāmahaṃ ca pitryaṃ ca yac cānyat svayam arjitam /
analyzed: paitāmaham ca pitryam ca yat ca anyat svayam arjitam

original: dāyādānāṃ vibhāge tu sarvam etad vibhajyate // K_840 //
analyzed: dāyādānām vibhāge tu sarvam etat vibhajyate

original: dṛśyamānaṃ vibhajyeta gṛhaṃ kṣetraṃ catuṣpadam /
analyzed: dṛśyamānam vibhajyeta gṛham kṣetram catuṣpadam

original: gūḍhadravyābhiśaṅkāyāṃ pratyayas tatra kīrtitaḥ // K_841 //
analyzed: gūḍha dravya abhiśaṅkāyām pratyayaḥ tatra kīrtitaḥ

original: gṛhopaskaravāhyāś ca dohyābharaṇakarmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: gṛha upaskara vāhyāḥ ca dohya ābharaṇa karmiṇaḥ

original: dṛśyamānā vibhajyante kośaṃ gūḍhe 'bravīd bhṛguḥ // K_842 //
analyzed: dṛśyamānāḥ vibhajyante kośam gūḍhe bravīt bhṛguḥ

original: jīvadvibhāge tu pitā naikaṃ putraṃ viśeṣayet /
analyzed: jīvat vibhāge tu pitā na ekam putram viśeṣayet

original: nirbhājayen na caivaikam akasmāt kāraṇaṃ vinā // K_843 //
analyzed: nirbhājayet na ca eva ekam akasmāt kāraṇam vinā

original: saṃprāptavyavahārāṇāṃ vibhāgaś ca vidhīyate /
analyzed: saṃprāpta vyavahārāṇām vibhāgaḥ ca vidhīyate

original: puṃsāṃ ca ṣoḍaśe varṣe jāyate vyavahāritā // K_844 //
analyzed: puṃsām ca ṣoḍaśe varṣe jāyate vyavahāri tā

original: aprāptavyavahārāṇāṃ ca dhanaṃ vyayavivarjitam /
analyzed: aprāptavyavahārāṇām ca dhanam vyaya vivarjitam

original: nyaseyur bandhumitreṣu proṣitānāṃ tathaiva ca // K_845:1 //
analyzed: nyaseyuḥ bandhu mitreṣu proṣitānām tathā eva ca

original: proṣitasya tu yo bhāgo rakṣeyuḥ sarva eva tam /
analyzed: proṣitasya tu yaḥ bhāgaḥ rakṣeyuḥ sarve eva tam

original: bālaputre mṛte rikthaṃ rakṣyaṃ tat tantubandhubhiḥ /
analyzed: bāla putre mṛte riktham rakṣyam tat tantu bandhubhiḥ

original: paugaṇḍāḥ paratas taṃ tu vibhajeran yathāṃśataḥ // K_845:2 //
analyzed: paugaṇḍāḥ paratas tam tu vibhajeran yathā aṃśataḥ

original: bhrātrā pitṛvyamātṛbhyāṃ kuṭumbārtham ṛṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: bhrātrā pitṛvya mātṛbhyām kuṭumba artham ṛṇam kṛtam

original: vibhāgakāle deyaṃ tad- rikthibhiḥ sarvam eva tu // K_846 //
analyzed: vibhāga kāle deyam tat rikthibhiḥ sarvam eva tu

original: tad ṛṇaṃ dhanine deyaṃ nānyathaiva pradāpayet /
analyzed: tat ṛṇam dhanine deyam na anyathā eva pradāpayet

original: bhāvitaṃ cet pramāṇena virodhāt parato yadā // K_847 //
analyzed: bhāvitam ced pramāṇena virodhāt paratas yadā

original: dharmārthaṃ prītidattaṃ ca yad ṛṇaṃ syān niyojitam /
analyzed: dharma artham prītidattam ca yat ṛṇam syāt niyojitam

original: tad dṛśyamānaṃ vibhajen na dānaṃ paitṛkād dhanāt // K_848 //
analyzed: tat dṛśyamānam vibhajet na dānam paitṛkāt dhanāt

original: pitryaṃ pitryarṇasaṃśuddham ātmīyaṃ cātmanā kṛtam /
analyzed: pitryam pitrya ṛṇa saṃśuddham ātmīyam ca ātmanā kṛtam

original: ṛṇam evaṃvidhaṃ śodhyaṃ vibhāge bandhubhiḥ saha // K_849 //
analyzed: ṛṇam evaṃvidham śodhyam vibhāge bandhubhiḥ saha

original: ṛṇaṃ prītipradānaṃ ca dattvā śeṣaṃ vibhājayet // K_850 //
analyzed: ṛṇam prīti pradānam ca dattvā śeṣam vibhājayet

original: dvyaṃśaharo 'rdhaharo vā putravittārjanāt pitā /
analyzed: dvi aṃśa haraḥ ṛdha haraḥ vā putra vitta arjanāt pitā

original: mātāpi pitari prete putratulyāṃśabhāginī // K_851 //
analyzed: mātā api pitari prete putra tulya aṃśa bhāginī

original: yathā yathā vibhāgāptaṃ dhanaṃ yāgārthatām iyāt /
analyzed: yathā yathā vibhāga āptam dhanam yāga artha tām iyāt

original: tathā tathā vidhātavyaṃ vidvadbhir bhāgagauravam // K_852 //
analyzed: tathā tathā vidhātavyam vidvadbhiḥ bhāga gauravam

original: loke rikthavibhāge 'pi na kaścit prabhutām iyāt /
analyzed: loke riktha vibhāge na kaścid prabhu tām iyāt

original: bhoga eva tu kartavyo na dānaṃ na ca vikrayaḥ // K_853 //
analyzed: bhogaḥ eva tu kartavyaḥ na dānam na ca vikrayaḥ

original: vibhaktā avibhaktā vā dāyādāḥ sthāvare samāḥ /
analyzed: vibhaktāḥ avibhaktāḥ vā dāyādāḥ sthāvare samāḥ

original: eko hy anīśaḥ sarvatra dānādhamanavikraye // K_854 //
analyzed: ekaḥ hi anīśaḥ sarvatra dāna ādhamana vikraye

original: avibhakte 'nuje prete tat sutaṃ rikthabhāginam /
analyzed: avibhakte nuje prete tat sutam riktha bhāginam

original: kurvīta jīvanaṃ yena labdhaṃ naiva pitāmahāt // K_855 //
analyzed: kurvīta jīvanam yena labdham nā eva pitāmahāt

original: labhetāṃśaṃ sa pitryaṃ tu pitṛvyāt tasya vā sutāt /
analyzed: labheta aṃśam sa pitryam tu pitṛvyāt tasya vā sutāt

original: sa evāṃśas tu sarveṣā bhrātṝṇāṃ nyāyato bhavet /
analyzed: saḥ eva aṃśaḥ tu sarveṣām bhrātṝṇām nyāyataḥ bhavet

original: labheta tat suto vāpi nivṛttiḥ parato bhavet // K_856 //
analyzed: labheta tat sutaḥ vā api nivṛttiḥ paratas bhavet

original: utpanne caurase putre caturthāṃśaharāḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: utpanne ca aurase putre caturtha aṃśa harāḥ sutāḥ

original: savarṇā asavarṇās tu grāsācchādanabhājanāḥ // K_857 //
analyzed: savarṇāḥ asavarṇāḥ tu grāsa ācchādana bhājanāḥ

original: kanyakānāṃ tv adattānāṃ caturto bhāga iṣyate /
analyzed: kanyakānām tu adattānām caturtaḥ bhāgaḥ iṣyate

original: putrāṇāṃ tu trayo bhāgāḥ sāmyaṃ tv alpadhane smṛtam // K_858 //
analyzed: putrāṇām tu trayaḥ bhāgāḥ sāmyam tu alpa dhane smṛtam

original: kṣetrikasya matenāpi phalam utpādayet tu yaḥ /
analyzed: kṣetrikasya matena api phalam utpādayet tu yaḥ

original: tasyeha bhāginau tau tu na phalaṃ hi vinaikataḥ // K_859 //
analyzed: tasya iha bhāginau tau tu na phalam hi vinā ekatas

original: klībaṃ vihāya patitaṃ yā punar labhate patim /
analyzed: klībam vihāya patitam yā punar labhate patim

original: tasyāṃ paunarbhavo jāto vyaktam utpādakasya saḥ // K_860 //
analyzed: tasyām paunarbhavaḥ jātaḥ vyaktam utpādakasya saḥ

original: na mūtraṃ phenilaṃ yasya viṣṭhā cāpsu nimajjati /
analyzed: na mūtram phenilam yasya viṣṭhā ca apsu nimajjati

original: meḍhraś conmādaśukrābhyāṃ hīnaḥ klībaḥ sa ucyate // K_861 //
analyzed: meḍhraḥ ca unmāda śukrābhyām hīnaḥ klībaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: akramoḍhāsutaś caiva sagotrādyas tu jāyate /
analyzed: akrama ūḍhā sutaḥ ca eva sagotra ādyaḥ tu jāyate

original: pravrajyāvasitaś caiva na rikthaṃ teṣu cārhati // K_862 //
analyzed: pravrajyā vasitaḥ ca eva na riktham teṣu ca arhati

original: akramoḍhāsutas tv ṛkthī savarṇaś ca yadā pituḥ /
analyzed: akrama ūḍhā sutaḥ tu ṛkthī savarṇaḥ ca yadā pituḥ

original: asavarṇaprasūtaś ca kramoḍhāyāṃ ca yo bhavet // K_863 //
analyzed: asavarṇa prasūtaḥ ca krama ūḍhāyām ca yaḥ bhavet

original: pratilomaprasūtā yā tasyāḥ putro na rikthabhāk /
analyzed: pratiloma prasūtā yā tasyāḥ putraḥ na riktha bhāj

original: grāsācchādanam atyantaṃ deyaṃ tadbandhubhir matam // K_864 //
analyzed: grāsa ācchādanam atyantam deyam tad bandhubhiḥ matam

original: bandhūnām apy abhāve tu pitṛdravyaṃ tad āpnuyāt /
analyzed: bandhūnām api abhāve tu pitṛ dravyam tat āpnuyāt

original: apitryaṃ draviṇaṃ prāptaṃ dāpanīyā na bāndhavāḥ // K_865 //
analyzed: apitryam draviṇam prāptam dāpanīyāḥ na bāndhavāḥ

original: [avibhājyāni]
analyzed: avibhājyāni

original: svaśaktyapahṛtaṃ naṣṭaṃ svayam āptaṃ ca yad bhavet /
analyzed: sva śakti apahṛtam naṣṭam svayam āptam ca yat bhavet

original: etat sarvaṃ pitā putrair vibhāge naiva dāpyate // K_866 //
analyzed: etat sarvam pitā putraiḥ vibhāge na eva dāpyate

original: parabhaktopayogena vidyā prāptān yatas tu yā /
analyzed: para bhakta upayogena vidyā prāptān yatas tu yā

original: tayā prāptaṃ dhanaṃ yat tu vidyāprāptaṃ tad ucyate // K_867 //
analyzed: tayā prāptam dhanam yat tu vidyā prāptam tat ucyate

original: upanyaste tu yal labdhaṃ vidyayā paṇapūrvakam /
analyzed: upanyaste tu yat labdham vidyayā paṇa pūrvakam

original: vidyādhanaṃ tu tad vidyād vibhāge na vibhajyate // K_868 //
analyzed: vidyā dhanam tu tat vidyāt vibhāge na vibhajyate

original: śiṣyād ārtvijyataḥ praśnāt saṃdigdhapraśnanirṇayāt /
analyzed: śiṣyāt ārtvijyataḥ praśnāt saṃdigdha praśna nirṇayāt

original: svajñānaśaṃsanād vādāl labdhaṃ prādhyayanāc ca yat /
analyzed: sva jñāna śaṃsanāt vādāt labdham prādhyayanāt ca yat

original: vidyādhanaṃ tu tat prāhur vibhāge na vibhajyate // K_869 //
analyzed: vidyā dhanam tu tat prāhuḥ vibhāge na vibhajyate

original: śilpiṣv api hi dharmo 'yaṃ mūlyāc yac cādhikaṃ bhavet // K_870 //
analyzed: śilpiṣu api hi dharmaḥ yam mūlyāt yat ca adhikam bhavet

original: paraṃ nirasya yal labdhaṃ vidyāto dyūtapūrvakam /
analyzed: param nirasya yat labdham vidyātaḥ dyūta pūrvakam

original: vidyādhanaṃ tu tad vidyān na vibhājyaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ // K_871 //
analyzed: vidyā dhanam tu tat vidyāt na vibhājyam bṛhaspatiḥ

original: vidyāpratijñayā labdhaṃ śiṣyād āptaṃ ca yad bhavet /
analyzed: vidyā pratijñayā labdham śiṣyāt āptam ca yat bhavet

original: ṛtviṅnyāyena yal labdham etad vidyādhanaṃ bhṛguḥ // K_872 //
analyzed: ṛtvij nyāyena yat labdham etat vidyā dhanam bhṛguḥ

original: vidyābalakṛtaṃ caiva yājyataḥ śiṣyatas tathā /
analyzed: vidyā bala kṛtam ca eva yājyataḥ śiṣyataḥ tathā

original: etad vidyādhanaṃ prāhuḥ sāmānyaṃ yad ato 'nyathā // K_873 //
analyzed: etat vidyā dhanam prāhuḥ sāmānyam yat atas nyathā

original: kule vinītavidyānāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ pitṛto 'pi vā /
analyzed: kule vinīta vidyānām bhrātṝṇām vā

original: śauryaprāptaṃ tu yad vittaṃ vibhājyaṃ tad bṛhaspatiḥ // K_874 //
analyzed: śaurya prāptam tu yat vittam vibhājyam tat bṛhaspatiḥ

original: nāvidyānāṃ tu vaidyena deyaṃ vidyādhanāt kvacit /
analyzed: na avidyānām tu vaidyena deyam vidyā dhanāt kvacid

original: samavidyādhikānāṃ tu deyaṃ vaidyena tad dhanam // K_875 //
analyzed: sama vidyā adhikānām tu deyam vaidyena tat dhanam

original: āruhya saṃśayaṃ yatra prasabhaṃ karma kurvate /
analyzed: āruhya saṃśayam yatra prasabham karma kurvate

original: tasmin karmaṇi tuṣṭena prasādaḥ svāminā kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin karmaṇi tuṣṭena prasādaḥ svāminā kṛtaḥ

original: tatra labdhaṃ tu yat kiñcit dhanaṃ śauryeṇa tad bhavet // K_876 //
analyzed: tatra labdham tu yat kiñcid dhanam śauryeṇa tat bhavet

original: śauryaprāptaṃ vidyayā ca strīdhanaṃ caiva yat smṛtam /
analyzed: śaurya prāptam vidyayā ca strīdhanam ca eva yat smṛtam

original: etat sarvaṃ vibhāge tu vibhājyaṃ naiva rikthibhiḥ // K_877 //
analyzed: etat sarvam vibhāge tu vibhājyam na eva rikthibhiḥ

original: dhvajāhṛtaṃ bhaved yat tu vibhājyaṃ naiva tat smṛtam /
analyzed: dhvaja āhṛtam bhavet yat tu vibhājyam nā eva tat smṛtam

original: saṃgrāmād āhṛtaṃ yat tu vidrāvya dviṣatāṃ valam /
analyzed: saṃgrāmāt āhṛtam yat tu vidrāvya dviṣatām valam

original: svāmyarthe jīvitaṃ tyaktvā tad dhvajāhṛtam ucyate // K_878 //
analyzed: svāmi arthe jīvitam tyaktvā tat dhvaja āhṛtam ucyate

original: yal labdhaṃ dānakāle tu svajātyā kanyayā saha /
analyzed: yat labdham dāna kāle tu sva jātyā kanyayā saha

original: kanyāgataṃ tu tad vittaṃ śuddhaṃ vṛddhikaraṃ smṛtam // K_879 //
analyzed: kanyā gatam tu tat vittam śuddham vṛddhi karam smṛtam

original: vaivāhikaṃ tu tad vidyād bhāryayā yat sahāgatam /
analyzed: vaivāhikam tu tat vidyāt bhāryayā yat saha āgatam

original: dhanam evaṃvidhaṃ sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ dharmasādhakam // K_880 //
analyzed: dhanam evaṃvidham sarvam vijñeyam dharma sādhakam

original: vivāhakāle yat kiṃcid varāyoddiśya dīyate /
analyzed: vivāha kāle yat kiṃcid varāya uddiśya dīyate

original: kanyāyās tad dhanaṃ sarvam avibhājyaṃ ca bandhubhiḥ // K_881 //
analyzed: kanyāyāḥ tat dhanam sarvam a vibhājyam ca bandhubhiḥ

original: dhanaṃ patraniviṣṭaṃ tu dharmārthaṃ ca nirūpitam /
analyzed: dhanam patra niviṣṭam tu dharma artham ca nirūpitam

original: udakaṃ caiva dāsaś ca nibandho yaḥ kramāgataḥ // K_882 //
analyzed: udakam ca eva dāsaḥ ca nibandhaḥ yaḥ krama āgataḥ

original: dhṛtaṃ vastram alaṃkāro nānurūpaṃ tu yad bhavet /
analyzed: dhṛtam vastram alaṃkāraḥ na anurūpam tu yat bhavet

original: yathā kālopayogyāni tathā yojyāni bandhubhiḥ // K_883 //
analyzed: yathā kāla upayogyāni tathā yojyāni bandhubhiḥ

original: gopracāraś ca rakṣā ca vastraṃ yac cāṅgayojitam /
analyzed: go pracāraḥ ca rakṣā ca vastram yat ca aṅga yojitam

original: prayojyaṃ na vibhajyeta dharmārthaṃ ca bṛhaspatiḥ // K_884:1 //
analyzed: prayojyam na vibhajyeta dharma artham ca bṛhaspatiḥ

original: deśasya jāteḥ saṅghasya dharmo grāmasya yo bhṛguḥ /
analyzed: deśasya jāteḥ saṅghasya dharmaḥ grāmasya yaḥ bhṛguḥ

original: uditaḥ syāt sa tenaiva dāyabhāgaṃ prakalpayet // K_884:2 //
analyzed: uditaḥ syāt sa tena eva dāya bhāgam prakalpayet

original: [pracchāditarikthasya punarvibhāgaḥ]
analyzed: pracchādita rikthasya punar vibhāgaḥ

original: pracchāditaṃ yadi dhanaṃ punar āsādya tat samam /
analyzed: pracchāditam yadi dhanam punar āsādya tat samam

original: bhajeran bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdham abhāve hi pituḥ sutāḥ // K_885 //
analyzed: bhajeran bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdham abhāve hi pituḥ sutāḥ

original: anyonyāpahṛtaṃ dravyaṃ durvibhaktaṃ ca yad bhavet /
analyzed: anyonya apahṛtam dravyam durvibhaktam ca yat bhavet

original: paścāt prāptaṃ vibhajyeta samabhāgena tad bhṛguḥ // K_886 //
analyzed: paścāt prāptam vibhajyeta sama bhāgena tat bhṛguḥ

original: vibhaktenaiva yat prāptaṃ dhanaṃ tasyaiva tad bhavet /
analyzed: vibhaktena eva yat prāptam dhanam tasya eva tat bhavet

original: hṛtaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca yal labdhaṃ prāg uktaṃ ca punar bhajet // K_887 //
analyzed: hṛtam naṣṭam ca yat labdham prāk uktam ca punar bhajet

original: bandhunāpahṛtaṃ dravyaṃ balān naiva pradāpayet /
analyzed: bandhunā apahṛtam dravyam balāt na eva pradāpayet

original: bandhūnām avibhaktānāṃ bhogaṃ naiva pradāpayet // K_888 //
analyzed: bandhūnām avibhaktānām bhogam na eva pradāpayet

original: kṣetraṃ sādhāraṇaṃ tyaktvā yo 'nyadeśaṃ samāśritaḥ /
analyzed: kṣetram sādhāraṇam tyaktvā yaḥ nya deśam samāśritaḥ

original: tad vaṃśyasyāgatasyāṃśaḥ pradātavyo na saṃśayaḥ // K_889 //
analyzed: tat vaṃśyasya āgatasya aṃśaḥ pradātavyaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: tṛtīyaḥ pañcamo vāpi saptamaś cāpi yo bhavet /
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ pañcamaḥ vā api saptamaḥ ca api yaḥ bhavet

original: janmanām aparijñāne labhetāṃśaṃ kramāgatam // K_890 //
analyzed: janmanām a parijñāne labheta aṃśam krama āgatam

original: yaṃ paraṃparayā maulāḥ sāmantāḥ svāminaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: yam paraṃparayā maulāḥ sāmantāḥ svāminam viduḥ

original: tad anvayasyāgatasya dātavyā gotajair mahī // K_891 //
analyzed: tat anvayasya āgatasya dātavyā mahī

original: vibhaktāḥ pitṛvittāc ced akatra prativāsinaḥ (?) /
analyzed: vibhaktāḥ pitṛ vittāt ced prativāsinaḥ

original: vibhajeyuḥ punar dvyaṃśaṃ sa labhetodayo yataḥ // K_892 //
analyzed: vibhajeyuḥ punar dvi aṃśam sa labheta udayaḥ yatas

original: [vibhaktacihnādi]
analyzed: vibhakta cihna ādi

original: vaseyur daśa varṣāṇi pṛthagdharmāḥ pṛthakkriyāḥ /
analyzed: vaseyuḥ daśa varṣāṇi pṛthak dharmāḥ pṛthak kriyāḥ

original: bhrātaras te 'pi vijñeyā vibhaktāḥ paitṛkād dhanāt // K_893 //
analyzed: bhrātaraḥ te vijñeyāḥ vibhaktāḥ paitṛkāt dhanāt

original: [strīdhanalakṣaṇaṃ strīdhanaprakārāś ca]
analyzed: strīdhana lakṣaṇam strīdhana prakārāḥ ca

original: adhyagnyadhyāvāhanikaṃ dattaṃ ca prītitaḥ striyaiḥ /
analyzed: adhyagni adhyāvāhanikam dattam ca prītitaḥ

original: bhrātṛmātṛpitṛprāptaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ strīdhanaṃ smṛtam // K_894 //
analyzed: bhrātṛ mātṛ pitṛ prāptam ṣaḍvidham strīdhanam smṛtam

original: vivāhakāle yat strībhyo dīyate hy agnisaṃnidhau /
analyzed: vivāha kāle yat strībhyaḥ dīyate hi agni saṃnidhau

original: tad adhyagnikṛtaṃ sadbhiḥ strīdhanaṃ parikīrtitam // K_895 //
analyzed: tat adhyagni kṛtam sadbhiḥ strīdhanam parikīrtitam

original: yat punar labhate nārī nīyamānā pitur gṛhāt /
analyzed: yat punar labhate nārī nīyamānā pituḥ gṛhāt

original: adhyāvahanikaṃ caiva strīdhanaṃ tad udāhṛtam // K_896 //
analyzed: adhyāvahanikam ca eva strīdhanam tat udāhṛtam

original: prītyā dattaṃ tu yat kiṃcit śvaśrvā vā śvaśureṇa vā /
analyzed: prītyā dattam tu yat kiṃcid śvaśrvā vā śvaśureṇa vā

original: pādavandanikaṃ caiva prītidattaṃ tad ucyate // K_897 //
analyzed: pāda vandanikam ca eva prītidattam tat ucyate

original: gṛhopaskaravāhyānāṃ dohyābharaṇakarmiṇām /
analyzed: gṛha upaskara vāhyānām dohya ābharaṇa karmiṇām

original: mūlyaṃ labdhaṃ tu yat kiṃcic śulkaṃ tat parikīrtitam // K_898 //
analyzed: mūlyam labdham tu yat kiṃcid śulkam tat parikīrtitam

original: vivāhāt parato yat tu labdhaṃ bhartṛkulāt striyā /
analyzed: vivāhāt paratas yat tu labdham bhartṛ kulāt striyā

original: anvādheyaṃ tad uktaṃ tu labhdaṃ bandhukulāt tathā // K_899 //
analyzed: anvādheyam tat uktam tu bandhu kulāt tathā

original: ūrdhvaṃ labdhaṃ tu yat kiṃcit saṃskārāt prītitaḥ striyā /
analyzed: ūrdhvam labdham tu yat kiṃcid saṃskārāt prītitaḥ striyā

original: bhartuḥ pitroḥ sakāśād vā anvādheyaṃ tu tad bhṛguḥ // K_900 //
analyzed: bhartuḥ pitroḥ sakāśāt vā anvādheyam tu tat bhṛguḥ

original: ūḍhayā kanyayā vāpi bhartuḥ pitṛgṛhe 'pi vā /
analyzed: ūḍhayā kanyayā vā api bhartuḥ pitṛ gṛhe vā

original: bhrātuḥ sakāśāt pitror vā labdhaṃ saudāyikaṃ smṛtam // K_901 //
analyzed: bhrātuḥ sakāśāt pitroḥ vā labdham saudāyikam smṛtam

original: [strīdhane svāmyādivicāraḥ]
analyzed: strīdhane svāmi ādi vicāraḥ

original: pitṛmātṛpatibhrātṛ- jñātibhiḥ strīdhanaṃ striyai /
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ pati bhrātṛ jñātibhiḥ strīdhanam striyai

original: yathāśaktyā dvisāhasrād dātavyaṃ sthāvarād ṛte // K_902 //
analyzed: yathāśaktyā dvi sāhasrāt dātavyam sthāvarāt ṛte

original: yat tu sopādhikaṃ dattaṃ yac ca yogavaśena vā /
analyzed: yat tu sa upādhikam dattam yat ca yoga vaśena vā

original: pitrā bhrātrātha vā patyā na tat strīdhanam iṣyate // K_903 //
analyzed: pitrā bhrātrā atha vā patyā na tat strīdhanam iṣyate

original: prāptaṃ śilpais tu yad vittaṃ prītyā caiva yad anyataḥ /
analyzed: prāptam śilpaiḥ tu yat vittam prītyā ca eva yat anyatas

original: bhartuḥ svāmyaṃ tadā tatra śeṣaṃ tu strīdhanaṃ smṛtam // K_904 //
analyzed: bhartuḥ svāmyam tadā tatra śeṣam tu strīdhanam smṛtam

original: saudāyikaṃ dhanaṃ prāpya strīṇāṃ svātantryam iṣyate /
analyzed: saudāyikam dhanam prāpya strīṇām svātantryam iṣyate

original: yasmāt tadānṛśasyārthaṃ tair dattam upajīvanam // K_905 //
analyzed: yasmāt tadā anṛśasya artham taiḥ dattam upajīvanam

original: saudāyike sadā strīṇāṃ svātantryaṃ parikīrtitam /
analyzed: saudāyike sadā strīṇām svātantryam parikīrtitam

original: vikraye caiva dāne ca yatheṣṭaṃ sthāvareṣv api // K_906 //
analyzed: vikraye ca eva dāne ca yatheṣṭam sthāvareṣu api

original: bhartṛdāyaṃ mṛte patyau vinyaset strī yatheṣṭataḥ /
analyzed: bhartṛ dāyam mṛte patyau vinyaset strī yatheṣṭataḥ

original: vidyamāne tu saṃrakṣet kṣapayet tat kule 'nyathā // K_907 //
analyzed: vidyamāne tu saṃrakṣet kṣapayet tat kule nyathā

original: atha cet sa dvibhāryaḥ syān na ca tāṃ bhajate punaḥ /
analyzed: atha ced sa dvi bhāryaḥ syāt na ca tām bhajate punar

original: prītyā nisṛṣṭam api cet pratidāpyaḥ sa tadbalāt // K_908 //
analyzed: prītyā nisṛṣṭam api ced pratidāpyaḥ sa tad balāt

original: grāsācchādanavāsānām ācchedo yatra yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: grāsa ācchādana vāsānām ācchedaḥ yatra yoṣitaḥ

original: tatra svam ādadīta strī vibhāgaṃ rikthināṃ tathā // K_909 //
analyzed: tatra svam ādadīta strī vibhāgam rikthinām tathā

original: likhitasyeti dharmo 'yaṃ prāpte bhartṛkule vaset /
analyzed: likhitasya iti dharmaḥ yam prāpte bhartṛ kule vaset

original: vyādhitā pretakāle tu gacched bandhujanaṃ tataḥ // K_910 //
analyzed: vyādhitā preta kāle tu gacchet bandhu janam tatas

original: na bhartā naiva ca suto na pitā bhrātaro na ca /
analyzed: na bhartā na eva ca sutaḥ na pitā bhrātaraḥ na ca

original: ādāne vā visarge vā strīdhane prabhaviṣṇavaḥ // K_911 //
analyzed: ādāne vā visarge vā strīdhane prabhaviṣṇavaḥ

original: yadi hy ekataro 'py eṣāṃ strīdhanaṃ bhakṣayed balāt /
analyzed: yadi hi ekataraḥ u pi eṣām strīdhanam bhakṣayet balāt

original: savṛddhikaṃ pradāpyaḥ syād daṇḍaṃ caiva samāpnuyāt // K_912 //
analyzed: sa vṛddhikam pradāpyaḥ syāt daṇḍam ca eva samāpnuyāt

analyzed: tat eva yadi anujñāpya bhakṣayet prīti pūrvakam

original: mūlyam eva pradāpyaḥ syād yady asau dhanavān bhavet // K_913 //
analyzed: mūlyam eva pradāpyaḥ syāt yadi asau dhanavān bhavet

original: vyādhitaṃ vyasanasthaṃ ca dhanikair vopapīḍitam /

analyzed: jīvantyāḥ pati putrāḥ tu devarāḥ pitṛ bāndhavāḥ

original: anīśāḥ strīdhanasyoktā daṇḍyās tv apaharanti ye // K_915 //
analyzed: anīśāḥ strīdhanasya uktāḥ daṇḍyāḥ tu apaharanti ye

analyzed: bhartrā pratiśrutam deyam ṛṇa vat strīdhanam sutaiḥ

original: tiṣṭhed bhartṛkule yā tu na sā pitṛkule vaset // K_916 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhet bhartṛ kule yā tu na sā pitṛ kule vaset

analyzed: mṛtāyāḥ striyāḥ dhana adhikāriṇaḥ

original: strīdhanasyeti dharmo 'yaṃ vibhāgas tu prakalpitaḥ // K_917 //
analyzed: strīdhanasya iti dharmaḥ yam vibhāgaḥ tu prakalpitaḥ

original: duhitṝṇām abhāve tu rikthaṃ putreṣu tad bhavet /
analyzed: duhitṝṇām abhāve tu riktham putreṣu tat bhavet

original: bandhudattaṃ tu bandhūnām abhāve bhrtṛgāmi tat // K_918 //
analyzed: bandhu dattam tu bandhūnām abhāve tat

original: pitṛbhyāṃ caiva yad dattaṃ duhituḥ sthāvaraṃ dhanam /

original: aprajāyām atātāyāṃ bhrātṛgāmi tu sarvadā // K_919 //

analyzed: āsura ādiṣu yat labdham strīdhanam paitṛkam striyā

original: abhāve tad apatyānāṃ mātāpitros tad iṣyate // K_920 //
analyzed: abhāve tat apatyānām mātā pitroḥ tat iṣyate

original: aputrā śayanaṃ bhartuḥ pālayantī gurau sthitā /
analyzed: aputrā śayanam bhartuḥ pālayantī gurau sthitā

original: bhuñjītāmaraṇāt kṣāntā dāyādā ūrdhvam āpnuyuḥ // K_921 //
analyzed: bhuñjīta amaraṇāt kṣāntā dāyādāḥ ūrdhvam āpnuyuḥ

original: svaryāte svāmini strī tu grāsācchādanabhāginī /
analyzed: svaryāte svāmini strī tu grāsa ācchādana bhāginī

original: avibhakte dhanāṃśe tu prāpnoty āmaraṇāntikam // K_922 //
analyzed: a vibhakte dhana aṃśe tu prāpnoti āmaraṇāntikam

analyzed: bhoktum arhati klṛpta aṃśam guru śuśrūṣaṇe ratā

original: na kuryād yadi śuśrūṣāṃ cailapiṇḍe niyojyet // K_923 //
analyzed: na kuryāt yadi śuśrūṣām caila piṇḍe niyojyet

original: mṛte bhartari bhartṛaṃśaṃ labheta kulapālikā /

original: yāvaj jīvaṃ na hi svāmyaṃ dānādhamanavikraye // K_924 //
analyzed: yāvat jīvam na hi svāmyam dāna ādhamana vikraye

original: vratopavāsaniratā brahmacarye vyavasthitā /
analyzed: vrata upavāsa niratā brahmacarye vyavasthitā

original: damadānaratā nityam aputrāpi divaṃ vrajet // K_925 //

original: patnī bhartur dhanaharī yā syād avyabhicāriṇī /

original: tadabhāve tu duhitā yady anūḍhā bhavet tadā // K_926 //

original: aputrasyātha kulajā patnī duhitaro 'pi vā /
analyzed: aputrasya atha kula jā patnī duhitaraḥ vā

original: tadabhāve pitā mātā bhrātā putrāś ca kīrtitāḥ // K_927 //
analyzed: tad abhāve pitā mātā bhrātā putrāḥ ca kīrtitāḥ

original: vibhakte saṃsthite dravyaṃ putrābhāve pitā haret /
analyzed: vibhakte saṃsthite dravyam putra abhāve pitā haret

original: bhrātā vā jananī vātha mātā vā tat pituḥ kramāt /

original: apacārakriyyayuktā nirlajjā vārthanāśikā // K_928 //
analyzed: apacāra kriyya yuktā nirlajjā vā artha nāśikā

original: vyabhicāraratā yā ca strī dhanaṃ sā na cārhati // K_929 //
analyzed: vyabhicāra ratā yā ca strī dhanam sā na ca arhati

original: nārī khalv ananujñātā pitrā bhartrā sutena vā /

original: viphalaṃ tad bhavet tasyā yat karoty aurdhvadehikam // K_930 //
analyzed: viphalam tat bhavet tasyāḥ yat karoti aurdhvadehikam

original: adāyikaṃ rājagāmi yoṣidbhṛtyordhvadehikam /

original: apāsya śrotriyadravyaṃ śrotriyebhyas tad arpayet // K_931 //
analyzed: apāsya śrotriya dravyam śrotriyebhyaḥ tat arpayet

original: saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ tu saṃsṛṣṭāḥ pṛthaksthānāṃ pṛthaksthitāḥ /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭānām tu saṃsṛṣṭāḥ pṛthak sthānām pṛthak sthitāḥ

original: abhāve 'rthaharā jñeyā nirbījānyonyabhāginaḥ // K_932 //
analyzed: abhāve rtha harāḥ jñeyāḥ nirbīja anyonya bhāginaḥ

original: [dyūtasamāhvayau]
analyzed: dyūta samāhvayau

original: dyūtaṃ naiva tu seveta krodhalobhavivardhakam /
analyzed: dyūtam nā eva tu seveta krodha lobha vivardhakam

original: asādhujananaṃ krūraṃ narāṇāṃ dravyanāśanam // K_933 //
analyzed: asādhu jananam krūram narāṇām dravya nāśanam

original: dhruvaṃ dyūtāt kalir yasmād viṣaṃ sarpamukhād iva /
analyzed: dhruvam dyūtāt kaliḥ yasmāt viṣam sarpa mukhāt iva

original: tasmād rājā nivarteta viṣaye vyasanaṃ hi tat // K_934 //
analyzed: tasmāt rājā nivarteta viṣaye vyasanam hi tat

original: varteta cet prakāśaṃ tu dvārāvasthitatoraṇam /
analyzed: varteta ced prakāśam tu dvāra avasthita toraṇam

original: asaṃmohārtham āryāṇāṃ kārayet tat karapadam // K_935 //
analyzed: asaṃmoha artham āryāṇām kārayet tat kara padam

original: sabhikaḥ kārayed dyūtaṃ deyaṃ dadyāt svayaṃ nṛpe /
analyzed: sabhikaḥ kārayet dyūtam deyam dadyāt svayam nṛpe

original: daśakaṃ tu śate vṛddhiṃ gṛhṇīyāc ca parājayāt // K_936 //
analyzed: daśakam tu śate vṛddhim gṛhṇīyāt ca parājayāt

original: jetur dadyāt svakaṃ dravyaṃ jitād grāhyaṃ tripakṣakam /
analyzed: jetuḥ dadyāt svakam dravyam jitāt grāhyam tri pakṣakam

original: sadyo vā sabhikenaiva kitāvāt tu na saṃśayaḥ // K_937 //
analyzed: sadyas vā sabhikena eva tu na saṃśayaḥ

original: ekarūpā dvirūpā vā dyūte yasyākṣadevinaḥ /
analyzed: eka rūpāḥ dvi rūpāḥ vā dyūte yasya akṣa devinaḥ

original: dṛśyate ca jayas tasya yasmin rakṣā vyavasthitā // K_938 //
analyzed: dṛśyate ca jayaḥ tasya yasmin rakṣā vyavasthitā

original: atha vā kitavo rājñe dattvā bhāgaṃ yathoditam /
analyzed: atha vā kitavaḥ rājñe dattvā bhāgam yathā uditam

original: prakāśaṃ devanaṃ kuryād evaṃ doṣo na vidyate // K_939 //
analyzed: prakāśam devanam kuryāt evam doṣaḥ na vidyate

original: prasahya dāpayed deyaṃ tasmin sthāne na cānyathā /
analyzed: prasahya dāpayet deyam tasmin sthāne na ca anyathā

original: jitaṃ vai sabhikas tatra sabhikapratyayā kriyā // K_940 //
analyzed: jitam vai sabhikaḥ tatra sabhika pratyayā kriyā

original: anabhijño jito mocyo 'mocyo 'bhijño jito rahaḥ /
analyzed: an abhijñaḥ jitaḥ mocyaḥ mocyaḥ rahaḥ

original: sarvasve vijite 'bhijñe na sarvasvaṃ pradāpayet // K_941 //
analyzed: sarva sve vijite bhijñe na sarva svam pradāpayet

original: vigrahe 'tha jaye lābhe karaṇe kūṭadevinām /
analyzed: vigrahe tha jaye lābhe karaṇe kūṭa devinām

original: pramāṇaṃ sabhikas tatra śuciś ca sabhiko yadi // K_942 //
analyzed: pramāṇam sabhikaḥ tatra śuciḥ ca sabhikaḥ yadi

original: mlecchaśvapākadhūrtānāṃ kitavānāṃ tapasminām /
analyzed: mleccha śvapāka dhūrtānām kitavānām tapasminām

original: tatkṛtācāram etṝṇāṃ niścayo na tu rājani // K_943 //
analyzed: tad kṛta ācāram etṝṇām niścayaḥ na tu rājani

original: [prakīrṇakam]
analyzed: prakīrṇakam

original: pūrvoktād uktaśeṣaṃ syād adhikāracyutaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: pūrva uktāt ukta śeṣam syāt adhikāra cyutam ca yat

original: āhṛtya paratantrārhta- nibaddham asamañjasam // K_944 //
analyzed: āhṛtya nibaddham asamañjasam

original: dṛṣṭāntatvena śāstrānte punar uktakriyāsthitam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta tvena śāstra ante punar ukta kriyā sthitam

original: anena vidhinā yac ca vākyaṃ tat syāt prakīrṇakam // K_945 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā yat ca vākyam tat syāt prakīrṇakam

original: rājadharmān svadharmāṃś ca saṃdigdhānāṃ ca bhāṣaṇam /
analyzed: rāja dharmān svadharmān ca saṃdigdhānām ca bhāṣaṇam

original: pūrvoktād uktaśeṣaṃ ca sarvaṃ tat syāt prakīrṇakam // K_946 //
analyzed: pūrva uktāt ukta śeṣam ca sarvam tat syāt prakīrṇakam

original: sadbhāgakaraśulkaṃ ca garte deyaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: sat bhāga kara śulkam ca garte deyam tathā eva ca

original: saṃgrāmacaurabhedī ca paradārābhimardanam // K_947 //
analyzed: saṃgrāma caura bhedī ca para dāra abhimardanam

original: gobrāhmaṇajighāṃsā ca śasyavyāghātakṛt tathā /
analyzed: go brāhmaṇa jighāṃsā ca śasya vyāghāta kṛt tathā

original: etān daśāparādhāṃs tu nṛpatiḥ svayam anviṣet // K_948 //
analyzed: etān daśa aparādhān tu nṛpatiḥ svayam

original: niṣkṛtīnām akaraṇam ājñāsedhavyatikramaḥ /
analyzed: niṣkṛtīnām akaraṇam ājñā āsedha vyatikramaḥ

original: varṇāśramavilopaś ca prarṇasaṅkaralopanam // K_949 //
analyzed: varṇa āśrama vilopaḥ ca

original: nidhir niṣphalavittaṃ ca daridrasya dhanāgamaḥ /
analyzed: nidhiḥ niṣphala vittam ca daridrasya dhana āgamaḥ

original: etāṃś cāraiḥ suviditān svayaṃ rājā nivārayet // K_950 //
analyzed: etān cāraiḥ su viditān svayam rājā nivārayet

original: anāmnā tāni kāryāṇi kriyāvādāṃś ca vādinām /
analyzed: anāmnā tāni kāryāṇi kriyā vādān ca vādinām

original: prakṛtīnāṃ prakopaś ca saṅketaś ca parasparam // K_951 //
analyzed: prakṛtīnām prakopaḥ ca saṅketaḥ ca parasparam

original: aśāstravihitaṃ yac ca prajāyāṃ saṃpravartate /
analyzed: a śāstra vihitam yat ca prajāyām saṃpravartate

original: upāyaiḥ sāmabhedād yair etāni śamaye nṛpaḥ // K_952 //
analyzed: upāyaiḥ sāma bhedāt yaiḥ etāni nṛpaḥ

original: mitrādiṣu prayuñjīta vāgdaṇḍaṃ dhik tapasvini /
analyzed: mitra ādiṣu prayuñjīta vāgdaṇḍam dhik tapasvini

original: yathoktaṃ tasya tat kuryād anuktaṃ sādhu kalpitam // K_953 //
analyzed: yathā uktam tasya tat kuryāt anuktam sādhu kalpitam

original: pramāṇena tu kūṭena mudrayā vāpi kūṭayā /
analyzed: pramāṇena tu kūṭena mudrayā vā api kūṭayā

original: kāryaṃ tu sādhayed yo vai sa dāpyo damam uttamam // K_954 //
analyzed: kāryam tu sādhayet yaḥ vai sa dāpyaḥ damam uttamam

original: rājakrīḍāsu ye saktā rājavṛttyupajīvinaḥ /
analyzed: rāja krīḍāsu ye saktāḥ rāja vṛtti upajīvinaḥ

original: apriyasya ca yo vaktā vadhaṃ teṣāṃ pravartayet // K_955 //
analyzed: apriyasya ca yaḥ vaktā vadham teṣām pravartayet

original: pratirūpasya kartāraḥ prekṣakāḥ prakarāś ca ye /
analyzed: pratirūpasya kartāraḥ prekṣakāḥ prakarāḥ ca ye

original: rājārthamoṣakāś caiva prāpnuyur vividhaṃ vadham // K_956 //
analyzed: rāja artha moṣakāḥ ca eva prāpnuyuḥ vividham vadham

original: pravrajyāvasitaṃ śūdraṃ japahomaparaṃ tathā /
analyzed: pravrajyā avasitam śūdram japa homa param tathā

original: vadhena śāsayet pāpaṃ daṇḍyo vā dviguṇaṃ damam // K_957 //
analyzed: vadhena śāsayet pāpam daṇḍyaḥ vā dviguṇam damam

original: sacihnam api pāpaṃ tu pṛcchet pāpasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: sa cihnam api pāpam tu pṛcchet pāpasya kāraṇam

original: tadā daṇḍaṃ prakalpeta doṣam āropya yatnataḥ // K_958 //
analyzed: tadā daṇḍam prakalpeta doṣam āropya yatnataḥ

original: sadvṛttānām tu sarveṣām aparādho yadā bhavet /
analyzed: sat vṛttānām tu sarveṣām aparādhaḥ yadā bhavet

original: avaśenaiva daivāt tu tatra daṇḍaṃ na kalpayet // K_959 //
analyzed: avaśena eva daivāt tu tatra daṇḍam na kalpayet

original: samyagdaṇḍapraṇetāro nṛpāḥ pūjyāḥ surair api /
analyzed: samyak daṇḍa praṇetāraḥ nṛpāḥ pūjyāḥ suraiḥ api

original: ārambhe pradhamaṃ dadyāt pravṛttau madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ārambhe dadyāt pravṛttau madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: yasya yo vihito daṇḍaḥ paryāptasya sa vai bhavet // K_960 //
analyzed: yasya yaḥ vihitaḥ daṇḍaḥ paryāptasya sa vai bhavet

original: rājāno mantriṇaś caiva viśeṣād evam āpnuyuḥ /
analyzed: rājānaḥ mantriṇaḥ ca eva viśeṣāt evam āpnuyuḥ

original: aśāsanāt tu pāpānāṃ natānāṃ daṇḍadhāraṇāt // K_961 //
analyzed: a śāsanāt tu pāpānām natānām daṇḍa dhāraṇāt

original: paratantrāś ca ye kecid dāsatvaṃ ye ca saṃsthitāḥ /
analyzed: paratantrāḥ ca ye kecid dāsa tvam ye ca saṃsthitāḥ

original: anāthās te tu nirdiṣṭās teṣāṃ daṇḍas tu tāḍanam // K_962 //
analyzed: anāthāḥ te tu nirdiṣṭāḥ teṣām daṇḍaḥ tu tāḍanam

original: tāḍanaṃ vandhanaṃ caiva tathaiva ca viḍambanam /
analyzed: tāḍanam vandhanam ca eva tathā eva ca viḍambanam

original: eṣa daṇḍo hi dāsasya nārthadaṇḍo vidhīyate // K_963 //
analyzed: eṣa daṇḍaḥ hi dāsasya na artha daṇḍaḥ vidhīyate

original: suvarṇaśatam ekaṃ tu vadhārho daṇḍam arhati /
analyzed: suvarṇa śatam ekam tu vadha arhaḥ daṇḍam arhati

original: aṅgacchede tad ardhaṃ tu vivāse pañcaviṃśatim // K_964 //
analyzed: aṅga chede tat ardham tu vivāse pañcaviṃśatim

original: kulīnāryaviśiṣṭteṣu nikṛṣṭeṣv anusārataḥ /
analyzed: kulīna ārya viśiṣṭteṣu nikṛṣṭeṣu anusārataḥ

original: sarvasvaṃ vā nigṛhyaitān purāt śīghraṃ pravāsayet // K_965 //
analyzed: sarva svam vā nigṛhya etān purāt śīghram pravāsayet

original: nirdhanā bandhane sthāpyā vadhaṃ naiva pravartayet /
analyzed: nirdhanāḥ bandhane sthāpyāḥ vadham nā eva pravartayet

original: sarveṣāṃ pāpayuktānāṃ viśeṣārthaś ca śāstrataḥ // K_966 //
analyzed: sarveṣām pāpa yuktānām viśeṣa arthaḥ ca śāstrataḥ

original: vadhāṅgacchedārhavipro niḥsaṅge bandhane viśet /
analyzed: vadha aṅga cheda arha vipraḥ niḥsaṅge bandhane viśet

original: tad akarmaviyuto 'sau vṛttas tasya damo hi saḥ // K_967 //
analyzed: tat sau vṛttaḥ tasya damaḥ hi saḥ

original: kūṭasākṣy api nirvāsyo vikhyāpyo 'satpratigrahī /
analyzed: kūṭa sākṣī api nirvāsyaḥ vikhyāpyaḥ sat pratigrahī

original: aṅgacchedī viyojyaḥ syāt svadharme bandhanena tu // K_968 //
analyzed: aṅga chedī viyojyaḥ syāt svadharme bandhanena tu

original: etaiḥ samāparādhānāṃ tatrāpy evaṃ prakalpayet /
analyzed: etaiḥ sama aparādhānām tatra api evam prakalpayet

original: bālavṛddhāturastrīṇāṃ na daṇḍas tāḍanaṃ damaḥ // K_969 //
analyzed: bāla vṛddha ātura strīṇām na daṇḍaḥ tāḍanam damaḥ

original: strīdhanaṃ dāpayed daṇḍaṃ dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: strīdhanam dāpayet daṇḍam dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: nirdhanā prāptadoṣā strī tāḍanaṃ daṇḍam arhati // K_970 //
analyzed: nirdhanā prāpta doṣā strī tāḍanam daṇḍam arhati

original: anyāyopārjitaṃ nyastaṃ koṣe koṣaṃ niveśayet /
analyzed: anyāya upārjitam nyastam koṣe koṣam niveśayet

original: kāryārthe kāryanāśaḥ syād buddhimān nopapātayet // K_971 //
analyzed: kārya arthe kārya nāśaḥ syāt buddhimān na upapātayet

original: dattvā dhanaṃ tad viprebhyaḥ sarvaṃ daṇḍasamutthitam /
analyzed: dattvā dhanam tat viprebhyaḥ sarvam daṇḍa samutthitam

original: putre rājyaṃ samāsajya kurvīta prāyaṇaṃ vane // K_972 //
analyzed: putre rājyam samāsajya kurvīta prāyaṇam vane

original: evaṃ caret sadā yukto rājā dharmeṣu pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: evam caret sadā yuktaḥ rājā dharmeṣu pārthivaḥ

original: hiteṣu caiva lokasya sarvān bhṛtyān niyojayet // K_973 //
analyzed: hiteṣu ca eva lokasya sarvān bhṛtyān niyojayet
